GE09ram_06_u:001.002a: kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ sumahad bhuvi duṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:001.002c: manasāpi yad anyena na śakyaṃ dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:001.003a: na hi taṃ paripaśyāmi yas tareta mahārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:001.003c: anyatra garuṇād vāyor anyatra ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.005a: praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan ko nāma niṣkramet
GE09ram_06_u:001.005c: ko viśet sudurādharṣāṃ rākṣasaiś ca surakṣitām
GE09ram_06_u:001.005e: yo vīryabalasaṃpanno na samaḥ syād dhanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.006c: evaṃ vidhāya svabalaṃ sadṛśaṃ vikramasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:001.007a: yo hi bhṛtyo niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare
GE09ram_06_u:001.008a: niyukto nṛpateḥ kāryaṃ na kuryād yaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.008c: bhṛtyo yuktaḥ samarthaś ca tam āhuḥ puruṣādhamam
GE09ram_06_u:001.009c: na cātmā laghutāṃ nītaḥ sugrīvaś cāpi toṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.010a: ahaṃ ca raghuvaṃśaś ca lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.011a: idaṃ tu mama dīnasyā mano bhūyaḥ prakarṣati
GE09ram_06_u:001.011c: yad ihāsya priyākhyātur na kurmi sadṛśaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:001.012c: mayā kālam imaṃ prāpya dattas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:001.013c: sāgaraṃ tu samāsādya punar naṣṭaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_06_u:001.015a: yady apy eṣa tu vṛttānto vaidehyā gadito mama
GE09ram_06_u:002.002a: kiṃ tvaṃ saṃtapyase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:002.002c: maivaṃ bhūs tyaja saṃtāpaṃ kṛtaghna iva sauhṛdam
GE09ram_06_u:002.003a: saṃtāpasya ca te sthānaṃ na hi paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:002.003c: pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.004a: dhṛtimāñ śāstravit prājñaḥ paṇḍitaś cāsi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:002.005c: laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmo haniṣyāmaś ca te ripum
GE09ram_06_u:002.007a: ime śūrāḥ samarthāś ca sarve no hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.008a: eṣāṃ harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaś cāsmin dṛḍho mama
GE09ram_06_u:002.008c: vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītāṃ hatvā yathā ripum
GE09ram_06_u:002.009a: setur atra yathā vadhyed yathā paśyema tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:002.009c: tasya rākṣasarājasya tathā tvaṃ kuru rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:002.010a: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ hi purīṃ laṅkāṃ trikūṭaśikhare sthitām
GE09ram_06_u:002.010c: hataṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe darśanād upadhāraya
GE09ram_06_u:002.011a: setubaddhaḥ samudre ca yāval laṅkā samīpataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.011c: sarvaṃ tīrṇaṃ ca vai sainyaṃ jitam ity upadhāryatām
GE09ram_06_u:002.012a: ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.012c: tad alaṃ viklavā buddhī rājan sarvārthanāśanī
GE09ram_06_u:002.013c: yat tu kāryaṃ manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā
GE09ram_06_u:002.014a: vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarvārthanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.015a: madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham ariṃ jetum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:002.015c: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ kaṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:002.016a: gṛhītadhanuṣo yas te tiṣṭhed abhimukho raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:002.016c: vānareṣu samāsaktaṃ na te kāryaṃ vipatsyate
GE09ram_06_u:002.017a: acirād drakṣyase sītāṃ tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:002.017c: tad alaṃ śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate
GE09ram_06_u:002.018a: niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyā mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati
GE09ram_06_u:002.019c: ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:002.020c: kathaṃ cit paripaśyāmas te vayaṃ varuṇālayam
GE09ram_06_u:002.021a: kim uktvā bahudhā cāpi sarvathā vijayī bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:003.003a: kati durgāṇi durgāyā laṅkāyās tad bravīhi me
GE09ram_06_u:003.003c: jñātum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ darśanād iva vānara
GE09ram_06_u:003.004c: gupti karma ca laṅkāyā rakṣasāṃ sadanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:003.005a: yathāsukhaṃ yathāvac ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_06_u:003.005c: saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalo hy asi
GE09ram_06_u:003.006c: vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaṃ punar athābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:003.007c: guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.008a: parāṃ samṛddhiṃ laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīmatām
GE09ram_06_u:003.008c: vibhāgaṃ ca balaughasya nirdeśaṃ vāhanasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:003.010c: dvārāṇi vipulāny asyāś catvāri sumahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:003.012c: śataśo rocitā vīraiḥ śataghnyo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.013a: sauvarṇaś ca mahāṃs tasyāḥ prākāro duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.017a: ekas tv akampyo balavān saṃkramaḥ sumahādṛḍhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.017c: kāñcanair bahubhiḥ stambhair vedikābhiś ca śobhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.019c: nādeyaṃ pārvataṃ vanyaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca caturvidham
GE09ram_06_u:003.020c: naupathaś cāpi nāsty atra nirādeśaś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.021a: śailāgre racitā durgā sā pūr devapuropamā
GE09ram_06_u:003.022a: parighāś ca śataghnyaś ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:003.028a: te mayā saṃkramā bhagnāḥ parikhāś cāvapūritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.028c: dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāś cāvasāditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.029a: yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam
GE09ram_06_u:003.030a: aṅgado dvivido maindo jāmbavān panaso nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:003.030c: nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva balaśeṣeṇa kiṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:003.031a: plavamānā hi gatvā tāṃ rāvaṇasya mahāpurīm
GE09ram_06_u:004.002a: yāṃ nivedayase laṅkāṃ purīṃ bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.002c: kṣipram enāṃ vadhiṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_06_u:004.003c: yukto muhūrto vijayaḥ prāpto madhyaṃ divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.004a: uttarā phalgunī hy adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:004.005a: nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_06_u:004.006a: upariṣṭād dhi nayanaṃ sphuramāṇam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:004.007a: agre yātu balasyāsya nīlo mārgam avekṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:004.008c: pathā madhumatā cāśu senāṃ senāpate naya
GE09ram_06_u:004.009c: rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethās tebhyas tvaṃ nityam udyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.012a: gajaś ca girisaṃkāśo gavayaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.012c: gavākṣaś cāgrato yāntu gavāṃ dṛptā ivarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.017a: jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.017c: ṛkṣarājo mahāsattvaḥ kukṣiṃ rakṣantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.019c: guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaś ca āśu pupluvire tadā
GE09ram_06_u:004.020c: jagāma rāmo dharmātmā sasainyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_06_u:004.021a: śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_06_u:004.021c: vāraṇābhiś ca haribhir yayau parivṛtas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:004.022a: taṃ yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:004.023c: āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.023e: kṣvelanto ninadantaś ca jagmur vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_06_u:004.024a: bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.025a: anyonyaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭā nirvahanti kṣipanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.025c: patantaś cotpatanty anye pātayanty apare parān
GE09ram_06_u:004.026a: rāvaṇo no nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.027a: purastād ṛṣabho vīro nīlaḥ kumuda eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.027c: pathānaṃ śodhayanti sma vānarair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:004.028a: madhye tu rājā sugrīvo rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.029a: hariḥ śatabalir vīraḥ koṭībhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.029c: sarvām eko hy avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa harivāhinīm
GE09ram_06_u:004.031a: suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃś caiva ṛkṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.032c: saṃpatan patatāṃ śreṣṭhas tad balaṃ paryapālayat
GE09ram_06_u:004.033a: darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaś ca jambho 'tha rabhasaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.033c: sarvataś ca yayur vīrās tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_06_u:004.036a: tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrās te kapikuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.036c: tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sadaśvā iva coditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.038a: tam aṅgadagato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā
GE09ram_06_u:004.039a: hṛtām avāpya vaidehīṃ kṣipraṃ hatvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:004.040a: mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:004.041a: anu vāti śubho vāyuḥ senāṃ mṛduhitaḥ sukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.042a: prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvā vimalaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.042c: uśanā ca prasannārcir anu tvāṃ bhārgavo gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.043a: brahmarāśir viśuddhaś ca śuddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.048a: prasannāḥ surasāś cāpo vanāni phalavanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.050a: evam ārya samīkṣyaitān prīto bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:004.050c: iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:004.051a: athāvṛtya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mahatī camūḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.052a: karāgraiś caraṇāgraiś ca vānarair uddhataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.052c: bhaumam antardadhe lokaṃ nivārya savituḥ prabhām
GE09ram_06_u:004.053a: sā sma yāti divārātraṃ mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:004.055c: sahyaparvatam āsedur malayaṃ ca mahī dharam
GE09ram_06_u:004.056c: paśyann api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:004.057c: karavīrāṃś ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.059c: yayuḥ pibanto hṛṣṭās te madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.061c: anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanty api cāpare
GE09ram_06_u:004.062a: babhūva vasudhā tais tu saṃpūrṇā haripuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.065a: te sahyaṃ samatikramya malayaṃ ca mahāgirim
GE09ram_06_u:004.067c: velām āsādya vipulāṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:004.068c: ihedānīṃ vicintā sā yā na pūrvaṃ samutthitā
GE09ram_06_u:004.069c: na cāyam anupāyena śakyas taritum arṇavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.070a: tad ihaiva niveśo 'stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha
GE09ram_06_u:004.071c: rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_06_u:004.072c: svāṃ svāṃ senāṃ samutsṛjya mā ca kaś cit kuto vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:004.072e: gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrā jñeyaṃ channaṃ bhayaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.074a: virarāja samīpasthaṃ sāgarasya tu tad balam
GE09ram_06_u:004.080c: durgaṃ drugam amārgaṃ tam agādham asurālayam
GE09ram_06_u:004.081c: utpetuś ca nipetuś ca pravṛddhā jalarāśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:004.084a: saṃpṛktaṃ nabhasā hy ambhaḥ saṃpṛktaṃ ca nabho 'mbhasā
GE09ram_06_u:004.085c: viśeṣo na dvayor āsīt sāgarasyāmbarasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:005.001a: sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā susamāhitā
GE09ram_06_u:005.002a: maindaś ca dvividhaś cobhau tatra vānarapuṃgavau
GE09ram_06_u:005.002c: viceratuś ca tāṃ senāṃ rakṣārthaṃ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_06_u:005.003c: pārśvasthaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:005.004a: śokaś ca kila kālena gacchatā hy apagacchati
GE09ram_06_u:005.004c: mama cāpaśyataḥ kāntām ahany ahani vardhate
GE09ram_06_u:005.005a: na me duḥkhaṃ priyā dūre na me duḥkhaṃ hṛteti ca
GE09ram_06_u:005.006a: vāhi vāta yataḥ kanyā tāṃ spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa
GE09ram_06_u:005.007a: tan me dahati gātrāṇi viṣaṃ pītam ivāśaye
GE09ram_06_u:005.007c: hā nātheti priyā sā māṃ hriyamāṇā yad abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:005.008c: rātriṃ divaṃ śarīraṃ me dahyate madanāgninā
GE09ram_06_u:005.009c: kathaṃ cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptaṃ jale dahet
GE09ram_06_u:005.010a: bahv etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum
GE09ram_06_u:005.010c: yad ahaṃ sā ca vāmorur ekāṃ dharaṇim āśritau
GE09ram_06_u:005.011c: upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīṃ yac chṛṇomi tām
GE09ram_06_u:005.012c: vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītāṃ sphītām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:005.013a: kadā nu cārubimbauṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam
GE09ram_06_u:005.014a: tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tālaphalopamau
GE09ram_06_u:005.014c: kadā nu khalu sotkampau hasantyā māṃ bhajiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:005.016c: vidhūya jaladān nīlāñ śaśilekhā śaratsv iva
GE09ram_06_u:005.019a: kadā nu khalu māṃ sādhvī sītāmarasutopamā
GE09ram_06_u:005.019c: sotkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyaty ānandajaṃ jalam
GE09ram_06_u:005.020a: kadā śokam imaṃ ghoraṃ maithilī viprayogajam
GE09ram_06_u:005.021a: evaṃ vilapatas tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.001a: laṅkāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham
GE09ram_06_u:006.001e: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.002a: dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī
GE09ram_06_u:006.002c: tena vānaramātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī
GE09ram_06_u:006.003a: prasādo dharṣitaś caityaḥ pravarā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.003c: āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:006.004a: kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhadraṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā yuktam anantaram
GE09ram_06_u:006.004c: ucyatāṃ naḥ samarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:006.005a: mantramūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ prāhur āryā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.005c: tasmād vai rocaye mantraṃ rāmaṃ prati mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.006c: teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ guṇadoṣaṃ vadāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:006.007c: mitrair vāpi samānārthair bāndhavair api vā hitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.008c: daive ca kurute yatnaṃ tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_06_u:006.009a: eko 'rthaṃ vimṛśed eko dharme prakurute manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.009c: ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhur madhyamaṃ naram
GE09ram_06_u:006.010c: kariṣyāmīti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa narādhamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.012c: mantriṇo yatra nirastās tam āhur mantram uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:006.013a: bahvyo 'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇo hy arthanirṇaye
GE09ram_06_u:006.013c: punar yatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:006.014c: na caikamatye śreyo 'sti mantraḥ so 'dhama ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:006.017a: tariṣyati ca suvyaktaṃ rāghavaḥ sāgaraṃ sukham
GE09ram_06_u:006.018a: asminn evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:006.018c: hitaṃ pure ca sainye ca sarvaṃ saṃmantryatāṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:007.001a: ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.002c: sumahan no balaṃ kasmād viṣādaṃ bhajate bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:007.003c: sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā vaśyas te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.005a: vinihatya ca yakṣaughān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:007.008a: nirjitās te mahābāho nāgā gatvā rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:007.008c: vāsukis takṣakaḥ śaṅkho jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.009a: akṣayā balavantaś ca śūrā labdhavarāḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.009c: tvayā saṃvatsaraṃ yuddhvā samare dānavā vibho
GE09ram_06_u:007.011a: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca varuṇasya sutā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:007.013a: jayaś ca viplulaḥ prāpto mṛtyuś ca pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.013c: suyuddhena ca te sarve lokās tatra sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.014c: āsīd vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhir iva pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.015a: teṣāṃ vīryaguṇotsāhair na samo rāghavo raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:007.015c: prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ paramadurjayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:007.016a: rājan nāpad ayukteyam āgatā prākṛtāj janāt
GE09ram_06_u:007.016c: hṛdi naiva tvayā kāryā tvaṃ vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:008.001c: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ śūraḥ senāpatis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:008.002c: na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar vānarā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:008.003a: sarve pramattā viśvastā vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā
GE09ram_06_u:008.003c: na hi me jīvato gacchej jīvan sa vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:008.004c: karomy avānarāṃ bhūmim ājñāpayatu māṃ bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:008.005c: nāgamiṣyati te duḥkhaṃ kiṃ cid ātmāparādhajam
GE09ram_06_u:008.006a: abravīc ca susaṃkruddho durmukho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:008.006c: idaṃ na kṣamaṇīyaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ naḥ pradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:008.008c: praviṣṭān sāgaraṃ bhīmam ambaraṃ vā rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:008.010a: kiṃ vo hanumatā kāryaṃ kṛpaṇena tapasvinā
GE09ram_06_u:008.012a: kaumbhakarṇis tato vīro nikumbho nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:008.014c: kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktraṃ jihvayā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:008.016e: sāṅgadaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ rāmaṃ ca raṇakuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:009.002a: agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.003c: dhūmrākṣaś cātikāyaś ca durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.004c: cāpāni ca sabāṇāni khaḍgāṃś ca vipulāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:009.005c: abruvan rāvaṇaṃ sarve pradīptā iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:009.006a: adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:009.006c: kṛpaṇaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ laṅkā yena pradharṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:009.007c: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ punaḥ pratyupaveśya tān
GE09ram_06_u:009.008a: apy upāyais tribhis tāta yo 'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_06_u:009.008c: tasya vikramakālāṃs tān yuktān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.009c: vikramās tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.010a: apramattaṃ kathaṃ taṃ tu vijigīṣuṃ bale sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:009.011c: kṛtaṃ hanumatā karma duṣkaraṃ tarkayeta kaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.012c: pareṣāṃ sahasāvajñā na kartavyā kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:009.014a: kharo yady ativṛttas tu rāmeṇa nihato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:009.014c: avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathā balam
GE09ram_06_u:009.015a: etannimittaṃ vaidehī bhayaṃ naḥ sumahad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:009.015c: āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalahārthe kṛte na kim
GE09ram_06_u:009.016a: na naḥ kṣamaṃ vīryavatā tena dharmānuvartinā
GE09ram_06_u:009.016c: vairaṃ nirarthakaṃ kartuṃ dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:009.017c: purīṃ dārayate bāṇair dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:009.018c: nāvaskandati no laṅkāṃ tāvat sītā pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:009.019a: vinaśyed dhi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:009.019c: rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayaṃ yadi dīyate
GE09ram_06_u:009.020a: prasādaye tvāṃ bandhutvāt kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:009.020c: hitaṃ pathyaṃ tv ahaṃ brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:009.021c: sṛjaty amoghān viśikhān vadhāya te; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:009.022a: tyajasva kopaṃ sukhadharmanāśanaṃ; bhajasva dharmaṃ ratikīrtivardhanam
GE09ram_06_u:009.022c: prasīda jīvema saputrabāndhavāḥ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:010.003c: hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣv ete jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:010.004a: pradhānaṃ sādhakaṃ vaidyaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:010.004c: jñātayo hy avamanyante śūraṃ paribhavanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:010.006a: śrūyante hastibhir gītāḥ ślokāḥ padmavane kva cit
GE09ram_06_u:010.006c: pāśahastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadato mama
GE09ram_06_u:010.007a: nāgnir nānyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.007c: ghorāḥ svārthaprayuktās tu jñātayo no bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.008a: upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.008c: kṛtsnād bhayāj jñātibhayaṃ sukaṣṭaṃ viditaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.009a: vidyate goṣu saṃpannaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.009c: vidyate strīṣu cāpalyaṃ vidyate jñātito bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:010.010a: tato neṣṭam idaṃ saumya yad ahaṃ lokasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.010c: aiśvaryam abhijātaś ca ripūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.011a: anyas tv evaṃvidhaṃ brūyād vākyam etan niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:010.011c: asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvāṃ tu dhik kulapāṃsanam
GE09ram_06_u:010.012a: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ nyāyavādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.013a: abravīc ca tadā vākyaṃ jātakrodho vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.014a: sa tvaṃ bhrātāsi me rājan brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:010.014c: idaṃ tu paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ na kṣamāmy anṛtaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:010.015c: na gṛhṇanty akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.016c: apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.017c: na naśyantam upekṣeyaṃ pradīptaṃ śaraṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:010.018c: na tvām icchāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāmeṇa nihataṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:010.019a: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:010.020a: ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣa purīṃ cemāṃ sarākṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:010.020c: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā
GE09ram_06_u:010.021a: nivāryamāṇasya mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na rocate te vacanaṃ niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:010.021c: parītakālā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam
GE09ram_06_u:011.001a: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.003c: vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaś cintayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:011.004a: cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:011.005c: rākṣaso 'bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantuṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.006a: sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.006c: sālān udyamya śailāṃś ca idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_06_u:011.007a: śīghraṃ vyādiśa no rājan vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:011.008c: uttaraṃ tīram āsādya khastha eva vyatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_06_u:011.009a: uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_06_u:011.009c: sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca saṃprekṣya khastha eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.010c: tasyāham anujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.011a: tena sītā janasthānād dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:011.011c: ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:011.012a: tam ahaṃ hetubhir vākyair vividhaiś ca nyadarśayam
GE09ram_06_u:011.012c: sādhu niryātyatāṃ sītā rāmāyeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.013a: sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.014c: tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.016a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvo laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.017c: caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhir bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.018c: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye kṣamaṃ kṣamavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:011.019c: prahartuṃ māyayā channo viśvaste tvayi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:011.020a: badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:011.020c: rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.021a: evam uktvā tu taṃ rāmaṃ saṃrabdho vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.022a: sugrīvasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.023c: vākyaṃ hetumad atyarthaṃ bhavadbhir api tac chrutam
GE09ram_06_u:011.024a: suhṛdā hy arthakṛccheṣu yuktaṃ buddhimatā satā
GE09ram_06_u:011.025a: ity evaṃ paripṛṣṭās te svaṃ svaṃ matam atandritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.026a: ajñātaṃ nāsti te kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:011.026c: ātmānaṃ pūjayan rāma pṛcchasy asmān suhṛttayā
GE09ram_06_u:011.027a: tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro dhārmiko dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.027c: parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭātmā suhṛtsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:011.028a: tasmād ekaikaśas tāvad bruvantu sacivās tava
GE09ram_06_u:011.028c: hetuto matisaṃpannāḥ samarthāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.030a: śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkya eva hi
GE09ram_06_u:011.031c: praharanti ca randhreṣu so 'narthaḥ sumahān bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:011.032c: guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatas tu visarjayet
GE09ram_06_u:011.033a: yadi doṣo mahāṃs tasmiṃs tyajyatām aviśaṅkitam
GE09ram_06_u:011.033c: guṇān vāpi bahūñ jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_06_u:011.034a: śarabhas tv atha niścitya sārthaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:011.035c: parīkṣya ca tataḥ kāryo yathānyāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.036a: jāmbavāṃs tv atha saṃprekṣya śāstrabuddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.037a: baddhavairāc ca pāpāc ca rākṣasendrād vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.037c: adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam
GE09ram_06_u:011.040a: bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:011.040c: yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:011.041c: uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam arthavan madhuraṃ laghu
GE09ram_06_u:011.042a: na bhavantaṃ matiśreṣṭhaṃ samarthaṃ vadatāṃ varam
GE09ram_06_u:011.043a: na vādān nāpi saṃgharṣān nādhikyān na ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.044a: arthānarthanimittaṃ hi yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_06_u:011.044c: tatra doṣaṃ prapaśyāmi kriyā na hy upapadyate
GE09ram_06_u:011.045a: ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_06_u:011.045c: sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me
GE09ram_06_u:011.046a: cārapraṇihitaṃ yuktaṃ yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_06_u:011.047a: adeśa kāle saṃprāpta ity ayaṃ yad vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.047c: vivakṣā cātra me 'stīyaṃ tāṃ nibodha yathā mati
GE09ram_06_u:011.048a: sa eṣa deśaḥ kālaś ca bhavatīha yathā tathā
GE09ram_06_u:011.048c: puruṣāt puruṣaṃ prāpya tathā doṣaguṇāv api
GE09ram_06_u:011.049a: daurātmyaṃ rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ ca tathā tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:011.049c: yuktam āgamanaṃ tasya sadṛśaṃ tasya buddhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.050a: ajñātarūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:011.050c: yad uktam atra me prekṣā kā cid asti samīkṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:011.052a: aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai
GE09ram_06_u:011.052c: antaḥ svabhāvair gītais tair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:011.053a: na tv asya bruvato jātu lakṣyate duṣṭabhāvatā
GE09ram_06_u:011.053c: prasannaṃ vadanaṃ cāpi tasmān me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.054c: na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.055c: balād dhi vivṛṇoty eva bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_06_u:011.057a: udyogaṃ tava saṃprekṣya mithyāvṛttaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:011.057c: vālinaś ca vadhaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaṃ cābhiṣecitam
GE09ram_06_u:011.058c: etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tv asya saṃgrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:011.059c: tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:012.001a: atha rāmaḥ prasannātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha
GE09ram_06_u:012.002a: mamāpi tu vivakṣāsti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:012.002c: śrutam icchāmi tat sarvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.003a: mitrabhāvena saṃprāptaṃ na tyajeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:012.003c: doṣo yady api tasya syāt satām etad agarhitam
GE09ram_06_u:012.005c: yat tvam āryaṃ prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.006a: mama cāpy antarātmāyaṃ śuddhiṃ vetti vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:012.006c: anumanāc ca bhāvāc ca sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.007a: tasmāt kṣipraṃ sahāsmābhis tulyo bhavatu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:012.008a: sa sugrīvasya tad vākyayṃ rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:012.009a: suduṣṭo vāpy aduṣṭo vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.009c: sūkṣmam apy ahitaṃ kartuṃ mamāśaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:012.010a: piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyāṃ caiva rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:012.011a: śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.011c: arcitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.012a: sa hi taṃ pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:012.012c: kapoto vānaraśreṣṭha kiṃ punar madvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.013c: śṛṇu gāthāṃ purā gītāṃ dharmiṣṭhāṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_06_u:012.014c: na hanyād ānṛśaṃsyārtham api śatruṃ paraṃ pata
GE09ram_06_u:012.015a: ārto vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.016a: sa ced bhayād vā mohād vā kāmād vāpi na rakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:012.016c: svayā śaktyā yathātattvaṃ tat pāpaṃ lokagarhitam
GE09ram_06_u:012.017c: ādāya sukṛtaṃ tasya sarvaṃ gacched arakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.018a: evaṃ doṣo mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:012.019a: kariṣyāmi yathārthaṃ tu kaṇḍor vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:012.019c: dharmiṣṭhaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ syāt tu phalodaye
GE09ram_06_u:012.020a: sakṛd eva prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yācate
GE09ram_06_u:012.020c: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāmy etad vrataṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:012.021c: vibhīṣaṇo vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:012.022a: tatas tu sugrīvavaco niśamya tad; dharīśvareṇābhihitaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:012.022c: vibhīṣaṇenāśu jagāma saṃgamaṃ; patatrirājena yathā puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.001c: khāt papātāvaniṃ hṛṣṭo bhaktair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:013.002a: sa tu rāmasya dharmātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.003a: abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ vākyaṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.003c: dharmayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sāmprataṃ saṃpraharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:013.005a: parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:013.005c: bhavadgataṃ me rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca sukhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:013.006a: rākṣasānāṃ vadhe sāhyaṃ laṅkāyāś ca pradharṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:013.007a: iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmas tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:013.007c: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ prītaḥ samudrāj jalam ānaya
GE09ram_06_u:013.008c: rājānaṃ rakṣasāṃ kṣipraṃ prasanne mayi mānada
GE09ram_06_u:013.009a: evam uktas tu saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:013.010a: taṃ prasādaṃ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.010c: pracukruśur mahānādān sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE09ram_06_u:013.011a: abravīc ca hanūmāṃś ca sugrīvaś ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:013.013a: evam uktas tu dharmajñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.013c: samudraṃ rāghavo rājā śaraṇaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:013.014c: kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryaṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.016a: sa lakṣmaṇaṃ mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca harīśvaram
GE09ram_06_u:013.017c: brūhi tvaṃ sahasugrīvas tavāpi yadi rocate
GE09ram_06_u:013.018c: ubhābhyāṃ saṃpradhāryāryaṃ rocate yat tad ucyatām
GE09ram_06_u:013.019a: evam uktau tu tau vīrāv ubhau sugrīvalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:013.020a: kimarthaṃ no naravyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:013.020c: vibhīṣaṇena yat tūktam asmin kāle sukhāvaham
GE09ram_06_u:013.021c: laṅkā nāsādituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:013.023c: saṃviveśa tadā rāmo vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:014.002a: na ca darśayate mandas tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:014.004c: avalepaṃ samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam
GE09ram_06_u:014.005a: praśamaś ca kṣamā caiva ārjavaṃ priyavāditā
GE09ram_06_u:014.005c: asāmarthyaṃ phalanty ete nirguṇeṣu satāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:014.007a: na sāmnā śakyate kīrtir na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:014.007c: prāptuṃ lakṣmaṇa loke 'smiñ jayo vā raṇamūdhani
GE09ram_06_u:014.009a: mahābhogāni matsyānāṃ kariṇāṃ ca karān iha
GE09ram_06_u:014.009c: bhogāṃś ca paśya nāgānāṃ mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:014.011a: kṣamayā hi samāyuktaṃ mām ayaṃ makarālayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:014.011c: asamarthaṃ vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane
GE09ram_06_u:014.014c: babhūva rāmo durdharṣo yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_06_u:014.015a: saṃpīḍya ca dhanur ghoraṃ kampayitvā śarair jagat
GE09ram_06_u:015.001a: tato madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.001c: udayan hi mahāśailān meror iva divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.004a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.004c: svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvataṃ mārgam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.005a: tat svabhāvo mamāpy eṣa yad agādho 'ham aplavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.005c: vikāras tu bhaved rādha etat te pravadāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:015.006a: na kāmān na ca lobhād vā na bhayāt pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_06_u:015.007a: vidhāsye rāma yenāpi viṣahiṣye hy ahaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:015.007c: grāhā na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:015.008a: ayaṃ saumya nalo nāma tanujo viśvakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.009a: eṣa setuṃ mahotsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.009c: tam ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hy eṣa yathā pitā
GE09ram_06_u:015.010a: evam uktvodadhir naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.011c: pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.012a: mama mātur varo datto mandare viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:015.013a: na cāpy aham anukto vai prabrūyām ātmano guṇān
GE09ram_06_u:015.015c: babhañjur vānarās tatra pracakarṣuś ca sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:015.016a: te sālaiś cāśvakarṇaiś ca dhavair vaṃśaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.016c: kuṭajair arjunais tālais tikalais timiśair api
GE09ram_06_u:015.017a: bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.018a: samūlāṃś ca vimūlāṃś ca pādapān harisattamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.021c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tadā tasmin mahodadhau
GE09ram_06_u:015.022a: sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makarālaye
GE09ram_06_u:015.023a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.024a: āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.024c: tam acintyam asahyaṃ ca adbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:015.025c: badhnantaḥ sāgare setuṃ jagmuḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.028a: agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.029c: salile prapatanty anye mārgam anye na lebhire
GE09ram_06_u:015.029e: ke cid vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇā iva pupluvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.031a: vānarāṇāṃ hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā
GE09ram_06_u:015.032a: tad adbhutaṃ rāghava karma duṣkaraṃ; samīkṣya devāḥ saha siddhacāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.032c: upetya rāmaṃ sahitā maharṣibhiḥ; samabhyaṣiñcan suśubhair jalaiḥ pṛthak
GE09ram_06_u:015.033a: jayasva śatrūn naradeva medinīṃ; sasāgarāṃ pālaya śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:015.033c: itīva rāmaṃ naradevasatkṛtaṃ; śubhair vacobhir vividhair apūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:016.002a: samagraṃ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaṃ dustaraṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:016.003a: sāgare setubandhaṃ tu na śraddadhyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:016.003c: avaśyaṃ cāpi saṃkhyeyaṃ tan mayā vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:016.004c: parimāṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.005a: mantriṇo ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.005c: ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.006a: sa ca setur yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_06_u:016.006c: niveśaś ca yathā teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:016.007a: rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ ca vīryaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:016.007c: lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvato jñātum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:016.008a: kaś ca senāpatis teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_06_u:016.008c: etaj jñātvā yathātattvaṃ śīghram agantum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.010a: tatas tad vānaraṃ sainyam acintyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:016.011a: tat sthitaṃ parvatāgreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:016.012a: taramāṇaṃ ca tīrṇaṃ ca tartukāmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.013a: tau dadarśa mahātejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.014a: tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmaṃ nirāśau jīvite tadā
GE09ram_06_u:016.016a: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.017a: yadi dṛṣṭaṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vayaṃ vā susamīkṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.017c: yathoktaṃ vā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ chandataḥ pratigamyatām
GE09ram_06_u:016.018c: vaktavyo rakṣasāṃ rājā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:016.019a: yad balaṃ ca samāśritya sītāṃ me hṛtavān asi
GE09ram_06_u:016.020c: rākṣasaṃ ca balaṃ paśya śarair vidhvaṃsitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:016.021a: ghoraṃ roṣam ahaṃ mokṣye balaṃ dhāraya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:016.021c: śvaḥkāle vajravān vajraṃ dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.025a: rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃl lakṣmaṇaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.026a: ete śaktāḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām
GE09ram_06_u:016.027a: yādṛśaṃ tasya rāmasya rūpaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:016.027c: vadhiṣyati purīṃ laṅkām ekas tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:016.029a: prahṛṣṭarūpā dhvajinī vanaukasāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃprati yoddhum icchatām
GE09ram_06_u:016.029c: alaṃ virodhena śamo vidhīyatāṃ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:017.003a: tvaṃ tu saumya paritrasto haribhir nirjito bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:017.003e: ko hi nāma sapatno māṃ samare jetum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:017.004a: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.005c: paśyamānaḥ samudraṃ ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:017.006a: tad apāram asaṃkhyeyaṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:017.007a: eṣāṃ vānaramukhyānāṃ ke śūrāḥ ke mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.008a: keṣāṃ śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapayūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.008c: sāraṇācakṣva me sarvaṃ ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.009c: ācacakṣe 'tha mukhyajño mukhyāṃs tāṃs tu vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.010a: eṣa yo 'bhimukho laṅkāṃ nardaṃs tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.012c: balāgre tiṣṭhate vīro nīlo nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.013a: bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyāṃ mahīṃ gacchati vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:017.013c: laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ ca vijṛmbhate
GE09ram_06_u:017.014c: sphoṭayaty abhisaṃrabdho lāṅgūlaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.016a: ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:017.019c: buddhimān vānaraḥ śūras triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.020a: tūrṇaṃ sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.021a: yaḥ purā gomatītīre ramyaṃ paryeti parvatam
GE09ram_06_u:017.022a: tatra rājyaṃ praśāsty eṣa kumudo nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.023c: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.025a: yas tv eṣa siṃhasaṃkāśaḥ kapilo dīrghakesaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.025c: nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkāṃ didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:017.026a: vindhyaṃ kṛṣṇagiriṃ sahyaṃ parvataṃ ca sudarśanam
GE09ram_06_u:017.026c: rājan satatam adhyāste rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.028a: yas tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.028c: na ca saṃvijate mṛtyor na ca yūthād vidhāvati
GE09ram_06_u:017.029c: rājan satatam adhyāste śarabho nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.030a: etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārā nāma yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.031a: yas tu megha ivākāśaṃ mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:017.032a: bherīṇām iva saṃnādo yasyaiṣa śrūyate mahān
GE09ram_06_u:017.033c: yuddhe duṣprasaho nityaṃ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.035a: yas tu bhīmāṃ pravalgantīṃ camūṃ tiṣṭhati śobhayan
GE09ram_06_u:017.035c: sthitāṃ tīre samudrasya dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.036c: pibaṃś carati parṇāśāṃ nadīnām uttamāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_06_u:017.037c: tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.038a: yas tu gairikavarṇābhaṃ vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:017.038c: gavayo nāma tejasvī tvāṃ krodhād abhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:017.040c: yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhā yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:018.001a: tāṃs tu te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:018.001c: rāghavārthe parākrāntā ye na rakṣanti jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:018.002a: snigdhā yasya bahuśyāmā bālā lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.002c: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.006a: nīlān iva mahāmeghāṃs tiṣṭhato yāṃs tu paśyasi
GE09ram_06_u:018.008a: parvateṣu ca ye ke cid viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:018.008c: ete tvām abhivartante rājann ṛṣkāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.009a: eṣāṃ madhye sthito rājan bhīmākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.011a: yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśyainaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_06_u:018.011c: bhrātrā samāno rūpeṇa viśiṣṭas tu parākrame
GE09ram_06_u:018.013a: etena sāhyaṃ sumahat kṛtaṃ śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:018.013c: devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāś ca bahavo varāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.014c: muñcanti vipulākārā na mṛtyor udvijanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:018.015a: rākṣasānāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānāṃ ca romaśāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.016a: yaṃ tv enam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ plavamānam iva sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:018.018a: yaḥ sthitaṃ yojane śailaṃ gacchan pārśvena sevate
GE09ram_06_u:018.018c: ūrdhvaṃ tathaiva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam
GE09ram_06_u:018.019a: yasmān na paramaṃ rūpaṃ catuṣpādeṣu vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:018.020a: yena yuddhaṃ tadā dattaṃ raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:018.020c: parājayaś ca na prāptaḥ so 'yaṃ yūthapayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.023e: yuddheṣv akatthano nityaṃ krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.025a: yo gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hastiyūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:018.026c: harīṇāṃ vāhinī mukhyo nadīṃ haimavatīm anu
GE09ram_06_u:018.027c: ramate vānaraśreṣṭho divi śakra iva svayam
GE09ram_06_u:018.028c: eṣa durmarṣaṇo rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.033a: yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tadvarṇā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.033c: yasya prasthaṃ mahātmāno na tyajanti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.035c: teṣāṃ madhye girivaras tvam ivānagha rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:018.037a: siṃha iva caturdaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.039a: eṣa caiṣām adhipatir madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:018.039c: nāmnā pṛthivyāṃ vikhyāto rājañ śatabalīti yaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.040a: gajo gavākṣo gavayo nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.040c: ekaika eva yūthānāṃ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.041c: na śakyante bahutvāt tu saṃkhyātuṃ laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:018.042c: sarve samarthāḥ pṛthivīṃ kṣaṇena; kartuṃ pravidhvastavikīrṇaśailām
GE09ram_06_u:019.001c: balam ālokayan sarvaṃ śuko vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:019.002a: sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahādvipān
GE09ram_06_u:019.002c: nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva
GE09ram_06_u:019.004a: eṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi nava pañcaca sapta ca
GE09ram_06_u:019.006a: yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau devarūpiṇau
GE09ram_06_u:019.006c: maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau tābhyāṃ nāsti samo yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:019.007c: āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:019.008a: yāv etāv etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvatasaṃnibhau
GE09ram_06_u:019.008c: sumukho vimukhaś caiva mṛtyuputrau pituḥ samau
GE09ram_06_u:019.009a: yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:019.009c: yo balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.010a: eṣo 'bhigantā laṅkāyā vaidehyās tava ca prabho
GE09ram_06_u:019.010c: enaṃ paśya purā dṛṣṭaṃ vānaraṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:019.011a: jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putro vātātmaja iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.011c: hanūmān iti vikhyāto laṅghito yena sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.013a: udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.014a: ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣut pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_06_u:019.016a: patitasya kaper asya hanur ekā śilātale
GE09ram_06_u:019.016c: kiṃ cid bhinnā dṛḍhahanor hanūmān eṣa tena vai
GE09ram_06_u:019.017c: nāsya śakyaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ prabhāvo vānubhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:019.018a: eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkām eko marditum ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:019.019c: yasmin na calate dharmo yo dharmaṃ nātivartate
GE09ram_06_u:019.020a: yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.020c: yo bhindyād gaganaṃ bāṇaiḥ parvatāṃś cāpi dārayet
GE09ram_06_u:019.021a: yasya mṛtyor iva krodhaḥ śakrasyeva parākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.021c: sa eṣa rāmas tvāṃ yoddhuṃ rājan samabhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:019.023a: eṣo 'sya lakṣmaṇo nāma bhrātā prāṇasamaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.024a: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_06_u:019.024c: rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:019.025a: na hy eṣa rāghavasyārthe jīvitaṃ parirakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:019.026a: yas tu savyam asau pakṣaṃ rāmasyāśritya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:019.028a: yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ madhye girim ivācalam
GE09ram_06_u:019.029c: yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:019.032a: etāṃ ca mālāṃ tārāṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_06_u:019.033a: evaṃ koṭisahasreṇa śaṅkūnāṃ ca śatena ca
GE09ram_06_u:019.034c: tataḥ prayatnaḥ paramo vidhīyatāṃ; yathā jayaḥ syān na paraiḥ parājayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.001a: śukena tu samākhyātāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:020.001c: samīpasthaṃ ca rāmasya bhrātaraṃ svaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:020.002a: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ bhujaṃ rāmasya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:020.003a: kiṃ cid āvignahṛdayo jātakrodhaś ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.003c: bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathānte śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_06_u:020.005a: na tāvat sadṛśaṃ nāma sacivair upajīvibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.006c: ubhābhyāṃ sadṛśaṃ nāma vaktum aprastave stavam
GE09ram_06_u:020.007a: ācāryā guravo vṛddhā vṛthā vāṃ paryupāsitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.007c: sāraṃ yad rājaśāstrāṇām anujīvyaṃ na gṛhyate
GE09ram_06_u:020.008a: gṛhīto vā na vijñāto bhāro jñānasya vochyate
GE09ram_06_u:020.008c: īdṛśaiḥ sacivair yukto mūrkhair diṣṭyā dharāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:020.009a: kiṃ nu mṛtyor bhayaṃ nāsti māṃ vaktuṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.009c: yasya me śāsato jihvā prayacchati śubhāśubham
GE09ram_06_u:020.010a: apy eva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.011c: yadi pūrvopakārair me na krodho mṛdutāṃ vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:020.012c: na hi vāṃ hantum icchāmi smarann upakṛtāni vām
GE09ram_06_u:020.012e: hatāv eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi snehaparāṅmukhau
GE09ram_06_u:020.013a: evam uktau tu savrīḍau tāv ubhau śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_06_u:020.016a: tān abravīt tato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.017c: mantreṣv abhyantarā ye 'sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.018a: kathaṃ svapiti jāgarti kim anyac ca kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:020.020a: cārās tu te tathety uktvā prahṛṣṭā rākṣaseśvaram
GE09ram_06_u:020.020c: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ jagmur yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.022a: te tu dharmātmanā dṛṣṭā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.023a: vānarair arditās te tu vikrāntair laghuvikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.024a: tato daśagrīvam upasthitās te; cārā bahirnityacarā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:020.024c: gireḥ suvelasya samīpavāsinaṃ; nyavedayan bhīmabalaṃ mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.001a: tatas tam akṣobhya balaṃ laṅkādhipataye carāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.002a: cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:021.002c: jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cic chārdūlaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:021.003a: ayathāvac ca te varṇo dīnaś cāsi niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:021.003c: nāsi kaccid amitrāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.004a: iti tenānuśiṣṭas tu vācaṃ mandam udīrayat
GE09ram_06_u:021.005a: na te cārayituṃ śakyā rājan vānarapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.005c: vikrāntā balavantaś ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.006a: nāpi saṃbhāṣituṃ śakyāḥ saṃpraśno 'tra na labhyate
GE09ram_06_u:021.008a: jānubhir muṣṭibhir dantais talaiś cābhihato bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:021.011a: eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiś ca pūrayitvā mahārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:021.011c: dvāram āśritya laṅkāyā rāmas tiṣṭhati sāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.013a: purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataraṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:021.013c: sītāṃ cāsmai prayacchāśu suyuddhaṃ vā pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:021.014c: śārdūlasya mahad vākyam athovāca sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.016a: evam uktvā mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:021.016c: cāritā bhavatā senā ke 'tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.017a: kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāś ca vānarā ye durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.017c: kasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tattvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:021.018a: tatr atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣāṃ balābalam
GE09ram_06_u:021.021c: kadanaṃ yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:021.022a: suṣeṇaś cāpi dharmātmā putro dharmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:021.022c: saumyaḥ somātmajaś cātra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.023a: sumukho durmukhaś cātra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.024c: anilasya ca putro 'tra hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.025a: naptā śakrasya durdharṣo balavān aṅgado yuvā
GE09ram_06_u:021.025c: maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau balināv aśvisaṃbhavau
GE09ram_06_u:021.030c: dūṣaṇo nihato yena kharaś ca triśirās tathā
GE09ram_06_u:021.031a: nāsti rāmasya sadṛśo vikrame bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_06_u:021.032a: vaktuṃ na śakto rāmasya naraḥ kaś cid guṇān kṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:021.033c: yasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya na jīved api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.034a: rākṣasānāṃ variṣṭhaś ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.034c: parigṛhya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāghavasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:021.035a: iti sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ tavedaṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:022.001a: tatas tam akṣobhyabalaṃ laṅkāyāṃ nṛpateś caraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.002a: cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:022.002c: jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cit sacivāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:022.003a: mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.003c: ayaṃ no mantrakālo hi saṃprāpta iva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.004a: tasya tac chāsanaṃ śrutvā mantriṇo 'bhyāgaman drutam
GE09ram_06_u:022.004c: tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa sacivai rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:022.005a: mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamaṃ yat samanantaram
GE09ram_06_u:022.008c: māṃ tvaṃ samupatiṣṭhasva mahac ca saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.009a: evam uktas tathety āha vidyujjihvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.009c: tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:022.012a: upasṛtya tataḥ sītāṃ praharṣan nāma kīrtayan
GE09ram_06_u:022.012c: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:022.013a: sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase
GE09ram_06_u:022.013c: khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.014a: chinnaṃ te sarvato mūlaṃ darpas te nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:022.015c: śṛṇu bhartṛbadhaṃ sīte ghoraṃ vṛtravadhaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:022.016a: samāyātaḥ samudrāntaṃ māṃ hantuṃ kila rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.017c: balena mahatā rāmo vrajaty astaṃ divākare
GE09ram_06_u:022.019c: balam asya hataṃ rātrau yatra rāmaḥ sulakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.020a: paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgāṃś cakrān daṇḍān mahāyasān
GE09ram_06_u:022.021a: yaṣṭīś ca tomarān prāsaṃś cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:022.023c: diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvair lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:022.025a: jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihato yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:022.025c: paṭṭasair bahubhiś chinno nikṛttaḥ pādapo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:022.026a: maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau nihatau vānararṣabhau
GE09ram_06_u:022.028a: nārācair bahubhiś chinnaḥ śete daryāṃ darīmukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.028c: kumudas tu mahātejā niṣkūjan sāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.029a: aṅgado bahubhiś chinnaḥ śarair āsādya rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.031a: pradrutāś ca pare trastā hanyamānā jaghanyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.031c: abhidrutās tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhair iva mahādvipāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.032a: sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.032c: ṛkṣā vṛkṣān upārūḍhā vānarais tu vimiśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.033a: sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:022.033c: piṅgākṣās te virūpākṣair bahubhir bahavo hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.034a: evaṃ tava hato bhartā sasainyo mama senayā
GE09ram_06_u:022.036c: yena tad rāghavaśiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:022.037a: vidyujjihvas tato gṛhya śiras tat saśarāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:022.038a: tam abravīt tato rājā rāvaṇo rākṣasaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:022.039a: agrataḥ kuru sītāyāḥ śīghraṃ dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.039c: avasthāṃ paścimāṃ bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu
GE09ram_06_u:022.040a: evam uktaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ śiras tat priyadarśanam
GE09ram_06_u:022.041a: rāvaṇaś cāpi cikṣepa bhāsvaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:022.041c: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:022.042a: idaṃ tat tava rāmasya kārmukaṃ jyāsamanvitam
GE09ram_06_u:022.042c: iha prahastenānītaṃ hatvā taṃ niśi mānuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:022.043a: sa vidyujjihvena sahaiva tac chiro; dhanuś ca bhūmau vinikīrya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:022.043c: videharājasya sutāṃ yaśasvinīṃ; tato 'bravīt tāṃ bhava me vaśānugā
GE09ram_06_u:023.001a: sā sītā tac chiro dṛṣṭvā tac ca kārmukam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:023.002a: nayane mukhavarṇaṃ ca bhartus tat sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_06_u:023.002c: keśān keśāntadeśaṃ ca taṃ ca cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:023.005a: āryeṇa kiṃ nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa vipriyam
GE09ram_06_u:023.005c: yad gṛhāc cīravasanas tayā prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_06_u:023.006a: evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:023.006c: jagāma jagatīṃ bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā
GE09ram_06_u:023.007a: sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE09ram_06_u:023.008c: imāṃ te paścimāvasthāṃ gatāsmi vidhavā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:023.009a: prathamaṃ maraṇaṃ nāryā bhartur vaiguṇyam ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:023.010c: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'pi tvaṃ vinipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.011a: sā śvaśrūr mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:023.011c: vatseneva yathā dhenur vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:023.012a: ādiṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyus te yair acintyaparākrama
GE09ram_06_u:023.012c: anṛtaṃ vacanaṃ teṣām alpāyur asi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:023.013a: atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi satas tava
GE09ram_06_u:023.013c: pacaty enaṃ tathā kālo bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hy ayam
GE09ram_06_u:023.014a: adṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ nayaśāstravit
GE09ram_06_u:023.014c: vyasanānām upāyajñaḥ kuśalo hy asi varjane
GE09ram_06_u:023.017a: arcitaṃ satataṃ yatnād gandhamālyair mayā tava
GE09ram_06_u:023.017c: idaṃ te matpriyaṃ vīra dhanuḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:023.018c: pūrvaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nūnaṃ svarge samāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.019a: divi nakṣatrabhūtas tvaṃ mahat karma kṛtaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:023.020a: kiṃ mān na prekṣase rājan kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:023.020c: bālāṃ bālena saṃprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ māṃ sahacāriṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:023.021a: saṃśrutaṃ gṛhṇatā pāṇiṃ cariṣyāmīti yat tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:023.021c: smara tan mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām
GE09ram_06_u:023.022a: kasmān mām apahāya tvaṃ gato gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:023.022c: asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām
GE09ram_06_u:023.023a: kalyāṇair ucitaṃ yat tat pariṣvaktaṃ mayaiva tu
GE09ram_06_u:023.023c: kravyādais tac charīraṃ te nūnaṃ viparikṛṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:023.024c: agnihotreṇa saṃskāraṃ kena tvaṃ tu na lapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:023.026a: sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyā vadhaṃ mitrabalasya te
GE09ram_06_u:023.026c: tava cākhyāsyate nūnaṃ niśāyāṃ rākṣasair vadham
GE09ram_06_u:023.027a: sā tvāṃ suptaṃ hataṃ śrutvā māṃ ca rakṣogṛhaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:023.028a: sādhu pātaya māṃ kṣipraṃ rāmasyopari rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.028c: samānaya patiṃ patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:023.029a: śirasā me śiraś cāsya kāyaṃ kāyena yojaya
GE09ram_06_u:023.030a: śrutaṃ mayā vedavidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pitur gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:023.030c: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.031a: kṣamā yasmin damas tyāgaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtajñatā
GE09ram_06_u:023.031c: ahiṃsā caiva bhūtānāṃ tam ṛte kā gatir mama
GE09ram_06_u:023.032c: bhartuḥ śiro dhanus tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā
GE09ram_06_u:023.035c: kiṃ cid ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ tvaṃ darśanaṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:023.037a: sa tu sarvaṃ samarthyaiva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.038a: antardhānaṃ tu tac chīrṣaṃ tac ca kārmukam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:023.039a: rākṣasendras tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:023.041c: samānayadhvaṃ sainyāni vaktavyaṃ ca na kāraṇam
GE09ram_06_u:023.042a: tatas tatheti pratigṛhya tad vaco; balādhipās te mahad ātmano balam
GE09ram_06_u:023.042c: samānayaṃś caiva samāgataṃ ca te; nyavedayan bhartari yuddhakāṅkṣiṇi
GE09ram_06_u:024.001a: sītāṃ tu mohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_06_u:024.002a: sā hi tatra kṛtā mitraṃ sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā
GE09ram_06_u:024.003a: sā dadarśa sakhīṃ sītāṃ saramā naṣṭacetanām
GE09ram_06_u:024.004a: tāṃ samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā
GE09ram_06_u:024.004c: uktā yad rāvaṇena tvaṃ pratyuktaṃ ca svayaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:024.005a: sakhīsnehena tad bhīru mayā sarvaṃ pratiśrutam
GE09ram_06_u:024.005c: līnayā ganahe śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:024.005e: tava hetor viśālākṣi na hi me jīvitaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:024.006a: sa saṃbhrāntaś ca niṣkrānto yat kṛte rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.006c: tac ca me viditaṃ sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili
GE09ram_06_u:024.007a: na śakyaṃ sauptikaṃ kartuṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.008a: na caiva vānarā hantuṃ śakyāḥ pādapayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.010a: vikrānto rakṣitā nityam ātmanaś ca parasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:024.011c: na hato rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.012c: iyaṃ prayuktā raudreṇa māyā māyāvidā tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:024.013a: śokas te vigataḥ sarvaḥ kalyāṇaṃ tvām upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:024.013c: dhruvaṃ tvāṃ bhajate lakṣmīḥ priyaṃ prītikaraṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:024.016a: anena preṣitā ye ca rākṣasā laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.016c: rāghavas tīrṇa ity evaṃ pravṛttis tair ihāhṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:024.017a: sa tāṃ śrutvā viśālākṣi pravṛttiṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.017c: eṣa mantrayate sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.018a: iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:024.020a: saṃnāhajananī hy eṣā bhairavā bhīru bherikā
GE09ram_06_u:024.021c: tatra tatra ca saṃnaddhāḥ saṃpatanti padātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.022c: vegavadbhir nadadbhiś ca toyaughair iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.023a: śāstrāṇāṃ ca prasannānāṃ carmaṇāṃ varmaṇāṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:024.025a: ghaṇṭānāṃ śṛṇu nirghoṣaṃ rathānāṃ śṛṇu nisvanam
GE09ram_06_u:024.027a: śrīs tvāṃ bhajati śokaghnī rakṣasāṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:024.029c: yathā śatruṣu śatrughno viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.030a: āgatasya hi rāmasya kṣipram aṅkagatāṃ satīm
GE09ram_06_u:024.030c: ahaṃ drakṣyāmi siddhārthāṃ tvāṃ śatrau vinipātite
GE09ram_06_u:024.032a: acirān mokṣyate sīte devi te jaghanaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:024.032c: dhṛtām etāṃ bahūn māsān veṇīṃ rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:024.033a: tasya dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ devi pūrṇacandram ivoditam
GE09ram_06_u:024.033c: mokṣyase śokajaṃ vāri nirmokam iva pannagī
GE09ram_06_u:024.034a: rāvaṇaṃ samare hatvā nacirād eva maithili
GE09ram_06_u:024.034c: tvayā samagraṃ priyayā sukhārho lapsyate sukham
GE09ram_06_u:024.036a: girivaram abhito 'nuvartamāno; haya iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti
GE09ram_06_u:024.036c: tam iha śaraṇam abhyupehi devi; divasakaraṃ prabhavo hy ayaṃ prajānām
GE09ram_06_u:025.001a: atha tāṃ jātasaṃtāpāṃ tena vākyena mohitām
GE09ram_06_u:025.001c: saramā hlādayām āsa pṛtivīṃ dyaur ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_06_u:025.002a: tatas tasyā hitaṃ sakhyāś cikīrṣantī sakhī vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.004a: na hi me kramamāṇāyā nirālambe vihāyasi
GE09ram_06_u:025.004c: samartho gatim anvetuṃ pavano garuḍo 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:025.005a: evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ sītā saramāṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:025.006a: samarthā gaganaṃ gantum api vā tvaṃ rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:025.007a: matpriyaṃ yadi kartavyaṃ yadi buddhiḥ sthirā tava
GE09ram_06_u:025.007c: jñātum icchāmi taṃ gatvā kiṃ karotīti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.008a: sa hi māyābalaḥ krūro rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.009c: rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir yā māṃ rakṣanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.010a: udvignā śaṅkitā cāsmi na ca svasthaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_06_u:025.010c: tad bhayāc cāham udvignā aśokavanikāṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.011a: yadi nāma kathā tasya niścitaṃ vāpi yad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:025.011c: nivedayethāḥ sarvaṃ tat paro me syād anugrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.012a: sā tv evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ saramā valgubhāṣiṇī
GE09ram_06_u:025.013a: eṣa te yady abhiprāyas tasmād gacchāmi jānaki
GE09ram_06_u:025.013c: gṛhya śatror abhiprāyam upāvṛttāṃ ca paśya mām
GE09ram_06_u:025.014a: evam uktvā tato gatvā samīpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.015a: sā śrutvā niścayaṃ tasya niścayajñā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.016a: sā praviṣṭā punas tatra dadarśa janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:025.016c: pratīkṣamāṇāṃ svām eva bhraṣṭapadmām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:025.017a: tāṃ tu sītā punaḥ prāptāṃ saramāṃ valgubhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:025.017c: pariṣvajya ca susnigdhaṃ dadau ca svayam āsanam
GE09ram_06_u:025.018a: ihāsīnā sukhaṃ sarvam ākhyāhi mama tattvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.019a: evam uktā tu saramā sītayā vepamānayā
GE09ram_06_u:025.021c: nidarśanaṃ te paryāptaṃ janasthāne yad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:025.022a: laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya darśanaṃ ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.022c: vadhaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryān mānuṣo bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:025.023a: evaṃ sa mantrivṛddhaiś ca mātrā ca bahu bhāṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.023c: na tvām utsahate moktum artahm arthaparo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:025.024a: notsahaty amṛto moktuṃ yuddhe tvām iti maithili
GE09ram_06_u:025.024c: sāmātyasya nṛśaṃsasya niścayo hy eṣa vartate
GE09ram_06_u:025.025a: tad eṣā susthirā buddhir mṛtyulobhād upasthitā
GE09ram_06_u:025.025c: bhayān na śaktas tvāṃ moktum anirastas tu saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:025.025e: rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣām ātmanaś ca vadhena hi
GE09ram_06_u:025.026a: nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.028a: śrutvā tu taṃ vānarasainyaśabdaṃ; laṅkāgatā rākṣasarājabhṛtyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:025.028c: naṣṭaujaso dainyaparītaceṣṭāḥ; śreyo na paśyanti nṛpasya doṣaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.003a: atha tān sacivāṃs tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.003c: sabhāṃ saṃnādayan sarvām ity uvāca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.004c: yad uktavanto rāmasya bhavantas tan mayā śrutam
GE09ram_06_u:026.004e: bhavataś cāpy ahaṃ vedmi yuddhe satyaparākramān
GE09ram_06_u:026.005a: tatas tu sumahāprājño mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.006a: vidyāsv abhivinīto yo rājā rājan nayānugaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.006c: sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīṃś ca kurute vaśe
GE09ram_06_u:026.007a: saṃdadhāno hi kālena vigṛhṇaṃś cāribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:026.008a: hīyamānena kartavyo rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca
GE09ram_06_u:026.008c: na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham
GE09ram_06_u:026.009a: tan mahyaṃ rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:026.009c: yadartham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:026.010a: tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.010c: virodhaṃ mā gamas tena saṃdhis te tena rocatām
GE09ram_06_u:026.011a: asṛjad bhagavān pakṣau dvāv eva hi pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.012a: dharmo hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:026.012c: adharmo rakṣasaṃ pakṣo hy asurāṇāṃ ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:026.013a: dharmo vai grasate 'dharmaṃ tataḥ kṛtam abhūd yugam
GE09ram_06_u:026.013c: adharmo grasate dharmaṃ tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_06_u:026.014a: tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmo vinihato mahān
GE09ram_06_u:026.015a: sa pramādād vivṛddhas te 'dharmo 'hir grasate hi naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.016e: teṣāṃ prabhāvo durdharṣaḥ pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.017c: mukhyair yajñair yajanty ete nityaṃ tais tair dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.018a: juhvaty agnīṃś ca vidhivad vedāṃś coccair adhīyate
GE09ram_06_u:026.019c: ādatte rakṣasāṃ tejo dhūmo vyāpya diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:026.020a: teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍhavrataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.021a: utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhāṃs tathā
GE09ram_06_u:026.023c: dhvajā dhvastā vivarṇāś ca na prabhānti yathāpuram
GE09ram_06_u:026.024a: vyālā gomāyavo gṛdhrā vāśanti ca subhairavam
GE09ram_06_u:026.024c: praviśya laṅkām aniśaṃ samavāyāṃś ca kurvate
GE09ram_06_u:026.025a: kālikāḥ pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ prahasanty agrataḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.025c: striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyo gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:026.026c: kharā goṣu prajāyante mūṣikā nakulaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:026.027a: mārjārā dvīpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:026.027c: kiṃnarā rākṣasaiś cāpi sameyur mānuṣaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:026.029a: cīkī kūcīti vāśantyaḥ śārikā veśmasu sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.030e: etāny anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāny utpatanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:026.031a: viṣṇuṃ manyāmahe rāmaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_06_u:026.032a: yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ paramādbhutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.033a: idaṃ vacas tatra nigadya mālyavan; parīkṣya rakṣo'dhipater manaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:026.033c: anuttameṣūttamapauruṣo balī; babhūva tūṣṇīṃ samavekṣya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:027.001a: tat tu mālyavato vākyaṃ hitam uktaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.001c: na marṣayati duṣṭātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.002a: sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.003a: hitabuddhyā yad ahitaṃ vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:027.004c: samarthaṃ manyase kena tyaktaṃ pitrā vanālayam
GE09ram_06_u:027.005a: rakṣasām īśvaraṃ māṃ ca devatānāṃ bhayaṃkaram
GE09ram_06_u:027.005c: hīnaṃ māṃ manyase kena ahīnaṃ sarvavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.006a: vīradveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.008a: ānīya ca vanāt sītāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:027.009c: paśya kaiś cid ahobhis tvaṃ rāghavaṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:027.010a: dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāny api saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:027.010c: sa kasmād rāvaṇo yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:027.011a: dvidhā bhajyeyam apy evaṃ na nameyaṃ tu kasya cit
GE09ram_06_u:027.011c: eṣa me sahajo doṣaḥ svabhāvo duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.012a: yadi tāvat samudre tu setur baddho yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_06_u:027.012c: rāmeṇa vismayaḥ ko 'tra yena te bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:027.013a: sa tu tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā
GE09ram_06_u:027.013c: pratijānāmi te satyaṃ na jīvan pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_06_u:027.014a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ ruṣṭaṃ vijñāya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:027.016a: rāvaṇas tu sahāmātyo mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:027.016c: laṅkāyām atulāṃ guptiṃ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:027.017a: vyādideśa ca pūrvasyāṃ prahastaṃ dvāri rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:027.018a: paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:027.019c: svayaṃ cātra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇas tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:027.022a: visarjayām āsa tataḥ sa mantriṇo; vidhānam ājñāpya purasya puṣkalam
GE09ram_06_u:027.022c: jayāśiṣā mantragaṇena pūjito; viveśa so 'ntaḥpuram ṛddhiman mahat
GE09ram_06_u:028.001a: naravānararājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.001c: jāmbavān ṛkṣarājaś ca rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.002a: aṅgado vāliputraś ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.002c: suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:028.003a: gajo gavākṣo kumudo nalo 'tha panasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:028.004a: iyaṃ sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇapālitā
GE09ram_06_u:028.005c: nityaṃ saṃnihito hy atra rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.007a: analaḥ śarabhaś caiva saṃpātiḥ praghasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:028.007c: gatvā laṅkāṃ mamāmātyāḥ purīṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.008a: bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāś ca ripor balam
GE09ram_06_u:028.008c: vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ yac ca tad dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.009c: rāma tad bruvataḥ sarvaṃ yathātathyena me śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:028.010a: pūrvaṃ prahastaḥ sabalo dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:028.014c: balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.015a: etān evaṃvidhān gulmāṃl laṅkāyāṃ samudīkṣya te
GE09ram_06_u:028.015c: māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghraṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.016a: gajānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca rathānām ayutaṃ pure
GE09ram_06_u:028.016c: hayānām ayute dve ca sāgrakoṭī ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:028.020a: kuberaṃ tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:028.022a: atra manyur na kartavyo roṣaye tvāṃ na bhīṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:028.022c: samartho hy asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_06_u:028.023a: tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.025c: prahastaṃ pratiyoddhā syād vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.026a: aṅgado vāliputras tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.029a: parikrāmati yaḥ sarvāṃl lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.029c: tasyāhaṃ rākṣasendrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.031a: vānarendraś ca balavān ṛkṣarājaś ca jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:028.032a: na caiva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ kāryaṃ haribhir āhave
GE09ram_06_u:028.032c: eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe 'smin vānare bale
GE09ram_06_u:028.033c: vayaṃ tu mānuṣeṇaiva sapta yotsyāmahe parān
GE09ram_06_u:028.034a: aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahaujasā
GE09ram_06_u:028.034c: ātmanā pañcamaś cāyaṃ sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:028.035a: sa rāmaḥ kāryasiddhyartham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:028.036a: tatas tu rāmo mahatā balena; pracchādya sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:028.036c: prahṛṣṭarūpo 'bhijagāma laṅkāṃ; kṛtvā matiṃ so 'rivadhe mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:029.001a: sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:029.002c: mantrajñaṃ ca vidhijñaṃ ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā
GE09ram_06_u:029.003a: suvelaṃ sādhu śailendram imaṃ dhātuśataiś citam
GE09ram_06_u:029.004c: yena me maraṇāntāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:029.005a: yena dharmo na vijñāto na vṛttaṃ na kulaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:029.005c: rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tad garhitaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:029.006a: yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasādhame
GE09ram_06_u:029.007a: eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.008a: evaṃ saṃmantrayann eva sakrodho rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:029.009c: saśaraṃ cāpam udyamya sumahad vikrame rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.010c: hanūmān aṅgado nīlo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:029.011c: panasaḥ kumudaś caiva haro rambhaś ca yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.012a: ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.013a: te tv adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.013c: dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm
GE09ram_06_u:029.015c: dadṛśus te hariśreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:029.016a: te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.016c: mumucur vipulān nādāṃs tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.018a: tataḥ sa rāmo harivāhinīpatir; vibhīṣaṇena pratinandya satkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:029.018c: salakṣmaṇo yūthapayūthasaṃvṛtaḥ; suvela pṛṣṭhe nyavasad yathāsukham
GE09ram_06_u:030.001a: tāṃ rātrim uṣitās tatra suvele haripuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.001c: laṅkāyāṃ dadṛśur vīrā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:030.004a: hintālair arjunair nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.004c: tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca paṭālaiś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.006c: śādvalaiś ca tathā nīlaiś citrābhir vanarājibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.007a: gandhāḍhyāny abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:030.012a: viviśus te tatas tāni vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:030.014a: anye tu harivīrāṇāṃ yūthān niṣkramya yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.015c: kampayantaś ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ nādaiḥ svair nadatāṃ varāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.017a: ṛkṣāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇā mṛgāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.017c: tena śabdena vitrastā jagmur bhītā diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:030.018a: śikharaṃ tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu caikaṃ divispṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:030.019c: ślakṣṇaṃ śrīman mahac caiva duṣprāpaṃ śakunair api
GE09ram_06_u:030.020a: manasāpi durārohaṃ kiṃ punaḥ karmaṇā janaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.021c: kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā
GE09ram_06_u:030.022a: prāsādaiś ca vimānaiś ca laṅkā paramabhūṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:030.024c: śatena rakṣasāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:030.025c: rāvaṇasya purīṃ rāmo dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:030.026a: tāṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ bahusaṃvidhānāṃ; prāsādamālābhir alaṃkṛtāṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:030.026c: purīṃ mahāyantrakavāṭamukhyāṃ; dadarśa rāmo mahatā balena
GE09ram_06_u:031.004a: vātāś ca paruṣaṃ vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:031.006c: jvalac ca nipataty etad ādityād agnimaṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:031.010a: dṛśyante na yathāvac ca nakṣatrāṇy abhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:031.010c: yugāntam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati
GE09ram_06_u:031.011a: kākāḥ śyenās tathā gṛdhrā nīcaiḥ paripatanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:031.011c: śivāś cāpy aśivā vācaḥ pravadanti mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.013a: ity evaṃ tu vadan vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.014a: avatīrya tu dharmātmā tasmāc chailāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.016a: tataḥ kāle mahābāhur balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.016c: prasthitaḥ purato dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:031.017a: taṃ vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.017c: ṛkṣarājas tathā nīlo lakṣmaṇaś cānyayus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:031.018c: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:031.020a: tau tv adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:031.023c: rāmaḥ sahānujo dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca
GE09ram_06_u:031.025c: nānyo rāmād dhi tad dvāraṃ samarthaḥ parirakṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:031.027a: vinyastāni ca yodhānāṃ bahūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:031.028a: pūrvaṃ tu dvāram āsādya nīlo haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.028c: atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:031.030c: pramāthi praghasābhyāṃ ca vīrair anyaiś ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.031a: madhyame ca svayaṃ gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_06_u:031.033c: dvāre dvāre harīṇāṃ tu koṭiṃ koṭiṃ nyaveśayat
GE09ram_06_u:031.034a: paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:031.035a: te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śārdūlā iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.037a: daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.038a: santi caughā balāḥ ke cit ke cic chataguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.039a: adbhutaś ca vicitraś ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.040c: laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiś ca saṃpatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.041c: laṅkā dvārāṇy upājagmur anye yoddhuṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.042a: āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvais taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.042c: ayutānāṃ sahasraṃ ca purīṃ tām abhyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:031.048a: rāghavaḥ saṃniveśyaivaṃ sainyaṃ svaṃ rakṣasāṃ vadhe
GE09ram_06_u:031.048c: saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.050a: gatvā saumya daśagrīvaṃ brūhi madvacanāt kape
GE09ram_06_u:031.050c: laṅghayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ bhayaṃ tyaktvā gatavyathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.052a: nāgānām atha yakṣāṇāṃ rājñāṃ ca rajanīcara
GE09ram_06_u:031.052c: yac ca pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mohād avaliptena rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:031.053a: nūnam adya gato darpaḥ svayambhū varadānajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.054a: padavīṃ devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:031.054c: rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṇāṃ gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.055a: balena yena vai sītāṃ māyayā rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_06_u:031.055c: mām atikrāmayitvā tvaṃ hṛtavāṃs tad vidarśaya
GE09ram_06_u:031.056a: arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.056c: na cec charaṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:031.057c: laṅkaiśvaryaṃ dhruvaṃ śrīmān ayaṃ prāpnoty akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_06_u:031.058a: na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktuṃ kṣaṇam api tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:031.059a: yudhyasva vā dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:031.059c: maccharais tvaṃ raṇe śāntas tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:031.060a: yady āviśasi lokāṃs trīn pakṣibhūto manojavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.060c: mama cakṣuṣpathaṃ prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:031.061a: bravīmi tvāṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aurdhvadekikam
GE09ram_06_u:031.061c: sudṛṣṭā kriyatāṃ laṅkā jīvitaṃ te mayi sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:031.062a: ity uktaḥ sa tu tāreyo rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:031.066c: vāliputro 'ṅgado nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.068c: nirudvignās trayo lokā bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:031.069c: śatrum adyoddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kaṇṭakam
GE09ram_06_u:031.070c: na cet satkṛtya vaidehīṃ praṇipatya pradāsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:031.071a: ity evaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇe haripuṃgave
GE09ram_06_u:031.072a: tataḥ sa roṣatāmrākṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivāṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:031.072c: gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhā vadhyatām iti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_06_u:031.073c: jagṛhus taṃ tato ghorāś catvāro rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.074a: grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:031.075a: sa tān bāhudvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva
GE09ram_06_u:031.079a: rāvaṇas tu paraṃ cakre krodhaṃ prāsādadharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:031.080a: rāmas tu bahubhir hṛṣṭair ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:031.084a: rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmus trāsaṃ jagmus tathāpare
GE09ram_06_u:031.086c: pragṛhya rakṣāṃsi mahāyudhāni; yugāntavātā iva saṃviceruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.001a: tatas te rākṣasās tatra gatvā rāvaṇamandiram
GE09ram_06_u:032.001c: nyavedayan purīṃ ruddhāṃ rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.002a: ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ śrutvā jātakrodho niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.004a: sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvāṃ vasudhāṃ kavalīkṛtām
GE09ram_06_u:032.005a: sa cintayitvā suciraṃ dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.008a: te drumaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.009c: pāṃsubhiḥ parvatāgraiś ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.010a: tataḥ sahasrayūthāś ca koṭiyūthāś ca yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.012a: āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.013a: jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.014a: ity evaṃ ghoṣayantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.015a: vīrabāhuḥ subāhuś ca nalaś ca vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.017a: pūrvadvāraṃ tu kumudaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.018c: āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.019a: suṣeṇaḥ paścimadvāraṃ gatas tārā pitā hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.019c: āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.020c: āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.021c: vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.022c: vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.023c: vṛto yas tais tu sacivais tasthau tatra mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.027c: rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca yathā devāsure purā
GE09ram_06_u:032.029a: tathā vṛkṣair mahākāyāḥ parvatāgraiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.029c: rākṣasās tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhair dantaiś ca vegitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:032.030a: rākṣasās tv apare bhīmāḥ prākārasthā mahīgatān
GE09ram_06_u:032.030c: bhiṇḍipālaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca śūlaiś caiva vyadārayan
GE09ram_06_u:033.001a: yudhyatāṃ tu tatas teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:033.004a: vānarāṇām api camūr mahatī jayam iccatām
GE09ram_06_u:033.007a: prajaṅghena ca saṃpātir nityaṃ durmarṣaṇo raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:033.011a: agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.011c: suptaghno yajñakopaś ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.014a: dharmasya putro balavān suṣeṇa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.015a: vānarāś cāpare bhīmā rākṣasair aparaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:033.015c: dvandvaṃ samīyur bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:033.016c: rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām
GE09ram_06_u:033.019c: jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgado vegavān kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.020a: saṃpātis tu tribhir bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.022a: tasya taṃ ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.026a: agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.026c: suptighno yajñakopaś ca rāmaṃ nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.027a: teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāmas tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.028a: vajramuṣṭis tu maindena muṣṭinā nihato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:033.028c: papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale
GE09ram_06_u:033.032c: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ karair megham ivāṃśumān
GE09ram_06_u:033.033c: bibheda samare nīlaṃ nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca
GE09ram_06_u:033.034c: śiraś ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.035c: suṣeṇaṃ tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.036a: taṃ rathastham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇo vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.037c: apakramya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāpāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.040c: tāṃ śilāṃ pātayām āsa tasyorasi mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:033.042a: evaṃ tair vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrās te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.042c: dvandve vimṛditās tatra daityā iva divaukasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.043a: bhallaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomara paṭṭasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:033.043c: apaviddhaś ca bhinnaś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.001a: yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:034.001c: ravir astaṃ gato rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇahāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:034.003c: anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_06_u:034.004a: jahi dāraya caitīti kathaṃ vidravasīti ca
GE09ram_06_u:034.004c: evaṃ sutumulaḥ śabdas tasmiṃs tamasi śuśruve
GE09ram_06_u:034.008c: cakarṣuś ca dadaṃśuś ca daśanaiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.009a: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmaś ca śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.016a: tatas te rākṣasās tatra tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_06_u:034.017c: udvarta iva saptānāṃ samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.018a: teṣāṃ rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ jaghāna niśācarān
GE09ram_06_u:034.020a: te tu rāmeṇa bāṇaughaḥ sarvamarmasu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.021c: diśaś cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.022a: ye tv anye rākṣasā vīrā rāmasyābhimukhe sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.022c: te 'pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:034.023c: babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotair iva śāradī
GE09ram_06_u:034.024a: rākṣasānāṃ ca ninadair harīṇāṃ cāpi garjitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.024c: sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyo ghoratarā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:034.027a: aṅgadas tu raṇe śatruṃ nihantuṃ samupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.027c: rāvaṇer nijaghānāśu sārathiṃ ca hayān api
GE09ram_06_u:034.028a: indrajit tu rathaṃ tyaktvā hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:034.030a: sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva ghorair nāgamayaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.001a: sa tasya gatim anvicchan rājaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_06_u:035.002a: dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlaṃ ca plavagarṣabham
GE09ram_06_u:035.002c: aṅgadaṃ vāliputraṃ ca śarabhaṃ ca tarasvinam
GE09ram_06_u:035.004a: te saṃprahṛṣṭā harayo bhīmān udyamya pādapān
GE09ram_06_u:035.004c: ākāśaṃ viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇā diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:035.006c: andhakāre na dadṛśur meghaiḥ sūryam ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:035.009c: tāv ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
GE09ram_06_u:035.011c: draṣṭum āsādituṃ vāpi na śaktaḥ kiṃ punar yuvām
GE09ram_06_u:035.013a: evam uktvā tu dharmajñau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:035.013c: nirbibheda śitair bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:035.014c: bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarān ghorān visasarja mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:035.015a: tato marmasu marmajño majjayan niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:035.015c: rāmalakṣmaṇayor vīro nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.016a: baddhau tu śarabandhena tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:035.020a: na hy aviddhaṃ tayor gātraṃ babhūvāṅgulam antaram
GE09ram_06_u:035.020c: nānirbhinnaṃ na cāstabdham ā karāgrād ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.021a: tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_06_u:035.022a: papāta prathamaṃ rāmo viddho marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.022c: krodhād indrajitā yena purā śakro vinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.023c: vivyādha vatsadantaiś ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣurais tathā
GE09ram_06_u:035.024a: sa vīraśayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:035.025c: sa tatra lakṣmaṇo dṛṣṭvā nirāśo jīvite 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:035.026a: baddhau tu vīrau patitau śayānau; tau vānarāḥ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:035.026c: samāgatā vāyusutapramukhyā; viṣadam ārtāḥ paramaṃ ca jagmuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.001a: tato dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva vīkṣamāṇā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.008a: antarikṣaṃ nirīkṣanto diśaḥ sarvāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.008c: na cainaṃ māyayā channaṃ dadṛśū rāvaṇiṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:036.011a: indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:036.012a: dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:036.014c: aspṛṣṭvā śayanaṃ gātrais triyāmā yāti śarvatī
GE09ram_06_u:036.015a: kṛtsneyaṃ yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsv ivākulā
GE09ram_06_u:036.016c: vikramā niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.017a: evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśvagān
GE09ram_06_u:036.017c: yūthapān api tān sarvāṃs tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.018a: tān ardayitvā bāṇaughais trāsayitvā ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:036.020a: evam uktās tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.020c: paraṃ vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ
