GE09ram_06_u:036.021a: vineduś ca mahānādān sarve te jaladopamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.021c: hato rāma iti jñātvā rāvaṇiṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:036.022a: niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:036.026c: evaṃ prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayo nāsti naiṣṭhikaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.029a: evam uktvā tatas tasya jalaklinnena pāṇinā
GE09ram_06_u:036.033a: atha vā rakṣyatāṃ rāmo yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.033c: labdhasaṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayaṃ no vyapaneṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.034a: naitat kiṃ cana rāmasya na ca rāmo mumūrṣati
GE09ram_06_u:036.034c: na hy enaṃ hāsyate lakṣmīr durlabhā yā gatāyuṣām
GE09ram_06_u:036.035c: yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punaḥ saṃsthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:036.037a: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkaṃ saṃpraharṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:036.037c: tyajantu harayas trāsaṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam
GE09ram_06_u:036.041a: utpapāta tato hṛṣṭaḥ putraṃ ca pariṣasvaje
GE09ram_06_u:036.041c: rāvaṇo rakṣasāṃ madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau
GE09ram_06_u:036.042a: upāghrāya sa mūrdhny enaṃ papraccha prītamānasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:036.042c: pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttaṃ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:036.043a: sa harṣavegānugatāntarātmā; śrutvā vacas tasya mahārathasya
GE09ram_06_u:036.043c: jahau jvaraṃ dāśaratheḥ samutthitaṃ; prahṛṣya vācābhinananda putram
GE09ram_06_u:037.002a: hanūmān aṅgado nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.003a: jāmbavān ṛṣabhaḥ sundo rambhaḥ śatabaliḥ pṛthuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.003c: vyūḍhānīkāś ca yattāś ca drumān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.004a: vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.004c: tṛṇeṣv api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasā iti menire
GE09ram_06_u:037.005c: ājuhāva tataḥ sītā rakṣaṇī rākṣasīs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:037.006a: rākṣasyas trijaṭā cāpi śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.006c: tā uvāca tato hṛṣṭo rākṣasī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:037.007c: puṣpakaṃ ca samāropya darśayadhvaṃ hatau raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:037.008a: yad āśrayād avaṣṭabdho neyaṃ mām upatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:037.008c: so 'syā bhartā saha bhrātrā nirasto raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:037.010a: adya kālavaśaṃ prāptaṃ raṇe rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:037.011c: rākṣasyas tās tathety uktvā prajagmur yatra puṣpakam
GE09ram_06_u:037.013c: sītām āropayām āsur vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:037.014a: tataḥ puṣpakam āropya sītāṃ trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:037.015c: rāghavo lakṣmaṇaś caiva hatāv indrajitā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:037.016a: vimānenāpi sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:037.016c: dadarśa vānarāṇāṃ tu sarvaṃ sinyaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:037.018c: lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca visaṃjñau śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_06_u:037.020a: tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_06_u:037.020c: duḥkhārtā subhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_06_u:037.021a: sā bāṣpaśokābhihatā samīkṣya; tau bhrātarau devasamaprabhāvau
GE09ram_06_u:037.021c: vitarkayantī nidhanaṃ tayoḥ sā; duḥkhānvitā vākyam idaṃ jagāda
GE09ram_06_u:038.001a: bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:038.002a: ūcur lakṣaṇikā ye māṃ putriṇy avidhaveti ca
GE09ram_06_u:038.003a: yajvano mahiṣīṃ ye mām ūcuḥ patnīṃ ca satriṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.004a: vīrapārthivapatnī tvaṃ ye dhanyeti ca māṃ viduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.005a: ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye māṃ dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām
GE09ram_06_u:038.006a: imāni khalu padmāni pādayor yaiḥ kila striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.008c: tāny adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me
GE09ram_06_u:038.009a: keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samā nīlā bhruvau cāsaṃgate mama
GE09ram_06_u:038.009c: vṛtte cālomaśe jaṅghe dantāś cāviralā mama
GE09ram_06_u:038.010a: śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphāv ūrū ca me citau
GE09ram_06_u:038.010c: anuvṛttā nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāś cāṅgulayo mama
GE09ram_06_u:038.011c: magnā cotsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśvoraskaṃ ca me citam
GE09ram_06_u:038.012a: mama varṇo maṇinibho mṛdūny aṅgaruhāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:038.013c: mandasmitety eva ca māṃ kanyālakṣaṇikā viduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.015c: tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ bhrātarau goṣpade hatau
GE09ram_06_u:038.016a: nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindraṃ vāyavyam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:038.018a: na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.018c: jīvan pratinivarteta yady api syān manojavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.019c: yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.020a: nāhaṃ śocāmi bhartāraṃ nihataṃ na ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:038.020c: nātmānaṃ jananī cāpi yathā śvaśrūṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:038.021a: sā hi cintayate nityaṃ samāptavratam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:038.021c: kadā drakṣyāmi sītāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:038.022c: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā devi bhartāyaṃ tava jīvati
GE09ram_06_u:038.023a: kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:038.024c: bhavanti yudhi yodhānāṃ mukhāni nihate patau
GE09ram_06_u:038.025a: idaṃ vimānaṃ vaidehi puṣpakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.025c: divyaṃ tvāṃ dhārayen nedaṃ yady etau gajajīvitau
GE09ram_06_u:038.026c: senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hatakarṇeva naur jale
GE09ram_06_u:038.027c: senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:038.028a: sā tvaṃ bhava suvisrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukhodayaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.028c: ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehād etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_06_u:038.029a: anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:038.030a: nemau śakyau raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:038.030c: etayor ānanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cāveditaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:038.031a: idaṃ ca sumahac cihnaṃ śanaiḥ paśyasva maithili
GE09ram_06_u:038.031c: niḥsaṃjñāv apy ubhāv etau naiva lakṣmīr viyujyate
GE09ram_06_u:038.033a: tyaja śokaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca janakātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:038.034a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_06_u:038.034c: kṛtāñjalir uvācedam evam astv iti maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:038.035a: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tat tu samivartya manojavam
GE09ram_06_u:038.035c: dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā
GE09ram_06_u:038.036a: tatas trijaṭayā sārdhaṃ puṣpakād avaruhya sā
GE09ram_06_u:038.037a: praviśya sītā bahuvṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃ; tāṃ rākṣasendrasya vihārabhūmim
GE09ram_06_u:038.037c: saṃprekṣya saṃcintya ca rājaputrau; paraṃ viṣādaṃ samupājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:039.003c: sthiratvāt sattvayogāc ca śaraiḥ saṃdānito 'pi san
GE09ram_06_u:039.004a: tato dṛṣṭvā sarudhiraṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ gāḍham arpitam
GE09ram_06_u:039.005a: kiṃ nu me sītayā kāryaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena vā
GE09ram_06_u:039.005c: śayānaṃ yo 'dya paśyāmi bhrātaraṃ yudhi nirjitam
GE09ram_06_u:039.006a: śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptuṃ loke vicinvatā
GE09ram_06_u:039.007a: parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān vānarāṇāṃ tu paśyatām
GE09ram_06_u:039.008a: kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kausalyāṃ mātaraṃ kiṃ nu kaikayīm
GE09ram_06_u:039.009a: vivatsāṃ vepamānāṃ ca krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:039.009c: katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi taṃ vinā
GE09ram_06_u:039.010a: kathaṃ vakṣyāmi śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE09ram_06_u:039.010c: mayā saha vanaṃ yāto vinā tenāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.011a: upālambhaṃ na śakṣyāmi soḍhuṃ bata sumitrayā
GE09ram_06_u:039.011c: ihaiva dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:039.012a: dhiṅ māṃ duṣkṛtakarmāṇam anāryaṃ yatkṛte hy asau
GE09ram_06_u:039.013a: tvaṃ nityaṃ suviṣaṇṇaṃ mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:039.013c: gatāsur nādya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:039.014a: yenādya bahavo yuddhe rākṣasā nihatāḥ kṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:039.014c: tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.015c: śarajālaiś cito bhāti bhāskaro 'stam iva vrajan
GE09ram_06_u:039.016c: rujā cābruvato hy asya dṛṣṭirāgeṇa sūcyate
GE09ram_06_u:039.017a: yathaiva māṃ vanaṃ yāntam anuyāto mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.018a: iṣṭabandhujano nityaṃ māṃ ca nityam anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.019c: paruṣaṃ vipriyaṃ vāpi śrāvitaṃ na kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:039.020c: iṣvastreṣv adhikas tasmāt kārtavīryāc ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.021a: astrair astrāṇi yo hanyāc chakrasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.022a: tac ca mithyā pralaptaṃ māṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.022c: yan mayā na kṛto rājā rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.023c: matvā hīnaṃ mayā rājan rāvaṇo 'bhidraved balī
GE09ram_06_u:039.024c: sāgaraṃ tara sugrīva punas tenaiva setunā
GE09ram_06_u:039.025a: kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:039.026a: aṅgadena kṛtaṃ karma maindena dvividena ca
GE09ram_06_u:039.026c: yuddhaṃ kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoraṃ saṃpātinā kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:039.027c: anyaiś ca haribhir yuddhaṃ madārthe tyaktajīvitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.028a: na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ daivaṃ sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:039.028c: yat tu śakyaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:039.029c: anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:039.030a: śuśruvus tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam
GE09ram_06_u:039.032c: vānarā dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānās tu rāvaṇim
GE09ram_06_u:040.001c: kim iyaṃ vyathitā senā mūḍhavāteva naur jale
GE09ram_06_u:040.002c: na tvaṃ paśyasi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:040.004c: nānimittam idaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ bhayena tu
GE09ram_06_u:040.006a: anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.007c: sugrīvaṃ vardhayām āsa rāghavaṃ ca niraikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:040.012a: te nivṛttāḥ punaḥ sarve vānarās tyaktasaṃbhramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.012c: ṛkṣarājavacaḥ śrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:040.013a: vibhīṣaṇas tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātraṃ śaraiś citam
GE09ram_06_u:040.014a: jalaklinnena hastena tayor netre pramṛjya ca
GE09ram_06_u:040.016a: bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:040.017a: śarair imāv alaṃ viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:040.017c: vasudhāyām ima suptau dṛśyete śalyakāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:040.018a: yayor vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:040.019c: prāptapratijñaś ca ripuḥ sakāmo rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.021a: rājyaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.021c: rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyaṃ neha lapsyate
GE09ram_06_u:040.022c: tyaktvā mohaṃ vadhiṣyete sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:040.023a: tam evaṃ sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:040.023c: suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ pārśve sugrīvas tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:040.024c: gaccha tvaṃ bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:040.025a: ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā saputraṃ sahabāndhavam
GE09ram_06_u:040.025c: maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakro naṣṭām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:040.028a: tān ārtān naṣṭasaṃjñāṃś ca parāsūṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.029a: tāny auṣadhāny ānayituṃ kṣīrodaṃ yāntu sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:040.030a: harayas tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:040.031a: candraś ca nāma droṇaś ca parvatau sāgarottame
GE09ram_06_u:040.031c: amṛtaṃ yatra mathitaṃ tatra te paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:040.032a: te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:040.032c: ayaṃ vāyusuto rājan hanūmāṃs tatra gacchatu
GE09ram_06_u:040.033a: etasminn antare vāyur meghāṃś cāpi savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.033c: paryasyan sāgare toyaṃ kampayann iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:040.035c: śīghraṃ sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuś ca lavaṇārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:040.036c: vānarā dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:040.037a: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgās te vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.037c: yais tau satpuruṣau baddhau śarabhūtair mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:040.038a: tataḥ suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca
GE09ram_06_u:040.039c: suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayor āśu babhūvatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.040a: tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ cauja utsāhaś ca mahāguṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.040c: pradarśanaṃ ca buddhiś ca smṛtiś ca dviguṇaṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.041c: ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaś cainam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:040.042c: āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghraṃ ca balinau kṛtau
GE09ram_06_u:040.043a: yathā tātaṃ daśarathaṃ yathājaṃ ca pitāmaham
GE09ram_06_u:040.043c: tathā bhavantam āsādya hṛṣayaṃ me prasīdati
GE09ram_06_u:040.046a: ahaṃ sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.047a: asurā vā mahāvīryā dānavā vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.051a: imaṃ śrutvā tu vṛttāntaṃ tvaramāṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.052c: apramādaś ca kartavyo yuvābhyāṃ nityam eva hi
GE09ram_06_u:040.054a: tan na viśvasitavyaṃ vo rākṣasānāṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:040.055a: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ suparṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.056a: sakhe rāghava dharmajña ripūṇām api vatsala
GE09ram_06_u:040.057c: rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ hatvā sītāṃ samupalapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:040.058a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ suparṇaḥ śīghravikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:040.058c: rāmaṃ ca virujaṃ kṛtvā madhye teṣāṃ vanaukasām
GE09ram_06_u:040.059a: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:040.060c: siṃhanādāṃs tadā nedur lāṅgūlaṃ dudhuvuś ca te
GE09ram_06_u:040.061a: tato bherīḥ samājaghnur mṛdaṅgāṃś ca vyanādayan
GE09ram_06_u:040.061c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanty api yathāpuram
GE09ram_06_u:040.064a: tatas tu bhīmas tumulo ninādo; babhūva śākhāmṛgayūthapānām
GE09ram_06_u:040.064c: kṣaye nidāghasya yathā ghanānāṃ; nādaḥ subhīmo nadatāṃ niśīthe
GE09ram_06_u:041.001c: nardatāṃ rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.002c: sacivānāṃ tatas teṣāṃ madhye vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:041.003c: bahūnāṃ sumahān nādo meghānām iva garjatām
GE09ram_06_u:041.004a: vyaktaṃ sumahatī prītir eteṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.004c: tathā hi vipulair nādaiś cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.005a: tau tu baddhau śarais tīṣkṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:041.005c: ayaṃ ca sumahān nādaḥ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_06_u:041.006a: etat tu vacanaṃ coktvā mantriṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.008a: tathoktās tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te
GE09ram_06_u:041.009a: tau ca muktau sughoreṇa śarabandhena rāghavau
GE09ram_06_u:041.012a: yau tāv indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:041.014a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.016a: tam astrabandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama
GE09ram_06_u:041.016c: saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvam anupaśyāmy ahaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:041.017c: ādattaṃ yais tu saṃgrāme ripūṇāṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:041.018a: evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho niśvasann urago yathā
GE09ram_06_u:041.018c: abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye dhūmrākṣaṃ nāma rākasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:041.020a: evam uktas tu dhūmrākṣo rākṣasendreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:041.021c: tvarayasva balaṃ tūrṇaṃ kiṃ cireṇa yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.024c: gadābhiḥ paṭṭasair daṇḍair āyasair musalair bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:041.025a: parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.025c: niryayū rākṣasā ghorā nardanto jaladā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:041.026a: rathaiḥ kavacinas tv anye dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.027a: hayaiḥ paramaśīghraiś ca gajendraiś ca madotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.029a: sa niryāto mahāvīryo dhūmrākṣo rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:041.031a: rathaśīrṣe mahābhīmo gṛdhraś ca nipapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:041.032a: rudhirārdro mahāñ śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:041.033a: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:041.033e: timiraughāvṛtās tatra diśaś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:041.034a: sa tūtpātāṃs tato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahān
GE09ram_06_u:041.035a: tataḥ subhīmo bahubhir niśācarair; vṛto 'bhiniṣkramya raṇotsuko balī
GE09ram_06_u:041.035c: dadarśa tāṃ rāghavabāhupālitāṃ; samudrakalpāṃ bahuvānarīṃ camūm
GE09ram_06_u:042.002a: teṣāṃ tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe harirakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:042.003c: vānarai rākṣasāś cāpi drumair bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.004a: rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhā vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.005a: te gadābhiś ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.005c: ghoraiś ca parighaiś citrais triśūlaiś cāpi saṃśitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.007c: jagṛhus te drumāṃs tatra śilāś ca hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.008a: te bhīmavegā harayo nardamānās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.008c: mamanthū rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire
GE09ram_06_u:042.009c: śilābhir vividhābhiś ca bahuśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.010a: rākṣasā mathitāḥ ke cid vānarair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.010c: vavarṣū rudhiraṃ ke cin mukhai rudhirabhojanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.011a: pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cid rāśīkṛtā drumaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.011c: śilābhiś cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cid dantair vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.012a: dhvajair vimathitair bhagnaiḥ kharaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.017a: sanyaṃ tu vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣo rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.018a: prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇitasravāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.018c: mudgarair āhatāḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:042.019a: parighair mathitaḥ ke cid bhiṇḍipālair vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.019c: paṭṭasair āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalanto gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.020a: ke cid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.020c: ke cid vidrāvitā naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhai rākṣasair yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:042.021c: vidāritāstraśūlai ca ke cid āntrair vinisrutāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.022a: tat subhīmaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ harirākasa saṃkulam
GE09ram_06_u:042.024c: hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśas tāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.026c: śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:042.027a: āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt
GE09ram_06_u:042.028a: sā pramathya rathaṃ tasya nipapāta śilābhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:042.029a: sa bhaṅktvā tu rathaṃ tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.032a: tam āpatantaṃ dhūmrākṣo gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:042.033a: tataḥ kruddhas tu vegena gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām
GE09ram_06_u:042.033c: pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣo mastake tu hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.034a: tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīmarūpayā
GE09ram_06_u:042.034c: sa kapir mārutabalas taṃ prahāram acintayan
GE09ram_06_u:042.035c: papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇa iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:042.037a: sa tu pavanasuto nihatya śatruṃ; kṣatajavahāḥ saritaś ca saṃvikīrya
GE09ram_06_u:042.037c: ripuvadhajanitaśramo mahātmā; mudam agamat kapibhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.004c: rākasaiḥ saṃvṛto ghorais tadā niryāty akampanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.005a: na hi kampayituṃ śakyaḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:043.005c: akampanas tatas teṣām āditya iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:043.007c: vivarṇo mukhavarṇaś ca gadgadaś cābhavat svaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.008c: ūcuḥ khagā mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.010a: tadā nirgacchatas tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.010c: babhūva sumahān nādaḥ kṣobhayann iva sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:043.013a: sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.016c: saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśur na raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:043.017a: na dhvajo na patākāvā varma vā turago 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:043.017c: āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dadṛśe tena reṇunā
GE09ram_06_u:043.018a: śabdaś ca sumahāṃs teṣāṃ nardatām abhidhāvatām
GE09ram_06_u:043.018c: śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:043.019a: harīn eva susaṃkruddhā harayo jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_06_u:043.019c: rākṣasāś cāpi rakṣāṃsi nijaghnus timire tadā
GE09ram_06_u:043.020a: parāṃś caiva vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca vānararākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.021a: tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa siktaṃ vyapagataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.022c: harayo rākṣasās tūrṇaṃ jaghnur anyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:043.026a: etasminn antare vīrā harayaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:043.026c: maindaś ca paramakruddhaś cakrur vegam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:043.027a: te tu vṛkṣair mahāvegā rākṣasānāṃ camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:044.001a: tad dṛṣṭvā sumahat karma kṛtaṃ vānarasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.001c: krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.002c: dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:044.003a: tatraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ rathaṃ prāpaya sārathe
GE09ram_06_u:044.003c: ete 'tra bahavo ghnanti subahūn rākṣasān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:044.004a: ete 'tra balavanto hi bhīmakāyāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.005a: etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino hy aham
GE09ram_06_u:044.005c: etaiḥ pramathitaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:044.007a: na sthātuṃ vānarāḥ śekuḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_06_u:044.011c: mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śarair abhivavarṣa ha
GE09ram_06_u:044.013c: abhidudrāva tad rakṣaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_06_u:044.017c: yathā hi namuciṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.018a: akampanas tu tad dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgaṃ samudyatam
GE09ram_06_u:044.021c: prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:044.023a: gajāṃś ca sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:044.023c: jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasāṃś ca padātikān
GE09ram_06_u:044.024a: tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:044.025c: dadarśākampano vīraś cukrodha ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:044.027a: sa tathā pratividdhas tu bahvībhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.027c: hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_06_u:044.028a: tato 'nyaṃ vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:044.029a: sa vṛkṣeṇa hatas tena sakrodhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:044.029c: rākṣaso vānarendreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca
GE09ram_06_u:044.030a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasendram akampanam
GE09ram_06_u:044.030c: vyathitā rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣitikampa iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.031c: laṅkām abhiyayus trastā vānarais tair abhidrutāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.033a: anyonyaṃ pramamantus te viviśur nagaraṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:044.033c: pṛṣṭhatas te susaṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.035a: so 'pi prahṛṣṭas tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat
GE09ram_06_u:044.036a: vineduś ca yathā prāṇaṃ harayo jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.036c: cakarṣuś ca punas tatra saprāṇān eva rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:044.037a: sa vīraśobhām abhajan mahākapiḥ; sametya rakṣāṃsi nihatya mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.037c: mahāsuraṃ bhīmam amitranāśanaṃ; yathaiva viṣṇur balinaṃ camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:044.038a: apūjayan devagaṇās tadā kapiṃ; svayaṃ ca rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:044.038c: tathaiva sugrīvamukhāḥ plavaṃgamā; vibhīṣaṇaś caiva mahābalas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:045.001c: kiṃ cid dīnamukhaś cāpi sacivāṃs tān udaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:045.002a: sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca
GE09ram_06_u:045.002c: purīṃ pariyayau laṅkāṃ sarvān gulmān avekṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:045.003a: tāṃ rākṣasagaṇair guptāṃ gulmair bahubhir āvṛtām
GE09ram_06_u:045.004a: ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.006a: ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā senāpatir mama
GE09ram_06_u:045.006c: indrajid vā nikumbho vā vaheyur bhāram īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:045.007a: sa tvaṃ balam itaḥ śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:045.008a: niryāṇād eva te nūnaṃ capalā harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:045.009a: capalā hy avinītāś ca calacittāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.009c: na sahiṣyanti te nādaṃ siṃhanādam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.010a: vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_06_u:045.011c: pratilomānulomaṃ vā yad vā no manyase hitam
GE09ram_06_u:045.013a: rājan mantritapūrvaṃ naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.013c: vivādaś cāpi no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:045.014a: pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyo vyavasitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:045.014c: apradāne punar yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭam etat tathaiva naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.015a: so 'haṃ dānaiś ca mānaiś ca satataṃ pūjitas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:045.015c: sāntvaiś ca vividhaiḥ kāle kiṃ na kuryāṃ priyaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:045.016a: na hi me jīvitaṃ rakṣyaṃ putradāradhanāni vā
GE09ram_06_u:045.016c: tvaṃ paśya māṃ juhūṣantaṃ tvadarthe jīvitaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:045.017a: evam uktvā tu bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.017c: samānayata me śīghraṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:045.019a: ity uktās te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛtatvarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.020c: laṅkā rākṣasavīrais tair gajair iva samākulā
GE09ram_06_u:045.022a: srajaś ca vividhākārā jagṛhus tv abhimantritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.024a: athāmantrya ca rājānaṃ bherīm āhatya bhairavām
GE09ram_06_u:045.027c: laṅkāyā niryayau tūrṇaṃ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.029a: ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasā jagmur agrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.032a: tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_06_u:045.033c: maṇḍalāny apasavyāni khagāś cakrū rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:045.035a: antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau
GE09ram_06_u:045.035c: anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhā grahāś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:045.036a: vavarṣū rudhiraṃ cāsya siṣicuś ca puraḥsarān
GE09ram_06_u:045.038a: niryāṇa śrīś ca yāsyāsīd bhāsvarā ca sudurlabhā
GE09ram_06_u:045.038c: sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitā hayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.040c: vṛkṣān ārujatāṃ caiva gurvīś cāgṛhṇatāṃ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.042a: tataḥ prahastaḥ kapirājavāhinīm; abhipratasthe vijayāya durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:045.042c: vivṛddhavegāṃ ca viveśa tāṃ camūṃ; yathā mumūrṣuḥ śalabho vibhāvasum
GE09ram_06_u:046.003c: gadāś ca parighāḥ prāsā vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.005c: śilāś ca vipulā dīrghā yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.006a: teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE09ram_06_u:046.006c: bahūnām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ ca śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca varṣatām
GE09ram_06_u:046.007c: vānarā rākṣasāṃś cāpi nijaghnur bahavo bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:046.008a: śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cit ke cit tu paramāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.008c: parighair āhatāḥ ke cit ke cic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.009a: nirucchvāsāḥ punaḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:046.010a: ke cid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:046.010c: vānarā rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvataś ca vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.012a: vajrasparśatalair hastair muṣṭibhiś ca hatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:046.013a: ārtasvaraṃ ca svanatāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_06_u:046.013c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo harīṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:046.016a: teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ nighnatāṃ cāpi vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:046.017a: durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipuladrumam
GE09ram_06_u:046.018a: jāmbavāṃs tu susaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:046.020a: amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma prahasto ratham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.021a: āvarta iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayos tadā
GE09ram_06_u:046.023a: vānarāṇāṃ śarīrais tu rākṣasānāṃ ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:046.023c: babhūva nicitā ghorā patitair iva parvataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.024c: saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśair iva puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.029a: rākṣasāḥ kapimukhyāś ca terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_06_u:046.030a: tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bāṇaughān prahastaṃ syandane sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:046.031c: prahastaṃ tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:046.033c: yathaiva govṛṣo varṣaṃ śāradaṃ śīghram āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:046.036a: vidhanus tu kṛtas tena prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.040a: ājaghāna tadā nīlaṃ lalāṭe musalena saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.042a: tam acintyaprahāraṃ sa pragṛhya musalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:046.044c: prahastasya śilāṃ nīlo mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:046.045a: sā tena kapimukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā
GE09ram_06_u:046.045c: bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiras tadā
GE09ram_06_u:046.046c: papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.047c: śarīrād api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:046.048a: hate prahaste nīlena tad akampyaṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:046.050a: hate tasmiṃś camūmukhye rākṣasas te nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:046.051a: tatas tu nīlo vijayī mahābalaḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:046.051c: sametya rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena; prahṛṣṭarūpas tu babhūva yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.001a: tasmin hate rākṣasasainyapāle; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:047.002a: gatvā tu rakṣo'dhipateḥ śaśaṃsuḥ; senāpatiṃ pāvakasūnuśastam
GE09ram_06_u:047.002c: tac cāpi teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamya; rakṣo'dhipaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma
GE09ram_06_u:047.003a: saṃkhye prahastaṃ nihataṃ niśamya; śokārditaḥ krodhaparītacetāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.003c: uvāca tān nairṛtayodhamukhyān; indro yathā cāmarayodhamukhyān
GE09ram_06_u:047.005c: svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇaśīrṣaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:047.006a: adya tad vānarānīkaṃ rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:047.007a: sa evam uktvā jvalanaprakāśaṃ; rathaṃ turaṃgottamarājiyuktam
GE09ram_06_u:047.008c: puṇyaiḥ stavaiś cāpy abhipūjyamānas; tadā yayau rākṣasarājamukhyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.009c: babhau vṛto rākṣasarājamukhyair; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāmareśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.010a: tato nagaryāḥ sahasā mahaujā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:047.011a: tad rākṣasānīkam atipracaṇḍam; ālokya rāmo bhujagendrabāhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.011c: vibhīṣaṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham; uvāca senānugataḥ pṛthuśrīḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.013a: tatas tu rāmasya niśamya vākyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaḥ śakrasamānavīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.014c: prakampayan nāgaśiro 'bhyupaiti hy; akampanaṃ tv enam avehi rājan
GE09ram_06_u:047.015a: yo 'sau rathastho mṛgarājaketur; dhūnvan dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥprakāśam
GE09ram_06_u:047.015c: karīva bhāty ugravivṛttadaṃṣṭraḥ; sa indrajin nāma varapradhānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.017c: gajaṃ kharaṃ garjati vai mahātmā; mahodaro nāma sa eṣa vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.019a: yaś caiṣa śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya; vidyutprabhaṃ kiṃkaravajravegam
GE09ram_06_u:047.019c: vṛṣendram āsthāya giriprakāśam; āyāti so 'sau triśirā yaśasvī
GE09ram_06_u:047.020a: asau ca jīmūtanikāśa rūpaḥ; kumbhaḥ pṛthuvyūḍhasujātavakṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.020c: samāhitaḥ pannagarājaketur; visphārayan bhāti dhanur vidhūnvan
GE09ram_06_u:047.021a: yaś caiṣa jāmbūnadavajrajuṣṭaṃ; dīptaṃ sadhūmaṃ parighaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:047.022c: rathaṃ samāsthāya vibhāty udagro; narāntako 'sau nagaśṛṅgayodhī
GE09ram_06_u:047.023c: bhūtair vṛto bhāti vivṛttanetraiḥ; so 'sau surāṇām api darpahantā
GE09ram_06_u:047.024a: yatraitad indupratimaṃ vibhātic; chattraṃ sitaṃ sūkṣmaśalākam agryam
GE09ram_06_u:047.024c: atraiṣa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāvabhāti
GE09ram_06_u:047.027a: āditya iva duṣprekṣyo raśmibhir bhāti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.027c: suvyaktaṃ lakṣaye hy asya rūpaṃ tejaḥsamāvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:047.031a: evam uktvā tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:047.032a: tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; rakṣāṃsi tāny āha mahābalāni
GE09ram_06_u:047.033a: visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān; gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam
GE09ram_06_u:047.034a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; dīpteṣucāpaṃ yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:047.034c: mahat samutpāṭya mahīdharāgraṃ; dudrāva rakṣo'dhipatiṃ harīśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.035a: tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ bahuvṛkṣasānuṃ; pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_06_u:047.035c: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; bibheda bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.036a: tasmin pravṛddhottamasānuvṛkṣe; śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām
GE09ram_06_u:047.038c: sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegād; guheritā kraucam ivograśaktiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.039a: sa sāyakārto viparītacetāḥ; kūjan pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.039c: taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjmaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.040a: tato gavākṣo gavayaḥ sudaṃṣṭras; tatharṣabho jyotimukho nalaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.040c: śailān samudyamya vivṛddhakāyāḥ; pradudruvus taṃ prati rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:047.041a: teṣāṃ prahārān sa cakāra meghān; rakṣo'dhipo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.041c: tān vānarendrān api bāṇajālair; bibheda jāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.042a: te vānarendrās tridaśāribāṇair; bhinnā nipetur bhuvi bhīmarūpāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.042c: tatas tu tad vānarasainyam ugraṃ; pracchādayām āsa sa bāṇajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.043c: śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇasāyakārtā; jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmam
GE09ram_06_u:047.044a: tato mahātmā sa dhanur dhanuṣmān; ādāya rāmaḥ saharā jagāma
GE09ram_06_u:047.044c: taṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir abhyupetya; uvāca vākyaṃ paramārthayuktam
GE09ram_06_u:047.045c: vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho
GE09ram_06_u:047.046c: gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:047.048a: tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya
GE09ram_06_u:047.049a: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.049c: abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam
GE09ram_06_u:047.052a: rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:047.052c: trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:047.053c: avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:047.054a: eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.056a: kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi
GE09ram_06_u:047.057c: prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:047.059a: sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.061a: saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam
GE09ram_06_u:047.061c: ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.063a: rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:047.063c: dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:047.064a: sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:047.064c: tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:047.065e: hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.066a: vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:047.071a: rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.071c: ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:047.072a: tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.073a: so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān
GE09ram_06_u:047.073c: anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:047.074a: sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.075c: hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:047.076c: jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha
GE09ram_06_u:047.077a: dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim
GE09ram_06_u:047.077c: lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.078c: astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:047.079a: tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.080a: vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:047.083a: jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara
GE09ram_06_u:047.083c: tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.087c: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
GE09ram_06_u:047.089a: tam āha saumitrir adīnasattvo; visphārayantaṃ dhanur aprameyam
GE09ram_06_u:047.089c: anvehi mām eva niśācarendra; na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:047.090a: sa tasya vākyaṃ paripūrṇaghoṣaṃ; jyāśabdam ugraṃ ca niśamya rājā
GE09ram_06_u:047.090c: āsādya saumitrim avasthitaṃ taṃ; kopānvitaṃ vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.091a: diṣṭyāsi me rāghava dṛṣṭimārgaṃ; prāpto 'ntagāmī viparītabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.091c: asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyudeśaṃ; saṃsādyamāno mama bāṇajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.092a: tam āha saumitrir avismayāno; garjantam udvṛttasitāgradaṃṣṭram
GE09ram_06_u:047.092c: rājan na garjanti mahāprabhāvā; vikatthase pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭha
GE09ram_06_u:047.093a: jānāmi vīryaṃ tava rākṣasendra; balaṃ pratāpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.094a: sa evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja; rakṣo'dhipaḥ saptaśarān supuṅkhān
GE09ram_06_u:047.094c: tāṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhaiś; ciccheda bāṇair niśitāgradhāraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.095a: tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān; nikṛttabhogān iva pannagendrān
GE09ram_06_u:047.095c: laṅkeśvaraḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; sasarja cānyān niśitān pṛṣatkān
GE09ram_06_u:047.096a: sa bāṇavarṣaṃ tu vavarṣa tīvraṃ; rāmānujaḥ kārmukasaṃprayuktam
GE09ram_06_u:047.096c: kṣurārdhacandrottamakarṇibhallaiḥ; śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.097a: sa lakṣmaṇaś cāśu śarāñ śitāgrān; mahendravajrāśanitulyavegān
GE09ram_06_u:047.097c: saṃdhāya cāpe jvalanaprakāśān; sasarja rakṣo'dhipater vadhāya
GE09ram_06_u:047.098a: sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasendraś; chittvā ca tāṃl lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna
GE09ram_06_u:047.099a: sa lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasāyakārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ śithilaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:047.099c: punaś ca saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya kṛcchrāc; ciccheda cāpaṃ tridaśendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.100a: nikṛttacāpaṃ tribhir ājaghāna; bāṇais tadā dāśarathiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.100c: sa sāyakārto vicacāla rājā; kṛcchrāc ca saṃjñāṃ punar āsasāda
GE09ram_06_u:047.101a: sa kṛttacāpaḥ śaratāḍitaś ca; svedārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.101c: jagrāha śaktiṃ samudagraśaktiḥ; svayambhudattāṃ yudhi devaśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.102c: cikṣepa śaktiṃ tarasā jvalantīṃ; saumitraye rākṣasarāṣṭranāthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.103a: tām āpatantīṃ bharatānujo 'strair; jaghāna bāṇaiś ca hutāgnikalpaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.103c: tathāpi sā tasya viveśa śaktir; bhujāntaraṃ dāśarather viśālam
GE09ram_06_u:047.104a: śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare
GE09ram_06_u:047.104c: viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat
GE09ram_06_u:047.106a: himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.106c: śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.107a: athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_06_u:047.109c: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.110c: ṛṣayo vānarāś caiva nedur devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.112a: vāyusūnoḥ suhṛttvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.113a: taṃ samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitriṃ yudhi durjayam
GE09ram_06_u:047.113c: rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānaṃ punar upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:047.114c: ādade niśitān bāṇāñ jagrāha ca mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.115a: āśvastaś ca viśalyaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.116c: rāghavas tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat
GE09ram_06_u:047.117c: mama pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya rakṣasaṃ śāstum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:047.118a: tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyaṃ vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:047.119a: tam ālokya mahātejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.120c: girā gambhīrayā rāmo rākṣasendram uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:047.121a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvaṃ hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:047.121c: kva nu rākṣasaśārdūla gato mokṣam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:047.122c: gamiṣyasi tvaṃ daśa vā diśo vā; tathāpi me nādya gato vimokṣyase
GE09ram_06_u:047.123a: yaś caiṣa śaktyābhihatas tvayādya; icchan viṣādaṃ sahasābhyupetaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.123c: sa eṣa rakṣogaṇarāja mṛtyuḥ; saputradārasya tavādya yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:047.127c: sasārathiṃ sāśaniśūlakhaḍgaṃ; rāmaḥ praciccheda śaraiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.128c: bhujāntare vyūḍhasujātarūpe; vajreṇa meruṃ bhagavān ivendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.129a: yo vajrapātāśanisaṃnipātān; na cukṣubhe nāpi cacāla rājā
GE09ram_06_u:047.129c: sa rāmabāṇābhihato bhṛśārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ ca mumoca vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.130a: taṃ vihvalantaṃ prasamīkṣya rāmaḥ; samādade dīptam athārdhacandram
GE09ram_06_u:047.130c: tenārkavarṇaṃ sahasā kirīṭaṃ; ciccheda rakṣo'dhipater mahātmāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.131c: gataśriyaṃ kṛttakirīṭakūṭam; uvāca rāmo yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:047.132a: kṛtaṃ tvayā karma mahat subhīmaṃ; hatapravīraś ca kṛtas tvayāham
GE09ram_06_u:047.132c: tasmāt pariśrānta iti vyavasya; na tvaṃ śarair mṛtyuvaśaṃ nayāmi
GE09ram_06_u:047.133a: sa evam ukto hatadarpaharṣo; nikṛttacāpaḥ sa hatāśvasūtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:047.133c: śarārditaḥ kṛttamahākirīṭo; viveśa laṅkāṃ sahasā sma rājā
GE09ram_06_u:047.134c: harīn viśalyān sahalakṣmaṇena; cakāra rāmaḥ paramāhavāgre
GE09ram_06_u:047.135a: tasmin prabhagne tridaśendraśatrau; surāsurā bhūtagaṇā diśaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:047.135c: sasāgarāḥ sarṣimahoragāś ca; tathaiva bhūmyambucarāś ca hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.005a: sarvaṃ tat khalu me moghaṃ yat taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.006a: idaṃ tad brahmaṇo ghoraṃ vākyaṃ mām abhyupasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.006c: mānuṣebhyo vijānīhi bhayaṃ tvam iti tat tathā
GE09ram_06_u:048.007c: avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.010a: sa parājitam ātmānaṃ prahastaṃ ca niṣūditam
GE09ram_06_u:048.012a: nava ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.012c: taṃ tu bodhayata kṣipraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:048.013a: sa hi saṃkhye mahābāhuḥ kakudaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:048.013c: vānarān rājaputrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:048.014a: kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍho grāmyasukhe rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.015a: bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite
GE09ram_06_u:048.015c: kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tena śakratulyabalena hi
GE09ram_06_u:048.016a: īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yo na sāhyāya kalpate
GE09ram_06_u:048.016c: te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasendrasya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.018a: gandhamālyāṃs tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.020a: tāṃ praviśya guhāṃ ramyāṃ śubhāṃ kāñcanakuṭṭimām
GE09ram_06_u:048.021a: te tu taṃ vikṛtaṃ suptaṃ vikīrṇam iva parvatam
GE09ram_06_u:048.025a: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_06_u:048.026a: tataḥ śoṇitakumbhāṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:048.027c: divyair ācchādayām āsur mālyair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.028a: dhūpaṃ sugandhaṃ sasṛjus tuṣṭuvuś ca paraṃtapam
GE09ram_06_u:048.029c: tumulaṃ yugapac cāpi vineduś cāpy amarṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.030a: nedur āsphoṭayām āsuś cikṣipus te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.031c: diśo dravantas tridivaṃ kirantaḥ; śrutvā vihaṃgāḥ sahasā nipetuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.032a: yadā bhṛśaṃ tair ninadair mahātmā; na kumbhakarṇo bubudhe prasuptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.032c: tato musuṇḍīmusalāni sarve; rakṣogaṇās te jagṛhur gadāś ca
GE09ram_06_u:048.033a: taṃ śailaśṛṅgair musalair gadābhir; vṛkṣais talair mudgaramuṣṭibhiś ca
GE09ram_06_u:048.033c: sukhaprasuptaṃ bhuvi kumbhakarṇaṃ; rakṣāṃsy udagrāṇi tadā nijaghnuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.036c: abhighnanto nadantaś ca naiva saṃvivide tu saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.037a: yadā cainaṃ na śekus te pratibodhayituṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:048.038a: aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgāñ jaghnur daṇḍakaśāṅkuśaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.042a: evam apy atinidras tu yadā naiva prabudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:048.042c: śāpasya vaśam āpannas tataḥ kruddhā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.044a: anye bherīḥ samājaghnur anye cakrur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:048.044c: keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇāv anye daśanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:048.047c: kumbhakarṇas tato buddhaḥ sparśaṃ param abudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:048.048a: sa pātyamānair giriśṛṅgavṛkṣair; acintayaṃs tān vipulān prahārān
GE09ram_06_u:048.049c: vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābhaṃ; niśācaro 'sau vikṛtaṃ jajṛmbhe
GE09ram_06_u:048.051c: niśvāsaś cāsya saṃjajñe parvatād iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.052a: rūpam uttiṣṭhatas tasya kumbhakarṇasya tad babhau
GE09ram_06_u:048.054c: medaḥ kumbhaṃ ca madyaṃ ca papau śakraripus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:048.055a: tatas tṛpta iti jñātvā samutpetur niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.056a: sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛtarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.056c: bodhanād vismitaś cāpi rākṣasān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:048.057c: kaccit sukuśalaṃ rājño bhayaṃ vā neha kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:048.058a: atha vā dhruvam anyebhyo bhayaṃ param upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.060a: na hy alpakāraṇe suptaṃ bodhayiṣyati māṃ bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:048.061c: yūpākṣaḥ sacivo rājñaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:048.062a: na no devakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid bhayam asti kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:048.062c: na daityadānavebhyo vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:048.062e: yādṛśaṃ mānuṣaṃ rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.066a: yan na devaiḥ kṛto rājā nāpi daityair na dānavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.066c: kṛtaḥ sa iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇasaṃśayāt
GE09ram_06_u:048.067a: sa yūpākṣavacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur yudhi parājayam
GE09ram_06_u:048.068c: rāghavaṃ ca raṇe hatvā paścād drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:048.070a: tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; sagarvitaṃ roṣavivṛddhadoṣam
GE09ram_06_u:048.070c: mahodaro nairṛtayodhamukhyaḥ; kṛtāñjalir vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:048.071a: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇadoṣu vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:048.071c: paścād api mahābāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:048.075c: kathaṃ tatraiva niryātu drakṣyase tam ihāgatam
GE09ram_06_u:048.076a: rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.076c: draṣṭum enam ihecchāmi yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_06_u:048.077a: tathety uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.079a: kumbhakarṇas tu durdharṣo bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:048.079c: tathety uktvā mahāvīryaḥ śayanād utpapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:048.081a: tatas te tvaritās tasya rājṣasā rāvaṇājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:048.081c: madyaṃ bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kṣipram evopahārayan
GE09ram_06_u:048.085a: sa rājamārgaṃ vapuṣā prakāśayan; sahasraraśmir dharaṇīm ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.085c: jagāma tatrāñjalimālayā vṛtaḥ; śatakratur geham iva svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:048.086a: ke cic charaṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmaṃ; vrajanti ke cid vyathitāḥ patanti
GE09ram_06_u:048.086c: ke cid diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti; ke cid bhayārtā bhuvi śerate sma
GE09ram_06_u:048.087a: tam adriśṛṅgapratimaṃ kirīṭinaṃ; spṛśantam ādityam ivātmatejasā
GE09ram_06_u:048.087c: vanaukasaḥ prekṣya vivṛddham adbhutaṃ; bhayārditā dudruvire tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.001a: tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:049.004a: vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vardhamānaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:049.004c: savismayam idaṃ rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:049.005c: laṅkāyāṃ dṛśyate vīraḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.006c: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.007a: ācakṣva me mahān ko 'sau rakṣo vā yadi vāsuraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.007c: na mayaivaṃvidhaṃ bhūtaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:049.009a: yena vaivasvato yuddhe vāsavaś ca parājitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.010a: etena devā yudhi dānavāś ca; yakṣā bhujaṃgāḥ piśitāśanāś ca
GE09ram_06_u:049.011c: hantuṃ na śekus tridaśāḥ kālo 'yam iti mohitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.012a: prakṛtyā hy eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.014c: yānti sma śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ tam apy arthaṃ nyavedayan
GE09ram_06_u:049.015a: sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito mahendro; jaghāna vajreṇa śitena vajrī
GE09ram_06_u:049.015c: sa śakravajrābhihato mahātmā; cacāla kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:049.016c: śrutvā ninādaṃ vitrastā bhūyo bhūmir vitatrase
GE09ram_06_u:049.019a: prajābhiḥ saha śakraś ca yayau sthānaṃ svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.019e: prajānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi devānāṃ cāpi dharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:049.020a: evaṃ prajā yadi tv eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.021c: rakṣāṃsy āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_06_u:049.022c: dṛṣṭvā niśvasya caivedaṃ svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:049.023c: tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛtakalpaḥ śayiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:049.025a: na naptāraṃ svakaṃ nyāyyaṃ śaptum evaṃ prajāpate
GE09ram_06_u:049.025c: na mithyāvacanaś ca tvaṃ svapsyaty eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.025e: kālas tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā
GE09ram_06_u:049.026a: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:049.026c: śayitā hy eṣa ṣaṇ māsān ekāhaṃ jāgariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:049.027a: ekenāhnā tv asau vīraś caran bhūmiṃ bubhukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.027c: vyāttāsyo bhakṣayel lokān saṃkruddha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.029a: sa eṣa nirgato vīraḥ śibirād bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.030c: katham enaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.031a: ucyantāṃ vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam
GE09ram_06_u:049.032c: uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ nīlaṃ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:049.033a: gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake
GE09ram_06_u:049.033c: dvārāṇy ādāya laṅkāyāś caryāś cāpy atha saṃkramān
GE09ram_06_u:049.034a: śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca śilāś cāpy upasaṃharan
GE09ram_06_u:049.036a: tato gavākṣaḥ śarabho hanumān aṅgado nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:049.037a: tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; rarāja śailodyatavṛkṣahastam
GE09ram_06_u:049.037c: gireḥ samīpānugataṃ yathaiva; mahan mahāmbhodharajālam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:050.004a: sa tat tadā sūrya ivābhrajālaṃ; praviśya rakṣo'dhipater niveśanam
GE09ram_06_u:050.004c: dadarśa dūre 'grajam āsanasthaṃ; svayambhuvaṃ śakra ivāsanastham
GE09ram_06_u:050.005a: so 'bhigamya gṛhaṃ bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:050.007c: bhrātur vavande caraṇāṃ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:050.010a: kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:050.010c: śaṃsa kasmād bhayaṃ te 'sti ko 'dya preto bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:050.011c: īṣat tu parivṛttābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:050.012a: adya te sumahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahābala
GE09ram_06_u:050.012c: sukhitas tvaṃ na jānīṣe mama rāmakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:050.013c: samudraṃ sabalas tīrtvā mūlaṃ naḥ parikṛntati
GE09ram_06_u:050.014a: hanta paśyasva laṅkāyā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:050.015a: ye rākṣasā mukhyatamā hatās te vānarair yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:050.015c: vānarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:050.016a: sarvakṣapitakośaṃ ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām
GE09ram_06_u:050.017a: bhrātur arthe mahābāho kuru karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:050.017c: mayaivaṃ noktapūrvo hi kaś cid bhrātaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:050.017e: tvayy asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me
GE09ram_06_u:050.018c: tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāś cāsurā yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:050.018e: na hi te sarvabhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśo balī
GE09ram_06_u:050.019a: kuruṣva me priyahitam etad uttamaṃ; yathāpriyaṃ priyaraṇabāndhavapriya
GE09ram_06_u:050.019c: svatejasā vidhama sapatnavāhinīṃ; śaradghanaṃ pavana ivodyato mahān
GE09ram_06_u:051.002a: dṛṣṭo doṣo hi yo 'smābhiḥ purā mantravinirṇaye
GE09ram_06_u:051.003a: śīghraṃ khalv abhyupetaṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.004a: prathamaṃ vai mahārāja kṛtyam etad acintitam
GE09ram_06_u:051.005a: yaḥ paścāt pūrvakāryāṇi kuryād aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.005c: pūrvaṃ cottarakāryāṇi na sa veda nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:051.007a: trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
GE09ram_06_u:051.007c: sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi
GE09ram_06_u:051.008a: yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati
GE09ram_06_u:051.009a: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate
GE09ram_06_u:051.009c: bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.010a: triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_06_u:051.010c: rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam
GE09ram_06_u:051.011a: upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:051.011c: yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:051.012a: kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:051.012c: niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_06_u:051.015a: aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.016a: ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.019c: chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.020a: yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:051.020c: avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate
GE09ram_06_u:051.021a: tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:051.021c: bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:051.022a: mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:051.022c: kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:051.023c: nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.024a: asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:051.025a: yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:051.025c: yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam
GE09ram_06_u:051.027a: tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:051.027c: ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:051.029c: roṣaṃ ca saṃparityajya svastho bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:051.030a: naitan manasi kartavvyaṃ mayi jīvati pārthiva
GE09ram_06_u:051.031a: avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava
GE09ram_06_u:051.032a: sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā
GE09ram_06_u:051.032c: śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:051.034a: adya rāmasya tad dṛṣṭvā mayānītaṃ raṇāc chiraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.035a: adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanaṃ sumahat priyam
GE09ram_06_u:051.035c: laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihatabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.038a: na paraḥ preṣaṇīyas te yuddhāyātula vikrama
GE09ram_06_u:051.039c: tān ahaṃ yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇāv api
GE09ram_06_u:051.041a: atha vā tyaktaśastrasya mṛdgatas tarasā ripūn
GE09ram_06_u:051.041c: na me pratimukhe kaś cic chaktaḥ sthātuṃ jijīviṣuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.042a: naiva śaktyā na gadayā nāsinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.042c: hastābhyām eva saṃrabdho haniṣyāmy api vajriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:051.043a: yadi me muṣṭivegaṃ sa rāghavo 'dya sahiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:051.043c: tataḥ pāsyanti bāṇaughā rudhiraṃ rāghavasya te
GE09ram_06_u:051.044a: cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:051.045a: muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:051.045c: rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:051.045e: asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātuṃ mahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.046a: vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukhāvahaṃ; sukhaṃ samāhartum ahaṃ vrajāmi
GE09ram_06_u:051.046c: nihatya rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; khādāmi sarvān hariyūthamukhyān
GE09ram_06_u:051.047a: ramasva kāmaṃ piba cāgryavāruṇīṃ; kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatāṃ jvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:051.047c: mayādya rāme gamite yamakṣayaṃ; cirāya sītā vaśagā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:052.002c: avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum
GE09ram_06_u:052.003a: na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:052.003c: tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:052.004a: sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit
GE09ram_06_u:052.004c: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:052.005a: yat tu śakyaṃ balavatā kartuṃ prākṛtabuddhinā
GE09ram_06_u:052.006a: yāṃs tu dharmārthakāmāṃs tvaṃ bravīṣi pṛthag āśrayān
GE09ram_06_u:052.006c: anuboddhuṃ svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te
GE09ram_06_u:052.007a: karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojanam
GE09ram_06_u:052.007c: śreyaḥ pāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:052.008a: niḥśreyasa phalāv eva dharmārthāv itarāv api
GE09ram_06_u:052.009c: karmāṇy api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.010a: tatra kḷptam idaṃ rājñā hṛdi kāryaṃ mataṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.010c: śatrau hi sāhasaṃ yat syāt kim ivātrāpanīyate
GE09ram_06_u:052.011a: ekasyaivābhiyāne tu hetur yaḥ prakṛtas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:052.011c: tatrāpy anupapannaṃ te vakṣyāmi yad asādhu ca
GE09ram_06_u:052.012c: rākṣasā rāghavaṃ taṃ tvaṃ katham eko jayiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:052.013a: ye purā nirjitās tena janasthāne mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.013c: rākṣasāṃs tān pure sarvān bhītān adyāpi paśyasi
GE09ram_06_u:052.014a: taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_06_u:052.015a: jvalantaṃ tejasā nityaṃ krodhena ca durāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:052.015c: kas taṃ mṛtyum ivāsahyam āsādayitum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:052.016c: ekasya gamanaṃ tatra na hi me rocate tava
GE09ram_06_u:052.017a: hīnārthas tu samṛddhārthaṃ ko ripuṃ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_06_u:052.019a: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.020a: labdhvā punas tāṃ vaidehīṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ prajalpasi
GE09ram_06_u:052.020c: yadecchasi tadā sītā vaśagā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:052.021a: dṛṣṭaḥ kaś cid upāyo me sītopasthānakārakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.021c: rucitaś cet svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara taṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:052.023a: tato gatvā vayaṃ yuddhaṃ dāsyāmas tasya yatnataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.023c: jeṣyāmo yadi te śatrūn nopāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.024a: atha jīvati naḥ śatrur vayaṃ ca kṛtasaṃyugāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.026c: tava pādau grahīṣyāmas tvaṃ naḥ kāma prapūraya
GE09ram_06_u:052.027c: hato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sasainya iti sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.028a: prīto nāma tato bhūtvā bhṛtyānāṃ tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:052.028c: bhogāṃś ca parivārāṃś ca kāmāṃś ca vasudāpaya
GE09ram_06_u:052.029c: peyaṃ ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca muditaḥ piba
GE09ram_06_u:052.030c: praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya
GE09ram_06_u:052.030e: dhanadhānyaiś ca kāmaiś ca ratnaiś caināṃ pralobhaya
GE09ram_06_u:052.032a: rañjanīyaṃ hi bhartāraṃ vinaṣṭam avagamya sā
GE09ram_06_u:052.034a: etat sunītaṃ mama darśanena; rāmaṃ hi dṛṣṭvaiva bhaved anarthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.034c: ihaiva te setsyati motsuko bhūr; mahān ayuddhena sukhasya lābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:052.035a: anaṣṭasainyo hy anavāptasaṃśayo; ripūn ayuddhena jayañ janādhipa
GE09ram_06_u:052.035c: yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate; śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute
GE09ram_06_u:053.001a: sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram
GE09ram_06_u:053.002a: so 'haṃ tava bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.003a: garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalā iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.003c: paśya saṃpādyamānaṃ tu garjitaṃ yudhi karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:053.004c: adarśayitvā śūrās tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:053.007a: rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:053.008a: eṣa niryāmy ahaṃ yuddham udyataḥ śatrunirjaye
GE09ram_06_u:053.010a: mahodaro 'yaṃ rāmāt tu paritrasto na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.010c: na hi rocayate tāta yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE09ram_06_u:053.011a: kaś cin me tvatsamo nāsti sauhṛdena balena ca
GE09ram_06_u:053.015a: gamiṣyāmy aham ekākī tiṣṭhatv iha balaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:053.015c: adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddho bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:053.017a: vānarā hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāś ca vyavasāyinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.017c: ekākinaṃ pramattaṃ vā nayeyur daśanaiḥ kṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:053.021c: śrotre cāsajjayām āsa śrīmatī cāsya kuṇḍale
GE09ram_06_u:053.024a: sa kāñcanaṃ bhārasahaṃ nivātaṃ; vidyutprabhaṃ dīptam ivātmabhāsā
GE09ram_06_u:053.026e: tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.027c: taṃ gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca syandanaiś cāmbudasvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.028c: anujagmuś ca taṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:053.031c: śūrān udyamya khaḍgāṃś ca niśitāṃś ca paraśvadhān
GE09ram_06_u:053.038c: hate tasmin hataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:053.043a: niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre 'sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.043c: prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_06_u:053.044c: ādityo niṣprabhaś cāsīn na pravāti sukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.047c: vāyununnā iva ghanā yayuḥ sarvā diśas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:053.048a: tad vānarānīkam atipracaṇḍaṃ; diśo dravad bhinnam ivābhrajālam
GE09ram_06_u:053.048c: sa kumbhakarṇaḥ samavekṣya harṣān; nanāda bhūyo ghanavad ghanābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.049a: te tasya ghoraṃ ninadaṃ niśamya; yathā ninādaṃ divi vāridasya
GE09ram_06_u:053.049c: petur dharaṇyāṃ bahavaḥ plavaṃgā; nikṛttamūlā iva sālavṛkṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:053.050a: vipulaparighavān sa kumbhakarṇo; ripunidhanāya viniḥsṛto mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:053.050c: kapi gaṇabhayam ādadat subhīmaṃ; prabhur iva kiṃkaradaṇḍavān yugānte
GE09ram_06_u:054.001c: janayann iva nirghātān vidhamann iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:054.002a: tam avadhyaṃ maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_06_u:054.003c: nalaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca kumudaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:054.004a: ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇy abhijanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:054.004c: kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā harayo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:054.005a: sādhu saumyā nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_06_u:054.005c: nālaṃ yuddhāya vai rakṣo mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.007a: kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.008a: te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.008e: prāṃśubhir giriśṛṅgaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.009a: pādapaiḥ puṣpitāgraiś ca hanyamāno na kampate
GE09ram_06_u:054.009c: tasya gātreṣu patitā bhidyante śataśaḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.009e: pādapāḥ puṣpitāgrāś ca bhagnāḥ petur mahītale
GE09ram_06_u:054.011c: nirastāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.012c: ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.013a: vadhyamānās tu te vīrā rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_06_u:054.013c: sāgaraṃ yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tenaiva dudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.014a: te sthalāni tathā nimnaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanā bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:054.014c: ṛkṣā vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.015a: mamajjur arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cit samāśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.015c: niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cin naivāvatasthire
GE09ram_06_u:054.016a: tān samīkṣyāṅgado bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:054.017a: bhagnānāṃ vo na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām
GE09ram_06_u:054.017c: sthānaṃ sarve nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_06_u:054.018c: dārā hy apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātas tu jīvitām
GE09ram_06_u:054.019a: kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:054.019c: anāryāḥ khalu yad bhītās tyaktvā vīryaṃ pradhāvata
GE09ram_06_u:054.020a: vikatthanāni vo yāni yadā vai janasaṃsadi
GE09ram_06_u:054.020c: tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sodagrāṇi mahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:054.021a: bhīrupravādāḥ śrūyante yas tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.021c: mārgaḥ satpuruṣair juṣṭaḥ sevyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:054.022c: duṣprāpaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā prāpnumo yudhi sūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.022e: saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtiṃ vā nihatya śatrum āhave
GE09ram_06_u:054.023a: na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutsthaṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:054.024c: ekena bahavo bhagnā yaśo nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:054.025a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śūram aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam
GE09ram_06_u:054.026a: kṛtaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:054.026c: na sthānakālo gacchāmo dayitaṃ jīvitaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.027a: etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ sarve te bhejire diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.028a: dravamāṇās tu te vīrā aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:054.028c: sāntvaiś ca bahumānaiś ca tataḥ sarve nivartitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.003a: prayātāś ca gatā harṣaṃ maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.004a: atha vṛkṣān mahākāyāḥ sānūni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.005a: sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddho gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:055.006a: śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.007a: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathaiva ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.008a: hanūmāñ śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:055.009a: tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha
GE09ram_06_u:055.010a: tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; dudrāva śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:055.010c: tasthau tato 'syāpatataḥ purastān; mahīdharāgraṃ hanumān pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:055.011a: sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito jaghāna; vegena śailottamabhīmakāyam
GE09ram_06_u:055.011c: sa cukṣubhe tena tadābhibūto; medārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.012a: sa śūlam āvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ; giriṃ yathā prajvalitāgraśṛṅgam
GE09ram_06_u:055.012c: bāhvantare mārutim ājaghāna; guho 'calaṃ krauñcam ivograśaktyā
GE09ram_06_u:055.013a: sa śūlanirbhinna mahābhujāntaraḥ; pravihvalaḥ śoṇitam udvaman mukhāt
GE09ram_06_u:055.014a: tato vineduḥ sahasā prahṛṣṭā; rakṣogaṇās taṃ vyathitaṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_06_u:055.014c: plavaṃgamās tu vyathitā bhayārtāḥ; pradudruvuḥ saṃyati kumbhakarṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:055.018a: śailair vṛkṣais talaiḥ pādair muṣṭibhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.019a: sparśān iva prahārāṃs tān vedayāno na vivyathe
GE09ram_06_u:055.021a: muṣṭinā śarabhaṃ hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave
GE09ram_06_u:055.022c: nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.024a: taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.025a: taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā
GE09ram_06_u:055.027a: bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.027c: bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva
GE09ram_06_u:055.028c: nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.032a: yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.033a: tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.038c: kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:055.039a: pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:055.039c: bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.040a: tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:055.043a: sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; vyāvidhya śailaṃ sahasā mumoca
GE09ram_06_u:055.044a: tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ sahasā vikīrṇaṃ; bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle
GE09ram_06_u:055.044c: tato viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā; rakṣogaṇāś cāpi mudā vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.045a: sa śailaśṛṅgābhihataś cukopa; nanāda kopāc ca vivṛtya vaktram
GE09ram_06_u:055.045c: vyāvidhya śūlaṃ ca taḍitprakāśaṃ; cikṣepa haryṛkṣapater vadhāya
GE09ram_06_u:055.046a: tat kumbhakarṇasya bhujapraviddhaṃ; śūlaṃ śitaṃ kāñcanadāmajuṣṭam
GE09ram_06_u:055.046c: kṣipraṃ samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ; babhañja vegena suto 'nilasya
GE09ram_06_u:055.048a: sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ; cukopa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:055.048c: utpāṭya laṅkāmalayāt sa śṛṅgaṃ; jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena
GE09ram_06_u:055.049a: sa śailaśṛṅgābhihato visaṃjñaḥ; papāta bhūmau yudhi vānarendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.049c: taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.050a: tam abhyupetyādbhutaghoravīryaṃ; sa kumbhakarṇo yudhi vānarendram
GE09ram_06_u:055.050c: jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya; yathānilo megham atipracaṇḍaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.051a: sa taṃ mahāmeghanikāśarūpam; utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.052a: tataḥ samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ; saṃstūyamāno yudhi rākṣasendraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.053a: tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene; harīndram indropamam indravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.053c: asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt; sarāghavaṃ sainyam itīndraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.054a: vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.055c: evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:055.056a: yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_06_u:055.057a: mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe; mahābale muṣṭiviśīrṇadehe
GE09ram_06_u:055.057c: vimocite vānarapārthive ca; bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.058a: atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.059a: manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.060c: ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:055.061c: aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.062a: tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.062c: bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:055.063a: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.064a: sa kumbhakarṇo 'tha viveśa laṅkāṃ; sphurantam ādāya mahāhariṃ tam
GE09ram_06_u:055.065a: tataḥ sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrād; balīyasas tasya bhujāntarasthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.065c: avekṣamāṇaḥ purarājamārgaṃ; vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:055.066a: evaṃ gṛhītena kathaṃ nu nāma; śakyaṃ mayā saṃprati kartum adya
GE09ram_06_u:055.066c: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇāṃ; bhaviṣyatīṣṭaṃ ca hitaṃ ca kāryam
GE09ram_06_u:055.067a: tataḥ karāgraiḥ sahasā sametya; rājā harīṇām amarendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.067c: nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ; dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:055.068a: sa kumbhakarṇau hṛtakarṇanāso; vidāritas tena vimarditaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.068c: roṣābhibhūtaḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ; sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau
GE09ram_06_u:055.069a: sa bhūtale bhīmabalābhipiṣṭaḥ; surāribhis tair abhihanyamānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.069c: jagāma khaṃ vegavad abhyupetya; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:055.071a: tataḥ sa puryāḥ sahasā mahātmā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:055.071c: babhakṣa rakṣo yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ; prajā yugāntāgnir iva pradīptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.072a: bubhukṣitaḥ śoṇitamāṃsagṛdhnuḥ; praviśya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:055.072c: cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān; ṛkṣāṃś ca mohād yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.073a: ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.074a: saṃprasravaṃs tadā medaḥ śoṇitaṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.074e: te bhakṣyamāṇā harayo rāmaṃ jagmus tadā gatim
GE09ram_06_u:055.076a: sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:055.078a: atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan
GE09ram_06_u:055.081a: sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.081c: muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:055.083a: sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.084a: tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:055.085a: naivāyaṃ vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:055.085c: mattaḥ śoṇitagandhena svān parāṃś caiva khādati
GE09ram_06_u:055.086c: yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.087c: prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_06_u:055.090a: tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmo ruṣṭo 'yam iti rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.091a: sa cāpam ādāya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; dṛḍhajyam ugraṃ tapanīyacitram
GE09ram_06_u:055.092a: sa vānaragaṇais tais tu vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.099c: tam āpatantaṃ dharaṇīdharābham; uvāca rāmo yudhi kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:055.100c: avehi māṃ śakrasapatna rāmam; ayaṃ muhūrtād bhavitā vicetāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.103a: nāhaṃ virādho vijñeyo na kabandhaḥ kharo na ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.103c: na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.104a: paśya me mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:055.104c: anena nirjitā devā dānavāś ca mayā purā
GE09ram_06_u:055.105a: vikarṇanāsa iti māṃ nāvajñātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:055.105c: svalpāpi hi na me pīḍā karṇanāsāvināśanāt
GE09ram_06_u:055.107a: sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; rāmaḥ supuṅkhān visasarja bāṇān
GE09ram_06_u:055.107c: tair āhato vajrasamapravegair; na cukṣubhe na vyathate surāriḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.108a: yaiḥ sāyakaiḥ sālavarā nikṛttā; vālī hato vānarapuṃgavaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.108c: te kumbhakarṇasya tadā śarīraṃ; vajropamā na vyathayāṃ pracakruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.109a: sa vāridhārā iva sāyakāṃs tān; pibañ śarīreṇa mahendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.109c: jaghāna rāmasya śarapravegaṃ; vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegam
GE09ram_06_u:055.110a: tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣatajānuliptaṃ; vitrāsanaṃ devamahācamūnām
GE09ram_06_u:055.110c: vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegaṃ; vidrāvayām āsa camūṃ harīṇām
GE09ram_06_u:055.111a: vāyavyam ādāya tato varāstraṃ; rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_06_u:055.111c: samudgaraṃ tena jahāra bāhuṃ; sa kṛttabāhus tumulaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:055.112a: sa tasya bāhur giriśṛṅgakalpaḥ; samudgaro rāghavabāṇakṛttaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.112c: papāta tasmin harirājasainye; jaghāna tāṃ vānaravāhinīṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.113a: te vānarā bhagnahatāvaśeṣāḥ; paryantam āśritya tadā viṣaṇṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.114c: utpāṭayām āsa kareṇa vṛkṣaṃ; tato 'bhidudrāva raṇe narendram
GE09ram_06_u:055.115a: taṃ tasya bāhuṃ saha sālavṛkṣaṃ; samudyataṃ pannagabhogakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:055.116a: sa kumbhakarṇasya bhujo nikṛttaḥ; papāta bhūmau girisaṃnikāśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.116c: viveṣṭamāno nijaghāna vṛkṣāñ; śailāñ śilāvānararākṣasāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.117a: taṃ chinnabāhuṃ samavekṣya rāmaḥ; samāpatantaṃ sahasā nadantam
GE09ram_06_u:055.117c: dvāv ardhacandrau niśitau pragṛhya; ciccheda pādau yudhi rākṣasasya
GE09ram_06_u:055.118c: dudrāva rāmaṃ sahasābhigarjan; rāhur yathā candram ivāntarikṣe
GE09ram_06_u:055.119a: apūrayat tasya mukhaṃ śitāgrai; rāmaḥ śarair hemapinaddhapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.119c: sa pūrṇavaktro na śaśāka vaktuṃ; cukūja kṛcchreṇa mumoha cāpi
GE09ram_06_u:055.120c: ariṣṭam aindraṃ niśitaṃ supuṅkhaṃ; rāmaḥ śaraṃ mārutatulyavegam
GE09ram_06_u:055.122a: sa sāyako rāghavabāhucodito; diśaḥ svabhāsā daśa saṃprakāśayan
GE09ram_06_u:055.123c: cakarta rakṣo'dhipateḥ śiras tadā; yathaiva vṛtrasya purā puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.124c: babhañja caryāgṛhagopurāṇi; prākāram uccaṃ tam apātayac ca
GE09ram_06_u:055.125a: tac cātikāyaṃ himavatprakāśaṃ; rakṣas tadā toyanidhau papāta
GE09ram_06_u:055.125c: grāhān mahāmīnacayān bhujaṃgamān; mamarda bhūmiṃ ca tathā viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:055.126a: tasmir hate brāhmaṇadevaśatrau; mahābale saṃyati kumbhakarṇe
GE09ram_06_u:055.126c: cacāla bhūr bhūmidharāś ca sarve; harṣāc ca devās tumulaṃ praṇeduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.127a: tatas tu devarṣimaharṣipannagāḥ; surāś ca bhūtāni suparṇaguhyakāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.128a: praharṣam īyur bahavas tu vānarāḥ; prabuddhapadmapratimair ivānanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:055.128c: apūjayan rāghavam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_06_u:055.129a: sa kumbhakarṇaṃ surasainyamardanaṃ; mahatsu yuddheṣv aparājitaśramam
GE09ram_06_u:055.129c: nananda hatvā bharatāgrajo raṇe; mahāsuraṃ vṛtram ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.002c: rāvaṇaḥ śokasaṃtapto mumoha ca papāta ca
GE09ram_06_u:056.006c: śatrusainyaṃ pratāpyaikaḥ kva māṃ saṃtyajya gacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:056.007a: idānīṃ khalv ahaṃ nāsmi yasya me patito bhujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.007c: dakṣiṇo yaṃ samāśritya na bibhemi surāsurān
GE09ram_06_u:056.008c: kālāgnipratimo hy adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.009a: yasya te vajraniṣpeṣo na kuryād vyasanaṃ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:056.010a: ete devagaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhir gagane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.010c: nihataṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.012a: rājyena nāsti me kāryaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:056.013a: yady ahaṃ bhrātṛhantāraṃ na hanmi yudhi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:056.013c: nanu me maraṇaṃ śreyo na cedaṃ vyarthajīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:056.014a: adyaiva taṃ gamiṣyāmi deśaṃ yatrānujo mama
GE09ram_06_u:056.014c: na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:056.015a: devā hi māṃ hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrvāpakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:056.016a: tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:056.016c: yad ajñānān mayā tasya na gṛhītaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.018a: tasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāto vipāko mama śokadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.018c: yan mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirasto vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:056.019a: iti bahuvidham ākulāntarātmā; kṛpaṇam atīva vilapya kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:056.019c: nyapatad atha daśānano bhṛśārtas; tam anujam indraripuṃ hataṃ viditvā
GE09ram_06_u:057.002a: evam eva mahāvīryo hato nas tāta madhyamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.002c: na tu satpuruṣā rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:057.003a: nūnaṃ tribhuvaṇasyāpi paryāptas tvam asi prabho
GE09ram_06_u:057.003c: sa kasmāt prākṛta iva śokasyātmānam īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:057.004a: brahmadattāsti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyako dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.006c: uddhariṣyāmi te śatrūn garuḍaḥ pannagān iha
GE09ram_06_u:057.007c: tathādya śayitā rāmo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.010a: tato 'ham aham ity evaṃ garjanto nairṛtarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.012c: sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.014a: sa tais tathā bhāskaratulyavarcasaiḥ; sutair vṛtaḥ śatrubalapramardanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.014c: rarāja rājā maghavān yathāmarair; vṛto mahādānavadarpanāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.015a: sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.015c: āśīrbhiś ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:057.023a: tribhiḥ kirīṭais triśirāḥ śuśubhe sa rathottame
GE09ram_06_u:057.026c: bhūṣaṇaiś ca babhau meruḥ prabhābhir iva bhāsvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.027a: sa rarāja rathe tasmin rājasūnur mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.029c: śaktim ādāya tejasvī guhaḥ śatruṣv ivāhave
GE09ram_06_u:057.030c: parigṛhya giriṃ dorbhyāṃ vapur viṣṇor viḍambayan
GE09ram_06_u:057.032a: te pratasthur mahātmāno balair apratimair vṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.033a: tān gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca rathaiś cāmbudanisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.034c: kirīṭinaḥ śriyā juṣṭā grahā dīptā ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:057.035a: pragṛhītā babhau teṣāṃ chatrāṇām āvaliḥ sitā
GE09ram_06_u:057.036a: maraṇaṃ vāpi niścitya śatrūṇāṃ vā parājayam
GE09ram_06_u:057.036c: iti kṛtvā matiṃ vīrā nirjagmuḥ saṃyugārthinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.037a: jagarjuś ca praṇeduś ca cikṣipuś cāpi sāyakān
GE09ram_06_u:057.042a: tad dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.043c: amṛṣyamāṇāḥ paraharṣam ugraṃ; mahābalā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.044c: vicerur udyataiḥ śailair nagāḥ śikhariṇo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:057.045a: ke cid ākāśam āviśya ke cid urvyāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.048c: ke cid rathagatān vīrān gajavājigatān api
GE09ram_06_u:057.049e: celuḥ petuś ca neduś ca tatra rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.050a: tataḥ śailaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca visṛṣṭair harirākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.051c: ākṣiptāḥ kṣipyamāṇāś ca bhagnaśūlāś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.052a: vānarān vānarair eva jagnus te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.052c: rākṣasān rākṣasair eva jaghnus te vānarā api
GE09ram_06_u:057.053a: ākṣipya ca śilās teṣāṃ nijaghnū rākṣasā harīn
GE09ram_06_u:057.053c: teṣāṃ cācchidya śastrāṇi jaghnū rakṣāṃsi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.055c: rudhiraṃ prasrutās tatra rasasāram iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.056a: rathena ca rathaṃ cāpi vāraṇena ca vāraṇam
GE09ram_06_u:057.056c: hayena ca hayaṃ ke cin nijaghnur vānarā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:057.057a: kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiś ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.058a: vikīrṇaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca drumaiś chinnaiś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:057.059a: tasmin pravṛtte tumule vimarde; prahṛṣyamāṇeṣu valī mukheṣu
GE09ram_06_u:057.059c: nipātyamāneṣu ca rākṣaseṣu; maharṣayo devagaṇāś ca neduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.060a: tato hayaṃ mārutatulyavegam; āruhya śaktiṃ niśitāṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:057.061a: sa vānarān saptaśatāni vīraḥ; prāsena dīptena vinirbibheda
GE09ram_06_u:057.061c: ekaḥ kṣaṇenendraripur mahātmā; jaghāna sainyaṃ haripuṃgavānām
GE09ram_06_u:057.066a: yāvad utpāṭayām āsur vṛkṣāñ śailān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.068a: na śekur dhāvituṃ vīrā na sthātuṃ spandituṃ kutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.068c: utpatantaṃ sthitaṃ yāntaṃ sarvān vivyādha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:057.070c: na śekur vānarāḥ soḍhuṃ te vinedur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:057.072a: ye tu pūrvaṃ mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇena pātitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.074a: vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dadarśa narāntakam
GE09ram_06_u:057.076a: gacchainaṃ rākṣasaṃ vīra yo 'sau turagam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.077a: sa bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣpapātāṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:057.080a: tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhir haribhis tvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:057.081c: saṃdaśya daśanair oṣṭhaṃ niśvasya ca bhujaṃgavat
GE09ram_06_u:057.082a: sa prāsam āvidhya tadāṅgadāya; samujjvalantaṃ sahasotsasarja
GE09ram_06_u:057.082c: sa vāliputrorasi vajrakalpe; babhūva bhagno nyapatac ca bhūmau
GE09ram_06_u:057.083a: taṃ prāsam ālokya tadā vibhagnaṃ; suparṇakṛttoragabhogakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:057.083c: talaṃ samudyamya sa vāliputras; turaṃgamasyābhijaghāna mūrdhni
GE09ram_06_u:057.084c: sa tasya vājī nipapāta bhūmau; talaprahāreṇa vikīrṇamūrdhā
GE09ram_06_u:057.085a: narāntakaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; hataṃ turagaṃ patitaṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_06_u:057.085c: sa muṣṭim udyamya mahāprabhāvo; jaghāna śīrṣe yudhi vāliputram
GE09ram_06_u:057.086a: athāṅgado muṣṭivibhinnamūrdhā; susrāva tīvraṃ rudhiraṃ bhṛśoṣṇam
GE09ram_06_u:057.086c: muhur vijajvāla mumoha cāpi; saṃjñāṃ samāsādya visiṣmiye ca
GE09ram_06_u:057.087c: nipātayām āsa tadā mahātmā; narāntakasyorasi vāliputraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:057.089c: babhūva tasmin nihate 'gryavīre; narāntake vālisutena saṃkhye
GE09ram_06_u:057.090a: athāṅgado rāmamanaḥ praharṣaṇaṃ; suduṣkaraṃ taṃ kṛtavān hi vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:057.090c: visiṣmiye so 'py ativīrya vikramaḥ; punaś ca yuddhe sa babhūva harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.001c: devāntakas trimūrdhā ca paulastyaś ca mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.007c: sa vṛkṣaṃ kṛttam ālokya utpapāta tato 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.008a: sa vavarṣa tato vṛkṣāñ śilāś ca kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.008c: tān praciccheda saṃkruddhas triśirā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.009a: parighāgreṇa tān vṛkṣān babhañja ca surāntakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.013c: petatur locane tasya vinanāda sa vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.017c: jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau punar evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:058.019c: hanūmān api vijñāya nīlaś cāpi pratasthatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.020a: tataś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ nīlas triśirase tadā
GE09ram_06_u:058.020c: tad rāvaṇasuto dhīmān bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.022a: tato jṛmbhitam ālokya harṣād devāntakas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:058.024c: devāntako rākṣasarājasūnur; gatāsur urvyāṃ sahasā papāta
GE09ram_06_u:058.025a: tasmin hate rākṣasayodhamukhye; mahābale saṃyati devaśatrau
GE09ram_06_u:058.025c: kruddhas trimūrdhā niśitāgram ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlorasi bāṇavarṣam
GE09ram_06_u:058.026a: sa taiḥ śaraughair abhivarṣyamāṇo; vibhinnagātraḥ kapisainyapālaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.026c: nīlo babhūvātha visṛṣṭagātro; viṣṭambhitas tena mahābalena
GE09ram_06_u:058.027a: tatas tu nīlaḥ pratilabhya saṃjñāṃ; śailaṃ samutpāṭya savṛkṣaṣaṇḍam
GE09ram_06_u:058.027c: tataḥ samutpatya bhṛśogravego; mahodaraṃ tena jaghāna mūrdhni
GE09ram_06_u:058.028a: tataḥ sa śailābhinipātabhagno; mahodaras tena saha dvipena
GE09ram_06_u:058.028c: vipothito bhūmitale gatāsuḥ; papāta varjābhihato yathādriḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.029a: pitṛvyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā triśirāś cāpam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:058.029c: hanūmantaṃ ca saṃkruddho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.030a: hanūmāṃs tu samutpatya hayāṃs triśirasas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:058.030c: vidadāra nakhaiḥ kruddho gajendraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva
GE09ram_06_u:058.032a: divi kṣiptām ivolkāṃ tāṃ śaktiṃ kṣiptām asaṃgatām
GE09ram_06_u:058.032c: gṛhītvā hariśārdūlo babhañja ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:058.033a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorasaṃkāśāṃ śaktiṃ bhagnāṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_06_u:058.037a: sa tasya patataḥ khaḍgaṃ samācchidya mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.038c: utpatya ca hanūmantaṃ tāḍayām āsa muṣṭinā
