GE09ram_06_u:058.040a: sa tasya śīrṣāṇy asinā śitena; kirīṭajuṣṭāni sakuṇḍalāni
GE09ram_06_u:058.040c: kruddhaḥ praciccheda suto 'nilasya; tvaṣṭuḥ sutasyeva śirāṃsi śakraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.041c: petuḥ śirāṃsīndraripor dharaṇyāṃ; jyotīṃṣi muktāni yathārkamārgāt
GE09ram_06_u:058.042a: tasmin hate devaripau triśīrṣe; hanūmata śakraparākrameṇa
GE09ram_06_u:058.042c: neduḥ plavaṃgāḥ pracacāla bhūmī; rakṣāṃsy atho dudruvire samantāt
GE09ram_06_u:058.043a: hataṃ triśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca mahodaram
GE09ram_06_u:058.049a: taṃ purastāt sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānaraṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_06_u:058.051a: sa saṃprāpya cirāt saṃjñām ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.052a: tāṃ gṛhītvā gadāṃ bhīmām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:058.054a: tasmin hate bhrātari rāvaṇasya; tan nairṛtānāṃ balam arṇavābham
GE09ram_06_u:059.005a: sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirīṭī mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.005c: nāma viśrāvayām āsa nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:059.006c: jyāśabdena ca bhīmena trāsayām āsa vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:059.007a: te tasya rūpam ālokya yathā viṣṇos trivikrame
GE09ram_06_u:059.007c: bhayārtā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:059.010a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ rāghavas tu suvismitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.010c: vānarān sāntvayitvā tu vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:059.012a: ya eṣa niśitaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.012c: arciṣmadbhir vṛto bhāti bhūtair iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.015a: ka eṣa rakṣaḥ śārdūlo raṇabhūmiṃ virājayan
GE09ram_06_u:059.019a: viṃśatir daśa cāṣṭau ca tūṇīraratham āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.019c: kārmukāṇi ca bhīmāni jyāś ca kāñcanapiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.020a: dvau ca khaḍgau rathagatau pārśvasthau pārśvaśobhinau
GE09ram_06_u:059.023a: kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tu yasyaitad bhāti vaktraṃ śubhekṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:059.024a: ācakṣva me mahābāho tvam enaṃ rākṣasottamam
GE09ram_06_u:059.024c: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve bhayārtā vidrutā diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.028a: aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe nāge khaḍge dhanuṣi karṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:059.028c: bhede sāntve ca dāne ca naye mantre ca saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.029a: yasya bāhuṃ samāśritya laṅkā bhavati nirbhayā
GE09ram_06_u:059.030c: astrāṇi cāpy avāptāni ripavaś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.031c: etac ca kavacaṃ divyaṃ rathaś caiṣo 'rkabhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.032a: etena śataśo devā dānavāś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.032c: rakṣitāni ca rakṣāmi yakṣāś cāpi niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.033a: vajraṃ viṣṭambhitaṃ yena bāṇair indrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.035a: tad asmin kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ kṣipraṃ puruṣapuṃgava
GE09ram_06_u:059.036c: visphārayām āsa dhanur nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.037a: taṃ bhīmavapuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_06_u:059.038a: kumudo dvivido maindo nīlaḥ śarabha eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:059.039a: teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṃś ca śailāṃś ca śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.040a: tāṃś caiva sarān sa harīñ śaraiḥ sarvāyasair balī
GE09ram_06_u:059.042a: tat sainyaṃ harivīrāṇāṃ trāsayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.042c: mṛgayūtham iva kruddho harir yauvanam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.043a: sa rāṣasendro harisainyamadhye; nāyudhyamānaṃ nijaghāna kaṃ cit
GE09ram_06_u:059.043c: upetya rāmaṃ sadhanuḥ kalāpī; sagarvitaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:059.044a: rathe sthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; na prākṛtaṃ kaṃ cana yodhayāmi
GE09ram_06_u:059.044c: yasyāsti śaktir vyavasāya yuktā; dadātuṃ me kṣipram ihādya yuddham
GE09ram_06_u:059.045a: tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; cukopa saumitrir amitrahantā
GE09ram_06_u:059.045c: amṛṣyamāṇaś ca samutpapāta; jagrāha cāpaṃ ca tataḥ smayitvā
GE09ram_06_u:059.046a: kruddhaḥ saumitrir utpatya tūṇād ākṣipya sāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:059.047a: pūrayan sa mahīṃ śailān ākāśaṃ sāgaraṃ diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.049c: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:059.050a: bālas tvam asi saumitre vikrameṣv avicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.050c: gaccha kiṃ kālasadṛśaṃ māṃ yodhayitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:059.051a: na hi madbāhusṛṣṭānām astrāṇāṃ himavān api
GE09ram_06_u:059.051c: soḍhum utsahate vegam antarikṣam atho mahī
GE09ram_06_u:059.052c: nyasya cāpaṃ nivartasva mā prāṇāñ jahi madgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.053a: atha vā tvaṃ pratiṣṭabdho na nivartitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:059.055a: eṣa te sarpasaṃkāśo bāṇaḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:059.056a: śrutvātikāyasya vacaḥ saroṣaṃ; sagarvitaṃ saṃyati rājaputraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.056c: sa saṃcukopātibalo bṛhacchrīr; uvāca vākyaṃ ca tato mahārtham
GE09ram_06_u:059.057a: na vākyamātreṇa bhavān pradhāno; na katthanāt satpuruṣā bhavanti
GE09ram_06_u:059.057c: mayi sthite dhanvini bāṇapāṇau; vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ durātman
GE09ram_06_u:059.058c: pauruṣeṇa tu yo yuktaḥ sa tu śūra iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.059c: śarair vā yadi vāpy astrair darśayasva parākramam
GE09ram_06_u:059.060a: tataḥ śiras te niśitaiḥ pātayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.062a: bālo 'yam iti vijñāya na māvajñātum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:059.062c: bālo vā yadi vā vṛddho mṛtyuṃ jānīhi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:059.064a: tato vidyādharā bhūtā devā daityā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.064c: guhyakāś ca mahātmānas tad yuddhaṃ dadṛśus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:059.067a: taṃ nikṛttaṃ śaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛttabhogam ivoragam
GE09ram_06_u:059.068c: tān aprāptāñ śarais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.069a: sa tāṃś chittvā śarais tīkṣṇair lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:059.069c: ādade niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:059.070a: tam ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe yojayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.070c: vicakarṣa ca vegena visasarja ca sāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:059.072a: sa lalāṭe śaro magnas tasya bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.074a: cintayām āsa cāśvasya vimṛśya ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.075a: vicāryaivaṃ vinamyāsyaṃ vinamya ca bhujāv ubhau
GE09ram_06_u:059.075c: sa rathopastham āsthāya rathena pracacāra ha
GE09ram_06_u:059.076a: ekaṃ trīn pañca sapteti sāyakān rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.079a: tāñ śarān yudhi saṃprekṣya nikṛttān rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.080a: sa saṃdhāya mahātejās taṃ bāṇaṃ sahasotsṛjat
GE09ram_06_u:059.081c: susrāva rudhiraṃ tīvraṃ madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.082a: sa cakāra tadātmānaṃ viśalyaṃ sahasā vibhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.082c: jagrāha ca śaraṃ tīṣṇam astreṇāpi samādadhe
GE09ram_06_u:059.083c: sa jajvāla tadā bāṇo dhanuś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.085a: tatas taṃ jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śaram āhitam
GE09ram_06_u:059.087a: tāv ubhāv ambare bāṇāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.087c: tejasā saṃpradīptāgrau kruddhāv iva bhujaṃ gamau
GE09ram_06_u:059.089a: tato 'tikāyaḥ saṃkruddhas tv astram aiṣīkam utsṛjat
GE09ram_06_u:059.089c: tat praciccheda saumitrir astram aindreṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:059.091a: tatas tad astraṃ cikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.091c: vāyavyena tad astraṃ tu nijaghāna sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.096a: na śaśāka rujaṃ kartuṃ yudhi tasya narottamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.096c: athainam abhyupāgamya vāyur vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:059.097c: brāhmeṇāstreṇa bhindhy enam eṣa vadhyo hi nānyathā
GE09ram_06_u:059.098a: tataḥ sa vāyor vacanaṃ niśamya; saumitrir indrapratimānavīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.098c: samādade bāṇam amoghavegaṃ; tad brāhmam astraṃ sahasā niyojya
GE09ram_06_u:059.099a: tasmin varāstre tu niyujyamāne; saumitriṇā bāṇavare śitāgre
GE09ram_06_u:059.099c: diśaḥ sacandrārkamahāgrahāś ca; nabhaś ca tatrāsa rarāsa corvī
GE09ram_06_u:059.100a: taṃ brahmaṇo 'streṇa niyujya cāpe; śaraṃ supuṅkhaṃ yamadūtakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:059.100c: saumitrir indrārisutasya tasya; sasarja bāṇaṃ yudhi vajrakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:059.102a: taṃ prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasātikāyo; jaghāna bāṇair niśitair anekaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.102c: sa sāyakas tasya suparṇavegas; tadātivegena jagāma pārśvam
GE09ram_06_u:059.103a: tam āgataṃ prekṣya tadātikāyo; bāṇaṃ pradīptāntakakālakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:059.103c: jaghāna śaktyṛṣṭigadākuṭhāraiḥ; śūlair halaiś cāpy avipannaceṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.104a: tāny āyudhāny adbhutavigrahāṇi; moghāni kṛtvā sa śaro 'gnidīptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:059.104c: prasahya tasyaiva kirīṭajuṣṭaṃ; tadātikāyasya śiro jahāra
GE09ram_06_u:059.105c: papāta sahasā bhūmau śṛṅgaṃ himavato yathā
GE09ram_06_u:059.106a: praharṣayuktā bahavas tu vānarā; prabuddhapadmapratimānanās tadā
GE09ram_06_u:059.106c: apūjayaṃl lakṣmaṇam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_06_u:060.001c: rakṣogaṇās tatra hatāvaśiṣṭās; te rāvaṇāya tvaritaṃ śaśaṃsuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.002a: tato hatāṃs tān sahasā niśamya; rājā mumohāśrupariplutākṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.002c: putrakṣayaṃ bhrātṛvadhaṃ ca ghoraṃ; vicintya rājā vipulaṃ pradadhyau
GE09ram_06_u:060.003a: tatas tu rājānam udīkṣya dīnaṃ; śokārṇave saṃparipupluvānam
GE09ram_06_u:060.003c: atharṣabho rākṣasarājasūnur; athendrajid vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:060.004a: na tāta mohaṃ pratigantum arhasi; yatrendrajij jīvati rākṣasendra
GE09ram_06_u:060.004c: nendrāribāṇābhihato hi kaś cit; prāṇān samarthaḥ samare 'bhidhartum
GE09ram_06_u:060.005c: gatāyuṣaṃ bhūmitale śayānaṃ; śaraiḥ śitair ācitasarvagātram
GE09ram_06_u:060.006a: imāṃ pratijñāṃ śṛṇu śakraśatroḥ; suniścitāṃ pauruṣadaivayuktām
GE09ram_06_u:060.006c: adyaiva rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; saṃtāpayiṣyāmi śarair amoghaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.007c: drakṣyanti me vikramam aprameyaṃ; viṣṇor ivograṃ baliyajñavāṭe
GE09ram_06_u:060.008a: sa evam uktvā tridaśendraśatrur; āpṛcchya rājānam adīnasattvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.009c: jagāma sahasā tatra yatra yuddham ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:060.011a: gajaskandhagatāḥ ke cit ke cit paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.012a: sa śaṅkhaninadair bhīmair bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.016a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā viniryāntaṃ balena mahatā vṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:060.017a: tvam apratirathaḥ putra jitas te yudhi vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.017c: kiṃ punar mānuṣaṃ dhṛṣyaṃ na vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:060.019c: sthāpayām āsa rakṣāṃsi rathaṃ prati samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.022c: lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:060.024c: babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ yāny adarśayan
GE09ram_06_u:060.025c: havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.026a: so 'stram āhārayām āsa brāhmam astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.029a: sa sainyam utsṛjya sametya tūrṇaṃ; mahāraṇe vānaravāhinīṣu
GE09ram_06_u:060.029c: adṛśyamānaḥ śarajālam ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlāmbudharo yathāmbu
GE09ram_06_u:060.031a: te kevalaṃ saṃdadṛśuḥ śitāgrān; bāṇān raṇe vānaravāhinīṣu
GE09ram_06_u:060.031c: māyā nigūḍhaṃ ca surendraśatruṃ; na cātra taṃ rākṣasam abhyapaśyan
GE09ram_06_u:060.032a: tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; sarvā diśo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.032c: pracchādayām āsa raviprakāśair; viṣādayām āsa ca vānarendrān
GE09ram_06_u:060.036a: udīkṣamāṇā gaganaṃ ke cin netreṣu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.036c: śarair viviśur anyonyaṃ petuś ca jagatītale
GE09ram_06_u:060.037c: jāmbavantaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca vegadarśinam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:060.038a: maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ gajagomukhau
GE09ram_06_u:060.039c: pāvakākṣaṃ nalaṃ caiva kumudaṃ caiva vānaram
GE09ram_06_u:060.041a: sa vai gadābhir hariyūthamukhyān; nirbhidya bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.042a: sa bāṇavarṣair abhivarṣyamāṇo; dhārānipātān iva tān vicintya
GE09ram_06_u:060.042c: samīkṣamāṇaḥ paramādbhutaśrī; rāmas tadā lakṣmaṇam ity uvāca
GE09ram_06_u:060.043a: asau punar lakṣmaṇa rākṣasendro; brahmāstram āśritya surendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.043c: nipātayitvā harisainyam ugram; asmāñ śarair ardayati prasaktam
GE09ram_06_u:060.044c: kathaṃ nu śakyo yudhi naṣṭadeho; nihantum adyendrajid udyatāstraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.045a: manye svayambhūr bhagavān acintyo; yasyaitad astraṃ prabhavaś ca yo 'sya
GE09ram_06_u:060.045c: bāṇāvapātāṃs tvam ihādya dhīman; mayā sahāvyagramanāḥ sahasva
GE09ram_06_u:060.046a: pracchādayaty eṣa hi rākṣasendraḥ; sarvā diśaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭijālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.046c: etac ca sarvaṃ patitāgryavīraṃ; na bhrājate vānararājasainyam
GE09ram_06_u:060.047a: āvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā patitau visaṃjñau; nivṛttayuddhau hataroṣaharṣau
GE09ram_06_u:060.047c: dhruvaṃ pravekṣyaty amarārivāsaṃ; asau samādāya raṇāgralakṣmīm
GE09ram_06_u:060.048a: tatas tu tāv indrajid astrajālair; babhūvatus tatra tadā viśastau
GE09ram_06_u:060.048c: sa cāpi tau tatra viṣādayitvā; nanāda harṣād yudhi rākṣasendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:060.049a: sa tat tadā vānararājasainyaṃ; rāmaṃ ca saṃkhye sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_06_u:061.001a: tayos tadā sāditayo raṇāgre; mumoha sainyaṃ hariyūthapānām
GE09ram_06_u:061.001c: sugrīvanīlāṅgadajāmbavanto; na cāpi kiṃ cit pratipedire te
GE09ram_06_u:061.002a: tato viṣaṇṇaṃ samavekṣya sainyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇo buddhimatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.003a: mā bhaiṣṭa nāsty atra viṣādakālo; yad āryaputrāv avaśau viṣaṇṇau
GE09ram_06_u:061.003c: svayambhuvo vākyam athodvahantau; yat sāditāv indrajidastrajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.004a: tasmai tu dattaṃ paramāstram etat; svayambhuvā brāhmam amoghavegam
GE09ram_06_u:061.004c: tan mānayantau yadi rājaputrau; nipātitau ko 'tra viṣādakālaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.005a: brāhmam astraṃ tadā dhīmān mānayitvā tu mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.006c: yo yo dhārayate prāṇāṃs taṃ tam āśvāsayāvahe
GE09ram_06_u:061.007a: tāv ubhau yugapad vīrau hanūmad rākṣasottamau
GE09ram_06_u:061.009c: śastraiś ca patitair dīptair dadṛśāte vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_06_u:061.011a: maindaṃ nalaṃ jyotimukhaṃ dvividaṃ panasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:061.011c: vibhīṣaṇo hanūmāṃś ca dadṛśāte hatān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:061.015a: dṛṣṭvā tam upasaṃgamya paulastyo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:061.015c: kaccid āryaśarais tīrṣṇair na prāṇā dhvaṃsitās tava
GE09ram_06_u:061.016c: kṛcchrād abhyudgiran vākyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:061.017c: pīḍyamānaḥ śitair bāṇair na tvāṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:061.018a: añjanā suprajā yena mātariśvā ca nairṛta
GE09ram_06_u:061.018c: hanūmān vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prāṇān dhārayate kva cit
GE09ram_06_u:061.020a: naiva rājani sugrīve nāṅgade nāpi rāghave
GE09ram_06_u:061.020c: ārya saṃdarśitaḥ sneho yathā vāyusute paraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.022a: tasmiñ jīvati vīre tu hatam apy ahataṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:061.027a: nānyo vikramaparyāptas tvam eṣāṃ paramaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_06_u:061.028c: viśalyau kuru cāpy etau sāditau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:061.029a: gatvā paramam adhvānam upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:061.032c: drakṣyasy oṣadhayo dīptā dīpayantyo diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:061.034a: tāḥ sarvā hanuman gṛhya kṣipram āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:061.036c: hanūmān dṛśyate vīro dvitīya iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.038a: tasya petur nagā bhūmau harivegāc ca jajvaluḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.039c: na śekur vānarāḥ sthātuṃ ghūrṇamāne nagottame
GE09ram_06_u:061.042a: padbhyāṃ tu śailam āpīḍya vaḍavāmukhavan mukham
GE09ram_06_u:061.043c: laṅkāsthā rākṣasāḥ sarve na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:061.045a: sa puccham udyamya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; vinamya pṛṣṭhaṃ śravaṇe nikuñcya
GE09ram_06_u:061.045c: vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābham; āpupluve vyomni sa caṇḍavegaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.046a: sa vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃs tarasā jahāra; śailāñ śilāḥ prākṛtavānarāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:061.047c: jagāma meruṃ nagarājam agryaṃ; diśaḥ prakarṣann iva vāyusūnuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.048a: sa sāgaraṃ ghūrṇitavīcimālaṃ; tadā bhṛśaṃ bhrāmitasarvasattvam
GE09ram_06_u:061.048c: samīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā jagāma; cakraṃ yathā viṣṇukarāgramuktam
GE09ram_06_u:061.049a: sa parvatān vṛkṣagaṇān sarāṃsi; nadīs taṭākāni purottamāni
GE09ram_06_u:061.049c: sphītāñjanāṃs tān api saṃprapaśyañ; jagāma vegāt pitṛtulyavegaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.053a: sa brahmakośaṃ rajatālayaṃ ca; śakrālayaṃ rudraśarapramokṣam
GE09ram_06_u:061.053c: hayānanaṃ brahmaśiraś ca dīptaṃ; dadarśa vaivasvata kiṃkarāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:061.054a: vajrālayaṃ vaiśvaraṇālayaṃ ca; sūryaprabhaṃ sūryanibandhanaṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:061.054c: brahmāsanaṃ śaṃkarakārmukaṃ ca; dadarśa nābhiṃ ca vasuṃdharāyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.055a: kailāsam agryaṃ himavacchilāṃ ca; tatharṣabhaṃ kāñcanaśailam agryam
GE09ram_06_u:061.056c: āplutya taṃ cauṣadhiparvatendraṃ; tatrauṣadhīnāṃ vicayaṃ cakāra
GE09ram_06_u:061.058a: mahauṣadhyas tu tāḥ sarvās tasmin parvatasattame
GE09ram_06_u:061.059a: sa tā mahātmā hanumān apaśyaṃś; cukopa kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:061.060a: kim etad evaṃ suviniścitaṃ te; yad rāghave nāsi kṛtānukampaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.060c: paśyādya madbāhubalābhibhūto; vikīrṇam ātmānam atho nagendra
GE09ram_06_u:061.061a: sa tasya śṛṅgaṃ sanagaṃ sanāgaṃ; sakāñcanaṃ dhātusahasrajuṣṭam
GE09ram_06_u:061.062a: sa taṃ samutpāṭya kham utpapāta; vitrāsya lokān sasurān surendrān
GE09ram_06_u:061.062c: saṃstūyamānaḥ khacarair anekair; jagāma vegād garuḍogravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.063a: sa bhāskarādhvānam anuprapannas; tad bhāskarābhaṃ śikharaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:061.063c: babhau tadā bhāskarasaṃnikāśo; raveḥ samīpe pratibhāskarābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.064a: sa tena śailena bhṛśaṃ rarāja; śailopamo gandhavahātmajas tu
GE09ram_06_u:061.064c: sahasradhāreṇa sapāvakena; cakreṇa khe viṣṇur ivoddhṛtena
GE09ram_06_u:061.065a: taṃ vānarāḥ prekṣya tadā vineduḥ; sa tān api prekṣya mudā nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:061.065c: teṣāṃ samudghuṣṭaravaṃ niśamya; laṅkālayā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.066a: tato mahātmā nipapāta tasmiñ; śailottame vānarasainyamadhye
GE09ram_06_u:061.066c: haryuttamebhyaḥ śirasābhivādya; vibhīṣaṇaṃ tatra ca sasvaje saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.067a: tāv apy ubhau mānuṣarājaputrau; taṃ gandham āghrāya mahauṣadhīnām
GE09ram_06_u:061.067c: babhūvatus tatra tadā viśalyāv; uttasthur anye ca haripravīrāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.068a: tato harir gandhavahātmajas tu; tam oṣadhīśailam udagravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:061.068c: nināya vegād dhimavantam eva; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:062.002a: yato hataḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kumārāś ca niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.003a: ye ye mahābalāḥ santi laghavaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.004a: tato 'staṃ gata āditye raudre tasmin niśāmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:062.004c: laṅkām abhimukhāḥ solkā jagmus te plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.006c: prāsādeṣu ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sasṛjus te hutāśanam
GE09ram_06_u:062.010c: trastānāṃ gacchatāṃ tūrṇaṃ putrān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.011c: adahat pāvakas tatra jajvāla ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.014c: nāditāny acalābhāni veśmāny agnir dadāha saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.019c: rātrau sā dṛśyate laṅkā puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.020a: hastyadhyakṣair gajair muktair muktaiś ca turagair api
GE09ram_06_u:062.021a: aśvaṃ muktaṃ gajo dṛṣṭvā kaccid bhīto 'pasarpati
GE09ram_06_u:062.021c: bhīto bhītaṃ gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kva cid aśvo nivartate
GE09ram_06_u:062.022a: sā babhūva muhūrtena haribhir dīpitā purī
GE09ram_06_u:062.025a: udghuṣṭaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.025c: diśo daśa samudraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cānvanādayat
GE09ram_06_u:062.026a: viśalyau tu mahātmānau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:062.026c: asaṃbhrāntau jagṛhatus tāv ubhau dhanuṣī vare
GE09ram_06_u:062.028a: aśobhata tadā rāmo dhanur visphārayan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:062.028c: bhagavān iva saṃkruddho bhavo vedamayaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.029c: jyāśabdaś cāpi rāmasya trayaṃ vyāpa diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:062.031a: tato rāmaśarān dṛṣṭvā vimāneṣu gṛheṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:062.034a: yaś ca vo vitathaṃ kuryāt tatra tatra vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.035c: sthiteṣu dvāram āsādya rāvaṇaṃ manyur āviśat
GE09ram_06_u:062.036a: tasya jṛmbhitavikṣepād vyāmiśrā vai diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:062.036c: rūpavān iva rudrasya manyur gātreṣv adṛśyata
GE09ram_06_u:062.037a: sa nikumbhaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca kumbhakarṇātmajāv ubhau
GE09ram_06_u:062.037c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho rākṣasair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:062.038a: śaśāsa caiva tān sarvān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.039a: tatas tu coditās tena rākṣasā jvalitāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.039c: laṅkāyā niryayur vīrāḥ praṇadantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.044a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ rākṣasānāṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:062.044c: saṃcacāla plavaṃgānāṃ balam uccair nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:062.045a: javenāplutya ca punas tad rākṣasabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:062.047a: tathaivāpy apare teṣāṃ kapīnām asibhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:062.049a: dehīty anye dadāty anyo dadāmīty aparaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.002a: āhūya so 'ṅgadaṃ kopāt tāḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.002c: gadayā kampanaḥ pūrvaṃ sa cacāla bhṛśāhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.003a: sa saṃjñāṃ prāpya tejasvī cikṣepa śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.003c: arditaś ca prahāreṇa kampanaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:063.004e: āpatantīṃ ca vegena kumbhas tāṃ sāntvayac camūm
GE09ram_06_u:063.005a: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.006a: tasya tac chuśubhe bhūyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:063.009a: maindas tu bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tatra mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:063.010a: tāṃ śilāṃ tu pracikṣepa rākṣasāya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.010c: bibheda tāṃ śilāṃ kumbhaḥ prasannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.012a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa maindo vānarayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.012c: marmaṇy abhihatas tena papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.013a: aṅgado mātulau dṛṣṭvā patitau tau mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:063.014a: tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha kumbhaḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.014c: tribhiś cānyaiḥ śitair bāṇair mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.015a: so 'ṅgadaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kumbho vivyādha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:063.017a: sa praciccheda tān sarvān bibheda ca punaḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.018c: bhruvor vivyādha bāṇābhyām ulkābhyām iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:063.021a: sa ciccheda śitair bāṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ kāyabhedanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.021c: aṅgado vivyathe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sasāda ca mumoha ca
GE09ram_06_u:063.022a: aṅgadaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantam iva sāgare
GE09ram_06_u:063.023a: rāmas tu vyathitaṃ śrutvā vāliputraṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:063.024a: te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śrutvā rāmasya śāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:063.026a: jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.028a: tasya bāṇacayaṃ prāpya na śoker ativartitum
GE09ram_06_u:063.029a: tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā harigaṇāñ śaravṛṣṭibhir arditān
GE09ram_06_u:063.030c: śailasānu caraṃ nāgaṃ vegavān iva kesarī
GE09ram_06_u:063.031a: utpāṭya ca mahāśailān aśvakarṇān dhavān bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:063.031c: anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣāṃś cikṣepa ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.033c: ācitās te drumā rejur yathā ghorāḥ śataghnayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.034a: drumavarṣaṃ tu tac chinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbhena vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:063.035a: nirbhidyamānaḥ sahasā sahamānaś ca tāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:063.036a: avaplutya tataḥ śīghraṃ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:063.036c: abravīt kupitaḥ kumbhaṃ bhagnaśṛṅgam iva dvipam
GE09ram_06_u:063.037a: nikumbhāgraja vīryaṃ te bāṇavegaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:063.037c: saṃnatiś ca prabhāvaś ca tava vā rāvaṇasya vā
GE09ram_06_u:063.040c: kumbhakarṇas tu vīryeṇa sahate ca surāsurān
GE09ram_06_u:063.041c: tvam adya rakṣasāṃ loke śreṣṭho 'si balavīryataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.044a: upālambhabhayāc cāpi nāsi vīra mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.044c: kṛtakarmā pariśrānto viśrāntaḥ paśya me balam
GE09ram_06_u:063.046a: tataḥ kumbhaḥ samutpatya sugrīvam abhipadya ca
GE09ram_06_u:063.047a: tasya carma ca pusphoṭa saṃjajñe cāsya śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:063.048a: tadā vegena tatrāsīt tejaḥ prajvālitaṃ muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:063.050c: sa muṣṭiṃ pātayām āsa kumbhasyorasi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:063.053a: tasmin hate bhīmaparākrameṇa; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:063.053c: mahī saśailā savanā cacāla; bhayaṃ ca rakṣāṃsy adhikaṃ viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:064.005c: kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mṛṣṭābhyāṃ mālayā ca vicitrayā
GE09ram_06_u:064.006a: nikumbho bhūṣaṇair bhāti tena sma parigheṇa ca
GE09ram_06_u:064.007c: prajajvāla saghoṣaś ca vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:064.008c: saha caivāmarāvatyā sarvaiś ca bhavanaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:064.011a: rākṣasā vānarāś cāpi na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:064.011c: hanūmaṃs tu vivṛtyoras tasthau pramukhato balī
GE09ram_06_u:064.012c: balī balavatas tasya pātayām āsa vakṣasi
GE09ram_06_u:064.013a: sthire tasyorasi vyūḍhe parighaḥ śatadhā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:064.014a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:064.017a: tataḥ pusphoṭa carmāsya prasusrāva ca śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:064.017c: muṣṭinā tena saṃjajñe jvālā vidyud ivotthitā
GE09ram_06_u:064.018a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa nikumbho vicacāla ha
GE09ram_06_u:064.023c: utpāṭayām āsa śiro bhairavaṃ nadato mahat
GE09ram_06_u:064.024a: atha vinadati sādite nikumbhe; pavanasutena raṇe babhūva yuddham
GE09ram_06_u:065.001a: nikumbhaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā kumbhaṃ ca vinipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:065.003c: rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva jahi tau savanaukasau
GE09ram_06_u:065.004a: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śūro mānī kharātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.004c: bāḍham ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.006c: ratham ānīyatāṃ śīghraṃ sainyaṃ cānīyatāṃ tvarāt
GE09ram_06_u:065.007c: syandanaṃ ca balaṃ caiva samīpaṃ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_06_u:065.008c: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ me ratham āvaha
GE09ram_06_u:065.009a: atha tān rākṣasān sarvān makarākṣo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_06_u:065.009c: yūyaṃ sarve prayudhyadhvaṃ purastān mama rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.010c: ājñaptaḥ samare hantuṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:065.011a: adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.011c: śākhāmṛgaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ vānarāṃś ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.013a: makarākṣasya tac chrutvā vacanaṃ te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.016c: kṣveḍitāsphoṭitānāṃ ca tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_06_u:065.017a: prabhraṣṭo 'tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sārathes tadā
GE09ram_06_u:065.017c: papāta sahasā caiva dhvajas tasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.018c: caraṇair ākulair gatvā dīnāḥ sāsramukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:065.021c: aham aham iti yuddhakauśalās te; rajanicarāḥ paribabhramur nadantaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.002a: tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahat tad yuddhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:066.007a: tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.007c: nedus te siṃhavad dhṛṣṭā rākṣasā jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.009c: krodhān alasam āviṣṭo vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:066.010a: tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdhaṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:066.010c: tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.011a: yat tadā daṇḍakāraṇye pitaraṃ hatavān mama
GE09ram_06_u:066.012a: dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:066.012c: yan mayāsi na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ tasmin kāle mahāvane
GE09ram_06_u:066.013a: diṣṭyāsi darśanaṃ rāma mama tvaṃ prāptavān iha
GE09ram_06_u:066.014c: ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha tais tvaṃ sameṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:066.015a: bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vaco mama
GE09ram_06_u:066.015c: paśyantu sakalā lokās tvāṃ māṃ caiva raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:066.016a: astrair vā gadayā vāpi bāhubhyāṃ vā mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:066.016c: abhyastaṃ yena vā rāma tena vā vartatāṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:066.018c: triśirā dūṣaṇaś cāpi daṇḍake nihatā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:066.020a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kharaputro niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.021a: tāñ śarāñ śaravarṣeṇa rāmaś ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_06_u:066.021c: nipetur bhuvi te chinnā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.022a: tad yuddham abhavat tatra sametyānyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:066.023c: dhanur muktaḥ svanotkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:066.026a: rāmam uktās tu bāṇaughān rākṣasas tv acchinad raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:066.026c: rakṣomuktāṃs tu rāmo vai naikadhā prācchinac charaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.027a: bāṇaughavitatāḥ sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:066.027c: saṃchannā vasudhā caiva samantān na prakāśate
GE09ram_06_u:066.028a: tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur dhanuś ciccheda rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.028c: aṣṭābhir atha nārācaiḥ sūtaṃ vivyādha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.028e: bhittvā śarai rathaṃ rāmo rathāśvān samapātayat
GE09ram_06_u:066.029c: atiṣṭhad vasudhāṃ rakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_06_u:066.030a: vibhrāmya ca mahac chūlaṃ prajvalantaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.030c: sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:066.031c: bāṇais tu tribhir ākāśe śūlaṃ ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.033c: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhogatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.034a: tad dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūlaṃ makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.034c: muṣṭim udyamya kākutsthaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:066.035a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā patantaṃ vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:066.036a: tenāstreṇa hataṃ rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:066.036c: saṃchinnahṛdayaṃ tatra papāta ca mamāra ca
GE09ram_06_u:066.037a: dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam
GE09ram_06_u:066.038c: dadṛśur atha ca devatāḥ prahṛṣṭā; girim iva vajrahataṃ yathā viśīrṇam
GE09ram_06_u:067.002c: adṛśyo dṛśyamāno vā sarvathā tvaṃ balādhikaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.003c: kiṃ punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:067.004c: yajñabhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit
GE09ram_06_u:067.005c: ājagmus tatra saṃbhrāntā rākṣasyo yatra rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.006c: lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:067.008c: babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ darśayanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:067.009c: havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.011a: sa vājibhiś caturbhis tu bāṇaiś ca niśitair yutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.012c: śaraiś candrārdhacandraiś ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.016a: adya hatvāhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane
GE09ram_06_u:067.017a: kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīṃ hatvā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:067.019a: sa dadarśa mahāvīryau nāgau triśirasāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:067.020a: imau tāv iti saṃcintya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:067.021a: sa tu vaihāyasaṃ prāpya saratho rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:067.021c: acakṣur viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.022c: dhanuṣī saśare kṛtvā divyam astraṃ pracakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.023c: tam astraiḥ surasaṃkāśau naiva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.024a: sa hi dhūmāndhakāraṃ ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.025c: śuśruve caratas tasya na ca rūpaṃ prakāśate
GE09ram_06_u:067.027a: sa rāmaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair dattavaro bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:067.028a: tau hanyamānau nārācair dhārābhir iva parvatau
GE09ram_06_u:067.029c: nikṛtya patagā bhūmau petus te śoṇitokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.030c: tān iṣūn patato bhallair anekair nicakartatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.031a: yato hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:067.032a: rāvaṇis tu diśaḥ sarvā rathenātirathaḥ patan
GE09ram_06_u:067.032c: vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghv astro niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.034a: nāsya veda gatiṃ kaś cin na ca rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:067.034c: na cānyad viditaṃ kiṃ cit sūryasyevābhrasaṃplave
GE09ram_06_u:067.035a: tena viddhāś ca harayo nihatāś ca gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.036a: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:067.037a: tam uvāca tato rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:067.037c: naikasya heto rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyāṃ hantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:067.038c: palāyantaṃ pramattaṃ vā na tvaṃ hantum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:067.039a: asyaiva tu vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyāvo mahābala
GE09ram_06_u:067.040a: tam enaṃ māyinaṃ kṣudram antarhitarathaṃ balāt
GE09ram_06_u:067.041a: yady eṣa bhūmiṃ viśate divaṃ vā; rasātalaṃ vāpi nabhastalaṃ vā
GE09ram_06_u:067.041c: evaṃ nigūḍho 'pi mamāstradagdhaḥ; patiṣyate bhūmitale gatāsuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.042a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; raghupravīraḥ plavagarṣabhair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:067.042c: vadhāya raudrasya nṛśaṃsakarmaṇas; tadā mahātmā tvaritaṃ nirīkṣate
GE09ram_06_u:068.001a: vijñāya tu manas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.003a: sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.004a: indrajit tu tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:068.005a: indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:068.006a: mohanārthaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā sudurmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.007a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tv abhiniryāntaṃ nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.009a: sa dadarśa hatānandāṃ sītām indrajito rathe
GE09ram_06_u:068.011a: tāṃ nirīkṣya muhūrtaṃ tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:068.012a: abravīt tāṃ tu śokārtāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_06_u:068.013a: kiṃ samarthitam asyeti cintayan sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.014c: kṛtvā viśokaṃ nistriṃśaṃ mūrdhni sītāṃ parāmṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:068.015a: taṃ striyaṃ paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.015c: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti māyayā yojitāṃ rathe
GE09ram_06_u:068.017c: brahmarṣīṇāṃ kule jāto rākṣasīṃ yonim āśritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.017e: dhik tvāṃ pāpasamācāraṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_06_u:068.018c: anāryasyedṛśaṃ karma ghṛṇā te nāsti nirghṛṇa
GE09ram_06_u:068.019a: cyutā gṛhāc ca rājyāc ca rāmahastāc ca maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:068.019c: kiṃ tavaiṣāparāddhā hi yad enāṃ hantum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:068.020a: sītāṃ ca hatvā na ciraṃ jīviṣyasi kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:068.021a: ye ca strīghātināṃ lokā lokavadhyaiś ca kutsitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.021c: iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:068.022a: iti bruvāṇo hanumān sāyudhair haribhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.025a: sugrīvas tvaṃ ca rāmaś ca yannimittam ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.025c: tāṃ haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyaiva tava paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.026a: imāṃ hatvā tato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tvāṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_06_u:068.026c: sugrīvaṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi taṃ cānāryaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:068.027a: na hantavyāḥ striyaś ceti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:068.027c: pīḍā karam amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eta tat
GE09ram_06_u:068.028a: tam evam uktvā rudatīṃ sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.030a: tām indrajitstriyaṃ hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:068.030c: mayā rāmasya paśyemāṃ kopena ca niṣūditām
GE09ram_06_u:068.031a: tataḥ khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam
GE09ram_06_u:068.031c: hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:068.032c: vyāditāsyasya nadatas tad durgaṃ saṃśritasya tu
GE09ram_06_u:068.033a: tathā tu sītāṃ vinihatya durmatiḥ; prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sa babhūva rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:068.033c: taṃ hṛṣṭarūpaṃ samudīkṣya vānarā; viṣaṇṇarūpāḥ samabhipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.002a: tān uvāca tataḥ sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.003c: tyaktayuddhasamutsāhāḥ śūratvaṃ kva nu vo gatam
GE09ram_06_u:069.007a: sa tair vānaramukhyais tu hanūmān sarvato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.009a: sa tu śokena cāviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.009c: hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīṃ pātayac chilām
GE09ram_06_u:069.010a: tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:069.011c: viveśa dharaṇīṃ bhittvā sā śilāvyartham udyatā
GE09ram_06_u:069.012a: patitāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu rakṣasāṃ vyathitā camūḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.013a: te drumāṃś ca mahākāyā giriśṛṅgāṇi codyatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.017c: te cāpy anucarāṃs tasya vānarā jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_06_u:069.019a: sa nivārya parānīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.019c: hanūmān saṃnivartadhvaṃ na naḥ sādhyam idaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:069.020c: yannimittaṃ hi yudhyāmo hatā sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_06_u:069.021a: imam arthaṃ hi vijñāpya rāmaṃ sugrīvam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:069.021c: tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_06_u:069.022c: śanaiḥ śanair asaṃtrastaḥ sabalaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:069.023a: sa tu prekṣya hanūmantaṃ vrajantaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:069.024a: yajñabhūmyāṃ tu vidhivat pāvakas tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:069.026a: athendrajid rākṣasabhūtaye tu; juhāva havyaṃ vidhinā vidhānavat
GE09ram_06_u:069.026c: dṛṣṭvā vyatiṣṭhanta ca rākṣasās te; mahāsamūheṣu nayānayajñāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.002a: saumya nūnaṃ hanumatā kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:070.002c: śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ sumahān āyudhasvanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.006a: dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmāṃś ca tad ṛṣkabalam udyatam
GE09ram_06_u:070.007c: śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:070.008a: samare yudhyamānānām asmākaṃ prekṣatāṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.009c: tad ahaṃ bhavato vṛttaṃ vijñāpayitum āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.010c: nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.011a: taṃ bhūmau devasaṃkāśaṃ patitaṃ dṛśya rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:070.014c: anarthebhyo na śaknoti trātuṃ dharmo nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.015a: bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jaṅgamānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_06_u:070.015c: yathāsti na tathā dharmas tena nāstīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.016a: yathaiva sthāvaraṃ vyaktaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_06_u:070.016c: nāyam arthas tathā yuktas tvadvidho na vipadyate
GE09ram_06_u:070.017a: yady adharmo bhaved bhūto rāvaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:070.017c: bhavāṃś ca dharmasaṃyukto naivaṃ vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_06_u:070.018a: tasya ca vyasanābhāvād vyasanaṃ ca gate tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:070.019c: dharmeṇa caratāṃ dharmas tathā caiṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:070.020a: yasmād arthā vivardhante yeṣv adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.020c: kliśyante dharmaśīlāś ca tasmād etau nirarthakau
GE09ram_06_u:070.021c: vadhakarmahato dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kaṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:070.022a: atha vā vihitenāyaṃ hanyate hanti vā param
GE09ram_06_u:070.022c: vidhir ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:070.024a: yadi sat syāt satāṃ mukhya nāsat syāt tava kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:070.024c: tvayā yadīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ tasmāt san nopapadyate
GE09ram_06_u:070.025a: atha vā durbalaḥ klībo balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
GE09ram_06_u:070.025c: durbalo hṛtamaryādo na sevya iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.026a: balasya yadi ced dharmo guṇabhūtaḥ parākrame
GE09ram_06_u:070.026c: dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale
GE09ram_06_u:070.027a: atha cet satyavacanaṃ dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:070.027c: anṛtas tvayy akaruṇaḥ kiṃ na baddhas tvayā pitā
GE09ram_06_u:070.028a: yadi dharmo bhaved bhūta adharmo vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:070.028c: na sma hatvā muniṃ vajrī kuryād ijyāṃ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.029c: sarvam etad yathākāmaṃ kākutstha kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.030a: mama cedaṃ mataṃ tāta dharmo 'yam iti rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:070.030c: dharmamūlaṃ tvayā chinnaṃ rājyam utsṛjatā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:070.031a: arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.032c: vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā
GE09ram_06_u:070.033c: pāpam ārabhate kartuṃ tathā doṣaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_06_u:070.034a: yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.034c: yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.035a: yasyārthāḥ sa ca vikrānto yasyārthāḥ sa ca buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:070.035c: yasyārthāḥ sa mahābhāgo yasyārthāḥ sa mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.036c: rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhis tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:070.038a: harṣaḥ kāmaś ca darpaś ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.039a: yeṣāṃ naśyaty ayaṃ lokaś caratāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE09ram_06_u:070.039c: te 'rthās tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.040a: tvayi pravrajite vīra guroś ca vacane sthite
GE09ram_06_u:070.041a: tad adya vipulaṃ vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:070.042a: ayam anagha tavoditaḥ priyārthaṃ; janakasutā nidhanaṃ nirīkṣya ruṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:070.042c: sahayagajarathāṃ sarākṣasendrāṃ; bhṛśam iṣubhir vinipātayāmi laṅkām
GE09ram_06_u:071.005c: antarduḥkhena dīnātmā kim etad iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_06_u:071.006a: vibhīṣaṇa mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:071.007a: hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.007c: hanūmad vacanāt saumya tato moham upāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.008c: puṣkalārtham idaṃ vākyaṃ visaṃjñaṃ rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:071.009c: tad ayuktam ahaṃ manye sāgarasyeva śoṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:071.010c: sītāṃ prati mahābāho na ca ghātaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:071.011c: vaidehīm utsṛjasveti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.012a: naiva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kuto yudhā
GE09ram_06_u:071.012c: sā draṣṭum api śakyeta naiva cānyena kena cit
GE09ram_06_u:071.013a: vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.013c: caityaṃ nikumbhilāṃ nāma yatra homaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:071.014a: hutavān upayāto hi devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.015a: tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā
GE09ram_06_u:071.015e: sasainyās tatra gacchāmo yāvat tan na samāpyate
GE09ram_06_u:071.016c: sīdate hi balaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ śokakarśitam
GE09ram_06_u:071.017a: iha tvaṃ svastha hṛdayas tiṣṭha sattvasamucchritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.018a: eṣa taṃ naraśārdūlo rāvaṇiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.018c: tyājayiṣyati tat karma tato vadhyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:071.021a: manujavara na kālaviprakarṣo; ripunidhanaṃ prati yat kṣamo 'dya kartum
GE09ram_06_u:071.021c: tvam atisṛja ripor vadhāya bāṇīm; asurapuronmathane yathā mahendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.022a: samāptakarmā hi sa rākṣasendro; bhavaty adṛśyaḥ samare surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:071.022c: yuyutsatā tena samāptakarmaṇā; bhavet surāṇām api saṃśayo mahān
GE09ram_06_u:072.001c: nopadhārayate vyaktaṃ yad uktaṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:072.003a: nairṛtādhipate vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ te vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:072.003c: bhūyas tac chrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:072.004c: yat tat punar idaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.007a: bhūyas tu mama vijāpyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.008a: tyaja rājann imaṃ śokaṃ mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:072.009c: prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaś vca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.010a: raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ me hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.010c: sādhv ayaṃ yātu saumitrir balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.012c: astraṃ brahmaśiraḥ prāptaṃ kāmagāś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.013a: nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahutāgniṃ ca yo ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.013c: tvām ātatāyinaṃ hanyād indraśatro sa te vadhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.013e: ity evaṃ vihito rājan vadhas tasyaiva dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.014c: hate tasmin hataṃ viddhi rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_06_u:072.016a: sa hi brahmāstravit prājño mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.016c: karoty asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān savaruṇān api
GE09ram_06_u:072.018a: rāghavas tu ripor jñātvā māyāvīryaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.019a: yad vānarendrasya balaṃ tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.021a: ayaṃ tvāṃ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.023a: saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī hemacāpadhṛk
GE09ram_06_u:072.025a: adyaiva tasya raudrasya śarīraṃ māmakāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.026a: sa evam uktvā dyutimān vacanaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.027a: so 'bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:072.029a: vānarāṇāṃ sahasrais tu hanūmān bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.031a: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:072.033a: vividham amalaśastrabhāsvaraṃ tad; dhvajagahanaṃ vipulaṃ mahārathaiś ca
GE09ram_06_u:072.033c: pratibhayatamam aprameyavegaṃ; timiram iva dviṣatāṃ balaṃ viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:073.003a: sa tvam indrāśaniprakhyaiḥ śarair avakiran parān
GE09ram_06_u:073.003c: abhidravāśu yāvad vai naitat karma samāpyate
GE09ram_06_u:073.007a: rākṣasāś ca śitair bāṇair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.008c: śabdena mahatā laṅkāṃ nādayan vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.009a: śastrair bahuvidhākāraiḥ śitair bāṇaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.009c: udyatair giriśṛṅgaiś ca ghorair ākāśam āvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:073.010c: niveśayantaḥ śastrāṇi cakrus te sumahad bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:073.011a: tathaiva sakalair vṛkṣair giriśṛṅgaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.013a: svam anīkaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ tu śrutvā śatrubhir arditam
GE09ram_06_u:073.014c: āruroha rathaṃ sajjaṃ pūrvayuktaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.016a: dṛṣṭvaiva tu rathasthaṃ taṃ paryavartata tad balam
GE09ram_06_u:073.017a: tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya sudurāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:073.018a: sa rākṣasānāṃ tat sainyaṃ kālāgnir iva nirdahan
GE09ram_06_u:073.018c: cakāra bahubhir vṛkṣair niḥsaṃjñaṃ yudhi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.021a: parighaiś ca gadābhiś ca kuntaiś ca śubhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.021c: śataśaś ca śataghnībhir āyasair api mudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.022a: ghoraiḥ paraśubhiś caiva bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.023c: teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:073.025a: sa sārathim uvācedaṃ yāhi yatraiṣa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.025c: kṣayam eva hi naḥ kuryād rākṣasānām upekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.026a: ity uktaḥ sārathis tena yayau yatra sa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.028a: tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.028c: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:073.030a: bāhubhyāṃ saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave
GE09ram_06_u:073.030c: vegaṃ sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:073.032c: sa eṣa ratham āsthāya hanūmantaṃ jighāṃsati
GE09ram_06_u:073.034a: ity evam uktas tu tadā mahātmā; vibhīṣaṇenārivibhīṣaṇena
GE09ram_06_u:073.034c: dadarśa taṃ parvatasaṃnikāśaṃ; rathasthitaṃ bhīmabalaṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:074.001a: evam uktvā tu saumitriṃ jātaharṣo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.002a: avidūraṃ tato gatvā praviśya ca mahad vanam
GE09ram_06_u:074.002c: darśayām āsa tat karma lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.005c: nihanti samare śatrūn badhnāti ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.009c: samāhvaye tvāṃ samare samyag yuddhaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_06_u:074.010c: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:074.011a: iha tvaṃ jātasaṃvṛddhaḥ sākṣād bhrātā pitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:074.011c: kathaṃ druhyasi putrasya pitṛvyo mama rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:074.012a: na jñātitvaṃ na sauhārdaṃ na jātis tava durmate
GE09ram_06_u:074.012c: pramāṇaṃ na ca sodaryaṃ na dharmo dharmadūṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:074.013a: śocyas tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaś ca sādhubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.013c: yas tvaṃ svajanam utsṛjya parabhṛtyatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.014a: naitac chithilayā buddhyā tvaṃ vetsi mahad antaram
GE09ram_06_u:074.014c: kva ca svajanasaṃvāsaḥ kva ca nīcaparāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.015a: guṇavān vā parajanaḥ svajano nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:074.015c: nirguṇaḥ svajanaḥ śreyān yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.017c: ajānann iva macchīlaṃ kiṃ rākṣasa vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:074.018c: kule yady apy ahaṃ jāto rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:074.018e: guṇo 'yaṃ prathamo nṝṇāṃ tan me śīlam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:074.019a: na rame dāruṇenāhaṃ na cādharmeṇa vai rame
GE09ram_06_u:074.020c: suhṛdām atiśaṅkāṃ ca trayo doṣāḥ kṣayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.021a: maharṣīṇāṃ vadho ghoraḥ sarvadevaiś ca vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.021c: abhimānaś ca kopaś ca vairitvaṃ pratikūlatā
GE09ram_06_u:074.022c: guṇān pracchādayām āsuḥ parvatān iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:074.023a: doṣair etaiḥ parityakto mayā bhrātā pitā tava
GE09ram_06_u:074.023c: neyam asti purī laṅkā na ca tvaṃ na ca te pitā
GE09ram_06_u:074.024a: atimānī ca bālaś ca durvinītaś ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:074.024c: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:074.025a: adya te vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ kim iha tvaṃ tu vakṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:074.025c: praveṣṭuṃ na tvayā śakyo nyagrodho rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_06_u:074.026a: dharṣayitvā tu kākutsthau na śakyaṃ jīvituṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:074.026e: hatas tvaṃ devatā kāryaṃ kariṣyasi yamakṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:074.027c: na lakṣmaṇasyaitya hi bāṇagocaraṃ; tvam adya jīvan sabalo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:075.004c: tāṃś ca vānaraśārdūlān paśyadhvaṃ me parākramam
GE09ram_06_u:075.007c: adya vo gamayiṣyāmi sarvān eva yamakṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:075.009a: tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya garjitaṃ lakṣmaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:075.010a: uktaś ca durgamaḥ pāraḥ kāryāṇāṃ rākṣasa tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:075.010c: kāryāṇāṃ karmaṇā pāraṃ yo gacchati sa buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:075.011a: sa tvam arthasya hīnārtho duravāpasya kena cit
GE09ram_06_u:075.013a: yathā bāṇapathaṃ prāpya sthito 'haṃ tava rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:075.013c: darśayasvādya tat tejo vācā tvaṃ kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:075.014a: evam ukto dhanur bhīmaṃ parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:075.015c: saṃprāpya lakṣmaṇaṃ petuḥ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:075.017c: śuśubhe lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:075.018a: indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma prasamīkṣyādhigamya ca
GE09ram_06_u:075.020a: adya gomāyusaṃghāś ca śyenasaṃghāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:075.020c: gṛdhrāś ca nipatantu tvāṃ gatāsuṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:075.021c: bhaktaṃ bhrātaram adyaiva tvāṃ drakṣyati mayā hatam
GE09ram_06_u:075.022c: hṛtottamāṅgaṃ saumitre tvām adya nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:075.024a: akṛtvā katthase karma kimartham iha rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:075.024c: kuru tat karma yenāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ tava katthanam
GE09ram_06_u:075.025a: anuktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃ cid apy anavakṣipan
GE09ram_06_u:075.027a: sa śarair āhatas tena saroṣo rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:075.030c: yuyudhāte mahāvīrau grahāv iva nabho gatau
GE09ram_06_u:075.031a: balavṛtrāv iva hi tau yudhi vai duṣpradharṣaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:075.033c: parasparaṃ tau pravavarṣatur bhṛśaṃ; śaraughavarṣeṇa balāhakāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:076.001c: sasarja rākṣasendrāya kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:076.004c: tvara tena mahābāho bhagna eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.005c: mumoca niśitāṃs tasmai sarvān iva viṣolbaṇān
GE09ram_06_u:076.008c: abravīc cainam āsādya punaḥ sa paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.009a: kiṃ na smarasi tad yuddhe prathame matparākramam
GE09ram_06_u:076.009c: nibaddhas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā yadā yudhi viceṣṭase
GE09ram_06_u:076.011a: smṛtir vā nāsti te manye vyaktaṃ vā yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:076.011c: gantum icchasi yasmāt tvaṃ māṃ dharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:076.012a: yadi te prathame yuddhe na dṛṣṭo matparākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.013a: ity uktvā saptabhir bāṇair abhivivyādha lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:076.015a: tad dṛṣṭvendrajitaḥ karma kṛtaṃ rāmānujas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:076.015c: acintayitvā prahasan naitat kiṃ cid iti bruvan
GE09ram_06_u:076.016a: mumoca sa śarān ghorān saṃgṛhya narapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.017c: laghavaś cālpavīryāś ca sukhā hīme śarās tava
GE09ram_06_u:076.018a: naivaṃ śūrās tu yudhyante samare jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.018c: ity evaṃ taṃ bruvāṇas tu śaravarṣair avākirat
GE09ram_06_u:076.019a: tasya bāṇais tu vidhvastaṃ kavacaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:076.020c: indrajit samare śūraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_06_u:076.021a: abhīkṣṇaṃ niśvasantau hi yudhyetāṃ tumulaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:076.022a: astrāṇy astravidāṃ śreṣṭhau darśayantau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.023a: vyapetadoṣam asyantau laghucitraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca
GE09ram_06_u:076.023c: ubhau tu tumulaṃ ghoraṃ cakratur nararākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:076.025a: te gātrayor nipatitā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śarā yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:076.026c: babhañjuś cicchiduś cāpi tayor bāṇāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.027a: sa babhūva raṇe ghoras tayor bāṇamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.027c: agnibhyām iva dīptābhyāṃ satre kuśamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.029a: cakratus tumulaṃ ghoraṃ saṃnipātaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.030a: lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇiṃ yuddhe rāvaṇiś cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:076.030c: anyonyaṃ tāv abhighnantau na śramaṃ pratyapadyatām
GE09ram_06_u:076.033a: tayor atha mahān kālo vyatīyād yudhyamānayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.033c: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:076.034a: atha samarapariśramaṃ nihantuṃ; samaramukheṣv ajitasya lakṣmaṇasya
GE09ram_06_u:076.034c: priyahitam upapādayan mahaujāḥ; samaram upetya vibhīṣaṇo 'vatasthe
GE09ram_06_u:077.001a: yudhyamānau tu tau dṛṣṭvā prasaktau nararākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:077.002a: tato visphārayām āsa mahad dhanur avasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.003c: rākṣasān dārayām āsur vajrā iva mahāgirīn
GE09ram_06_u:077.005a: rākṣasais taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa tadā tu vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.005c: babhau madhye prahṛṣṭānāṃ kalabhānām iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.006c: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle kālajño rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.007c: etac cheṣaṃ balaṃ tasya kiṃ tiṣṭhata harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.008c: rāvaṇaṃ varjayitvā tu śeṣam asya balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:077.009a: prahasto nihato vīro nikumbhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.009c: kumbhakarṇaś ca kumbhaś ca dhūmrākṣaś ca niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.010a: akampanaḥ supārśvaś ca cakramālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.011c: bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tīrtvā laṅghyatāṃ goṣpadaṃ laghu
GE09ram_06_u:077.012a: etāvad iha śeṣaṃ vo jetavyam iha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.013a: ayuktaṃ nidhanaṃ kartuṃ putrasya janitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:077.013c: ghṛṇām apāsya rāmārthe nihanyāṃ bhrātur ātmajam
GE09ram_06_u:077.014a: hantukāmasya me bāṣpaṃ cakśuś caiva nirudhyate
GE09ram_06_u:077.014e: vānarā ghnantuṃ saṃbhūya bhṛtyān asya samīpagān
GE09ram_06_u:077.016a: tatas te kapiśārdūlāḥ kṣveḍantaś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.016c: mumucur vividhān nādān meghān dṛṣṭveva barhiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.017a: jāmbavān api taiḥ sarvaiḥ svayūthair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.017c: aśmabhis tāḍayām āsa nakhair dantaiś ca rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:077.019c: jāmbavantaṃ mṛdhe jaghnur nighnantaṃ rākṣasīṃ camūm
GE09ram_06_u:077.021a: hanūmān api saṃkruddhaḥ sālam utpāṭya parvatāt
GE09ram_06_u:077.022a: sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ pitṛvyasyendrajid yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:077.023a: tau prayuddhau tadā vīrau mṛdhe lakṣmaṇarākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:077.025a: na hy ādānaṃ na saṃdhānaṃ dhanuṣo vā parigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.025c: na vipramokṣo bāṇānāṃ na vikarṣo na vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.027e: tamasā pihitaṃ sarvam āsīd bhīmataraṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:077.028a: na tadānīiṃ vavau vāyur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.028c: svastyas tu lokebhya iti jajalpaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.028e: saṃpetuś cātra saṃprāptā gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.029c: śaraiś caturbhiḥ saumitrir vivyādha caturo hayān
GE09ram_06_u:077.030c: lāghavād rāghavaḥ śrīmāñ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE09ram_06_u:077.031c: prajahau samaroddharṣaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha
GE09ram_06_u:077.034a: te cāsya hayamukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.036a: te nihatya hayāṃs tasya pramathya ca mahāratham
GE09ram_06_u:077.038a: tato mahendrapratimaṃh sa lakṣmaṇaḥ; padātinaṃ taṃ niśitaiḥ śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:077.038c: sṛjantam ādau niśitāñ śarottamān; bhṛśaṃ tadā bāṇagaṇair nyavārayat
GE09ram_06_u:078.001a: sa hatāśvo mahātejā bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.002a: tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantāv anyonyam iṣubhir bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:078.003c: bhartāraṃ na jahur yuddhe saṃpatantas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.004a: sa lakṣmaṇaṃ samuddiśya paraṃ lāghavam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.005a: muktam indrajitā tat tu śaravarṣam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.006c: lalāṭe lakṣmaṇaṃ bāṇaiḥ supuṅkhais tribhir indrajit
GE09ram_06_u:078.008a: sa tathāpy ardito bāṇai rākṣasena mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:078.008c: tam āśu prativivyādha lakṣmaṇaḥ panabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.010c: ghorair vivyadhatur bāṇaiḥ kṛtabhāvāv ubhau jaye
GE09ram_06_u:078.012a: te tasya kāyaṃ nirbhidya rukmapuṅkhā nimittagāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.013a: sa pitṛvyasya saṃkruddha indrajic charam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:078.014a: taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā maheṣuṃ tena saṃhitam
GE09ram_06_u:078.015a: kubereṇa svayaṃ svapne yad dattam amitātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:078.015c: durjayaṃ durviṣahyaṃ ca sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.016a: tābhyāṃ tau dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe saṃhitau sāyakottamau
GE09ram_06_u:078.017a: tau bhāsayantāv ākāśaṃ dhanurbhyāṃ viśikhau cyutau
GE09ram_06_u:078.019a: śarau pratihatau dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:078.020a: susaṃrabdhas tu saumitrir astraṃ vāruṇam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:078.020c: raudraṃ mahedrajid yuddhe vyasṛjad yudhi viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.022c: bhūtair bahubhir ākāśaṃ vismitair āvṛtaṃ babhau
GE09ram_06_u:078.027a: yena śakro mahātejā dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.028a: tad aindram astraṃ saumitriḥ saṃyugeṣv aparājitam
GE09ram_06_u:078.029c: sajyam āyamya durdharśaḥ kālo lokakṣaye yathā
GE09ram_06_u:078.030a: saṃdhāya dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe vikarṣann idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:078.031a: dharmātmā satyasaṃdhaś ca rāmo dāśarathir yadi
GE09ram_06_u:078.031c: pauruṣe cāpratidvandvas tad enaṃ jahi rāvaṇim
GE09ram_06_u:078.032a: ity uktvā bāṇam ākarṇaṃ vikṛṣya tam ajihmagam
GE09ram_06_u:078.033a: tac chiraḥ saśiras trāṇaṃ śrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:078.036a: cukruśus te tataḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.036c: hṛṣyanto nihate tasmin devā vṛtravadhe yathā
GE09ram_06_u:078.039a: vanarair vadhyamānās te śastrāṇy utsṛjya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.040a: dudruvur bahudhā bhītā rākṣasāḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.041a: ke cil laṅkāṃ paritrastāḥ praviṣṭā vānarārditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.041c: samudre patitāḥ ke cit ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.042c: rākṣasānāṃ sahasreṣu na kaś cit pratyadṛśyata
GE09ram_06_u:078.043c: tathā tasmin nipatite rākṣasās te gatā diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.046a: harṣaṃ ca śakro bhagavān saha sarvaiḥ surarṣabhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.047a: śuddhā āpo nabhaś caiva jahṛṣur daityadānavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.051a: kṣveḍantaś ca nadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:078.052c: lakṣmaṇo jayatīty evaṃ vākyaṃ vyaśrāvayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:078.054a: tad asukaram athābhivīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ; priyasuhṛdo yudhi lakṣmaṇasya karma
GE09ram_06_u:078.054c: paramam upalabhan manaḥpraharṣaṃ; vinihatam indraripuṃ niśamya devāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:079.001c: babhūva hṛṣṭas taṃ hatvā śakrajetāram āhave
GE09ram_06_u:079.002a: tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:079.002c: saṃnivartya mahātejās tāṃś ca sarvān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:079.004a: tato rāmam abhikramya saumitrir abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:079.004e: ācacakṣe tadā vīro ghoram indrajito vadham
GE09ram_06_u:079.005a: rāvaṇas tu śiraś chinnaṃ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:079.006c: mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya bhūyaḥ saṃspṛśya ca tvaran
GE09ram_06_u:079.007c: niramitraḥ kṛto 'smy adya niryāsyati hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:079.009a: tvayā lakṣmaṇa nāthena sītā ca pṛthivī ca me
GE09ram_06_u:079.009c: na duṣprāpā hate tv adya śakrajetari cāhave
GE09ram_06_u:079.010a: sa taṃ bhrātaram āśvāsya pāriṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:079.011c: yathā bhavati susvasthas tathā tvaṃ samupācara
GE09ram_06_u:079.012c: ye cānye 'tra ca yudhyantaḥ saśalyā vraṇinas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:079.012e: te 'pi sarve prayatnena kriyantāṃ sukhinas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:079.013a: evam uktaḥ sa rāmeṇa mahātmā hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:079.014a: sa tasya gandham āghrāya viśalyaḥ samapadyata
GE09ram_06_u:079.014c: tadā nirvedanaś caiva saṃrūḍhavraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:079.017a: tathaiva rāmaḥ plavagādhipas tadā; vibhīṣaṇaś carkṣapatiś ca jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:079.017c: avekṣya saumitrim arogam utthitaṃ; mudā sasainyaḥ suciraṃ jaharṣire
GE09ram_06_u:079.018a: apūjayat karma sa lakṣmaṇasya; suduṣkaraṃ dāśarathir mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:079.018c: hṛṣṭā babhūvur yudhi yūthapendrā; niśamya taṃ śakrajitaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:080.001a: tataḥ paulastya sacivāḥ śrutvā cendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:080.003c: lakṣṇanena hataḥ śūraḥ putras te vibudhendrajit
GE09ram_06_u:080.004a: sa taṃ pratibhayaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ putrasya dāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:080.004c: ghoram indrajitaḥ saṃkhye kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:080.006c: jitvendraṃ katham adya tvaṃ lakṣmaṇasya vaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.007a: nanu tvam iṣubhiḥ kruddho bhindyāḥ kālāntakāv api
GE09ram_06_u:080.007c: mandarasyāpi śṛṅgāṇi kiṃ punar lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:080.008a: adya vaivasvato rājā bhūyo bahumato mama
GE09ram_06_u:080.009c: yaḥ kṛte hanyate bhartuḥ sa pumān svargam ṛcchati
GE09ram_06_u:080.010c: hatam indrajitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ svapsyanti nirbhayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.011a: adya lokās trayaḥ kṛtsnāḥ pṛthivī ca sakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:080.013a: yauvarājyaṃ ca laṅkāṃ ca rakṣāṃsi ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:080.013c: mātaraṃ māṃ ca bhāryāṃ ca kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.014a: mama nāma tvayā vīra gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:080.015a: sa tvaṃ jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:080.015c: mama śalyam anuddhṛtya kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.017a: ghoraṃ prakṛtyā rūpaṃ tat tasya krodhāgnimūrchitam
GE09ram_06_u:080.020a: kālāgnir iva saṃkruddho yāṃ yāṃ diśam avaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:080.024a: tasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādāc ca svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.024c: nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:080.026a: tena mām adya saṃyuktaṃ rathastham iha saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:080.026c: pratīyāt ko 'dya mām ājau sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.028a: adya tūryaśatair bhīmaṃ dhanur utthāpyatāṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:080.029c: samīkṣya rāvaṇo buddhyā sītāṃ hantuṃ vyavasyata
GE09ram_06_u:080.030c: dīno dīnasvarān sarvāṃs tān uvāca niśācarān
GE09ram_06_u:080.031c: kiṃ cid eva hataṃ tatra sīteyam iti darśitam
GE09ram_06_u:080.032a: tad idaṃ satyam evāhaṃ kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.032e: ity evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:080.033c: niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.034c: saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:080.035c: ūcuś cānyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.036a: adyainaṃ tāv ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.038c: abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe graho rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:080.041c: vadhiṣyati sanāthāṃ mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.042a: bahuśaś codayām āsa bhartāraṃ mām anuvratām
GE09ram_06_u:080.043a: so 'yaṃ mām anupasthānād vyaktaṃ nairāśyam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.044a: atha vā tau naravyāghrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:080.045a: hanūmato hi tadvākyaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṣudrayā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:080.045c: yady ahaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhena tadāyāsam aninditā
GE09ram_06_u:080.046a: manye tu hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:080.046c: ekaputrā yadā putraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ śroṣyate yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:080.047a: sā hi janma ca bālyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.048a: nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā
GE09ram_06_u:080.048c: agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apo vāpi pravekṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:080.049a: dhig astu kubjām asatīṃ mantharāṃ pāpaniścayām
GE09ram_06_u:080.050a: ity evaṃ maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:080.050c: rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā grahavaśaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:080.052c: hantum icchasi vaidehīṃ krodhād dharmam apāsya hi
GE09ram_06_u:080.053c: striyāḥ kasmād vadhaṃ vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:080.054c: tvam eva tu sahāsmābhī rāghave krodham utsṛja
GE09ram_06_u:080.055c: kṛtvā niryāhy amāvāsyāṃ vijayāya balair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.056a: śūro dhīmān rathī khaḍgī rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.056c: hatvā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:080.057a: sa tad durātmā suhṛdā niveditaṃ; vacaḥ sudharmyaṃ pratigṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:080.057c: gṛhaṃ jagāmātha tataś ca vīryavān; punaḥ sabhāṃ ca prayayau suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.001a: sa praviśya sabhāṃ rājā dīnaḥ paramaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.001c: niṣasādāsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddha iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:081.002a: abravīc ca tadā sarvān balamukhyān mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.004a: ekaṃ rāmaṃ parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:081.005a: atha vāhaṃ śarair tīṣkṇair bhinnagātraṃ mahāraṇe
GE09ram_06_u:081.005c: bhavadbhiḥ śvo nihantāsmi rāmaṃ lokasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.006a: ity evaṃ rākṣasendrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.006c: niryayus te rathaiḥ śīghraṃ nāgānīkaiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.008a: te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.011a: keśān karṇalalāṭāṃś ca nāsikāś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.011c: rakṣasāṃ daśanais tīkṣṇair nakhaiś cāpi vyakartayan
GE09ram_06_u:081.013a: tathā gadābhir gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.015a: tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:081.015c: praviśya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
GE09ram_06_u:081.016a: praviṣṭaṃ tu tadā rāmaṃ meghāḥ sūryam ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:081.017c: raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇy asukarāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:081.018c: dadṛśus te na vai rāmaṃ vātaṃ vanagataṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:081.019a: chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ śarair dagdhaṃ prabhagnaṃ śastrapīḍitam
GE09ram_06_u:081.019c: balaṃ rāmeṇa dadṛśur na ramaṃ śīghrakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:081.020a: praharantaṃ śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam
GE09ram_06_u:081.021a: eṣa hanti gajānīkam eṣa hanti mahārathān
GE09ram_06_u:081.021c: eṣa hanti śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:081.022a: iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:081.023a: na te dadṛśire rāmaṃ dahantam arivāhinīm
GE09ram_06_u:081.024a: te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.024c: punaḥ paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:081.027c: dadṛśū rāmacakraṃ tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.032a: hatair gajapadāty aśvais tad babhūva raṇājiram
GE09ram_06_u:081.033a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:081.033c: sādhu sādhv iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:081.034a: abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_06_u:081.034c: etad astrabalaṃ divyaṃ mama vā tryambakasya vā
GE09ram_06_u:081.035a: nihatya tāṃ rākṣasavāhinīṃ tu; rāmas tadā śakrasamo mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:081.035c: astreṣu śastreṣu jitaklamaś ca; saṃstūyate devagaṇaiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.004a: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.006c: āsasāda vane rāmaṃ kandarpam iva rūpiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:082.007c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā lokavadhyā sā hīnarūpā prakāmitā
GE09ram_06_u:082.008c: sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ kāmayām āsa rākṣasī
GE09ram_06_u:082.011a: tan nimittam idaṃ vairaṃ rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:082.011c: vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:082.012a: na ca sītāṃ daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:082.012c: baddhaṃ balavatā vairam akṣayaṃ rāghaveṇa ha
GE09ram_06_u:082.013a: vaidehīṃ prārthayānaṃ taṃ virādhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:082.015a: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_06_u:082.019c: yuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇenoktaṃ mohāt tasya na rocate
GE09ram_06_u:082.020c: śmaśānabhūtā duḥkhārtā neyaṃ laṅkā purī bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:082.022a: mama putro mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.022c: ity evaṃ śrūyate śabdo rākṣasānāṃ kule kule
GE09ram_06_u:082.023a: rathāś cāśvāś ca nāgāś ca hatāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.023c: raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāś ca padātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.024a: rudro vā yadi vā viṣṇur mahendro vā śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.024c: hanti no rāmarūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.027a: na devā na ca gandharvā na piśācā na rākasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.028a: utpātāś cāpi dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:082.030a: tad idaṃ mānuṣān manye prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:082.032c: uvāca devatāḥ sarvā idaṃ tuṣṭo mahad vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.033a: adya prabhṛti lokāṃs trīn sarve dānavarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.035a: prasannas tu mahādevo devān etad vaco 'bravīt
GE09ram_06_u:082.036a: eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣud yathā dānavān purā
GE09ram_06_u:082.038a: taṃ na paśyāmahe loke yo naḥ śaraṇado bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:082.039a: itīva sarvā rajanīcarastriyaḥ; parasparaṃ saṃparirabhya bāhubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:082.039c: viṣedur ārtātibhayābhipīḍitā; vinedur uccaiś ca tadā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:083.001a: ārtānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ vai kule kule
GE09ram_06_u:083.002a: sa tu dīrghaṃ viniśvasya muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.003c: rākṣasair api durdarśaḥ kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.006a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.006c: codayām āsur avyagrān rākṣasāṃs tān nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:083.007a: te tu sarve tathety uktvā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.012a: naivāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na nadyo nāpi sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.017a: hato bhartā hato bhrātā yāsāṃ ca tanayā hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.018c: karomi vānarair yuddhe yatnāvekṣya talāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_06_u:083.019a: adya gomāyavo gṛdhrā ye ca māṃsāśino 'pare
GE09ram_06_u:083.020a: kalpyatāṃ me rathaśīghraṃ kṣipram ānīyatāṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.021c: balādhyakṣān sthitāṃs tatra balaṃ saṃtvaryatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:083.022a: balādhyakṣās tu saṃrabdhā rākṣasāṃs tān gṛhād gṛhāt
GE09ram_06_u:083.024a: asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlair galābhir musalair halaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.025a: yaṣṭibhir vimalaiś cakrair niśitaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.028c: virūpākṣaś ca durdharṣo rathān āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:083.029a: te tu hṛṣṭā vinardanto bhindata iva medinīm
GE09ram_06_u:083.031c: dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:083.032a: tato naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo diśaś ca timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.032c: dvijāś ca nedur ghorāś ca saṃcacāla ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:083.033a: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaś caskhaluś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.033c: dhvajāgre nyapatad gṛdhro vineduś cāśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.034a: nayanaṃ cāsphurad vāmaṃ savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_06_u:083.034c: vivarṇavadanaś cāsīt kiṃ cid abhraśyata svaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.041c: nirucchvāsā hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.041e: ke cid vibhinnaśirasaḥ ke cic cakṣurvivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:083.042a: daśānanaḥ krodhavivṛttanetro; yato yato 'bhyeti rathena saṃkhye
GE09ram_06_u:083.042c: tatas tatas tasya śarapravegaṃ; soḍhuṃ na śekur hariyūthapās te
GE09ram_06_u:084.001a: tathā taiḥ kṛttagātrais tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.001c: babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhir vṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:084.002c: na śekuḥ sahituṃ dīptaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:084.004c: sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.005c: āsasāda tato yuddhe rāghavaṃ tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:084.006a: sugrīvas tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:084.006c: gulme suṣeṇaṃ nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.007a: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ vīraṃ sa taṃ nikṣipya vānaram
GE09ram_06_u:084.008a: pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāsya sarve yūthādhipāḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:084.009a: sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_06_u:084.014a: virūpākṣaḥ svakaṃ nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.015a: sa taṃ dviradam āruhya virūpākṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.016a: sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:084.017a: so 'tividdhaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kapīndras tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:084.017c: cukrodha ca mahākrodho vadhe cāsya mano dadhe
GE09ram_06_u:084.018a: tataḥ pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.020a: gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:084.022a: sa hi tasyābhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:084.023a: sa tāṃ śilām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:084.025a: sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapis tasya vyasarjayat
GE09ram_06_u:084.027c: mokṣitaṃ cātmano dṛṣṭvā prahāraṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:084.031c: karuṇaṃ ca vinardāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapayo ripum
GE09ram_06_u:084.032a: tathā tu tau saṃyati saṃprayuktau; tarasvinau vānararākṣasānām
GE09ram_06_u:084.032c: balārṇavau sasvanatuḥ sabhīmaṃ; mahārṇavau dvāv iva bhinnavelau
GE09ram_06_u:084.033a: vināśitaṃ prekṣya virūpanetraṃ; mahābalaṃ taṃ haripārthivena
GE09ram_06_u:085.001a: hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyaṃ te mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:085.003a: prakṣīṇaṃ tu balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ valīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.004c: asmin kāle mahābāho jayāśā tvayi me sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:085.006a: evam uktas tathety uktvā rākṣasendraṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.009a: pragṛhya vipulāṃ ghorāṃ mahīdhara samāṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:085.009c: cikṣepa ca mahātejās tad vadhāya harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.010a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.011a: rakṣasā tena bāṇaughair nikṛttā sā sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:085.012a: tāṃ tu bhinnāṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.013a: sa dadarśa tataḥ kruddhaḥ parighaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:085.013c: āvidhya tu sa taṃ dīptaṃ parighaṃ tasya darśayan
GE09ram_06_u:085.016c: papāta sa gadodbhinnaḥ parighas tasya bhūtale
GE09ram_06_u:085.018a: taṃ samudyamya cikṣepa so 'py anyāṃ vyākṣipad gadām
GE09ram_06_u:085.020a: jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ nedatuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.021a: utpetatus tatas tūrṇaṃ jaghnatuś ca parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:085.023a: tathaiva ca mahākhaḍgaṃ carmaṇā patitaṃ saha
GE09ram_06_u:085.025a: dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cobhau tau tūrṇaṃ saṃparīyatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.026a: sa tu śūro mahāvego vīryaślāghī mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.026c: mahācarmaṇi taṃ khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.028c: tad balaṃ rākṣasendrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:085.029a: hatvā taṃ vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nanāda mudito hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:085.029c: cukrodha ca daśagrīvo babhau hṛṣṭaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.001c: aṅgadasya camūṃ bhīmāṃ kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.002c: pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalaṃ vṛntād ivānilaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.003a: keṣāṃ cid iṣubhir bāhūn skandhāṃś cicheda rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.005c: vegaṃ cakre mahābāhuḥ samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_06_u:086.007a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvo vicetanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.007c: sasūtaḥ syandanāt tasmād visaṃjñaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:086.009a: pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhāṃ kruddhaḥ sa vipulāṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:086.009c: aśvāñ jaghāna tarasā syandanaṃ ca babhañja tam
GE09ram_06_u:086.010c: aṅgadaṃ bahubhir bāṇair bhūyas taṃ pratyavidhyata
GE09ram_06_u:086.011c: ṛkṣarājaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.012a: gavākṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_06_u:086.014a: dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān
GE09ram_06_u:086.015a: sa tu kṣipto balavatā parighas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.015c: dhanuś ca saśaraṃ hastāc chirastraṃ cāpy apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:086.017a: sa tu kruddho mahāvego mahāpārśvo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.019c: aṅgado mokṣayām āsa saroṣaḥ sa paraśvadham
GE09ram_06_u:086.020a: sa vīro vajrasaṃkāśam aṅgado muṣṭim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:086.022c: paphāla hṛdayaṃ cāśu sa papāta hato bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:086.023a: tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyaṃ saṃpracukṣubhe
GE09ram_06_u:086.023c: abhavac ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_06_u:087.001c: tasmiṃś ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahābale
GE09ram_06_u:087.002a: āviveśa mahān krodho rāvaṇaṃ tu mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:087.002c: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:087.004c: praśākhā yasya sugrīvo jāmbavān kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.005a: sa diśo daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasyātiratho mahān
GE09ram_06_u:087.007c: nirdadāha kapīn sarvāṃs te prapetuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.009a: sa dadarśa tato rāmaṃ tiṣṭhantam aparājitam
GE09ram_06_u:087.009c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:087.011a: vānarāṃś ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:087.011c: samīkṣya rāghavo hṛṣṭo madhye jagrāha kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:087.012a: visphārayitum ārebhe tataḥ sa dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:087.013c: sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśisūryayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.014c: śabdena rākṣasās tena petuś ca śataśas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:087.015a: tam icchan prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ lakṣmaṇo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.017a: ekam ekena bāṇena tribhis trīn daśabhir daśa
GE09ram_06_u:087.018c: āsasāda tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivācalam
GE09ram_06_u:087.021a: tāñ śaraughāṃs tato bhallais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.022a: rāghavo rāvaṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rāvaṇo rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:087.023a: ceratuś ca ciraṃ citraṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyadakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:087.025a: saṃtataṃ vividhair bāṇair babhūva gaganaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:087.027a: śarāndhakāraṃ tau bhīmaṃ cakratuḥ paramaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:087.029c: ubhau cāstravidāṃ mukhyāv ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.030a: ubhau hi yena vrajatas tena tena śarormayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.030c: ūrmayo vāyunā viddhā jagmuḥ sāgarayor iva
GE09ram_06_u:087.032c: śirasā dhārayan rāmo na vyathāṃ pratyapadyata
GE09ram_06_u:087.033a: atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan
GE09ram_06_u:087.034a: mumoca ca mahātejāś cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:087.035c: avadhye rākṣasendrasya na vyathāṃ janayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:087.036a: punar evātha taṃ rāmo rathasthaṃ rākṣasādhipam
GE09ram_06_u:087.040c: pañcāsyāṃl lelihānāṃś ca sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:087.042a: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:087.042c: rāmaṃ prati mahātejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:087.046c: vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe jagmuś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:087.047c: hṛṣṭā nedus tataḥ sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.001c: krodhaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ cakre krodhāc cāstram anantaram
GE09ram_06_u:088.002a: mayena vihitaṃ raudram anyad astraṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.003a: tataḥ śūlāni niścerur gadāś ca musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:088.004c: niṣpetur vividhās tīkṣṇā vātā iva yugakṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:088.005a: tad astraṃ rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.007a: tataś cakrāṇi niṣpetur bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:088.008a: tair āsīd gaganaṃ dīptaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.008c: patadbhiś ca diśo dīptaiś candrasūryagrahair iva
GE09ram_06_u:088.009a: tāni ciccheda bāṇaughaiś cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.010a: tad astraṃ tu hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.010c: vivyādha daśabhir bāṇai rāmaṃ sarveṣu marmasu
GE09ram_06_u:088.012c: rāghavas tu susaṃkruddho rāvaṇaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.014c: dhvajaṃ manuṣyaśīrṣaṃ tu tasya ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_06_u:088.016a: tasya bāṇaiś ca ciccheda dhanur gajakaropamam
GE09ram_06_u:088.018c: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ bhrātaraṃ prati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.019a: tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāśaktir dīptāṃ dīptāśanīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:088.020a: aprāptām eva tāṃ bāṇais tribhiś ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.021a: sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcanamālinī
GE09ram_06_u:088.024a: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇas taṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:088.025a: taṃ vimokṣayituṃ vīraś cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.027a: mokṣitaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.028a: mokṣitas te balaślāghin yasmād evaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.029a: eṣā te hṛdayaṃ bhittvā śaktir lohitalakṣaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:088.030a: ity evam uktvā tāṃ śaktim aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ mahāsvanām
GE09ram_06_u:088.031c: rāvaṇaḥ paramakruddhaś cikṣepa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:088.033a: tām anuvyāharac chaktim āpatantīṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.033c: svastyas tu lakṣmaṇāyeti moghā bhava hatodyamā
GE09ram_06_u:088.038a: na viṣādasya kālo 'yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.038c: cakre sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.039a: sa dadarśa tato rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnaṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:088.040a: tām api prahitāṃ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_06_u:088.040c: yatnatas te hariśreṣṭhā na śekur avamarditum
GE09ram_06_u:088.041c: tāṃ karābhyāṃ parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktiṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_06_u:088.041e: babhañja samare kruddho balavad vicakarṣa ca
GE09ram_06_u:088.043a: acintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣyā ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:088.043c: abravīc ca hanūmantaṃ sugrīvaṃ caiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.045a: asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.045c: arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.046c: vaidehyāś ca parāmarśaṃ rakṣobhiś ca samāgamam
GE09ram_06_u:088.047a: prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ kleśaṃ ca nirayopamam
GE09ram_06_u:088.047c: adya sarvam ahaṃ tyakṣye hatvā taṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:088.048a: yadarthaṃ vānaraṃ sainyaṃ samānītam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:088.048c: sugrīvaś ca kṛto rājye nihatvā vālinaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:088.049a: yadarthaṃ sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setur baddhaś ca sāgare
GE09ram_06_u:088.049c: so 'yam adya raṇe pāpaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.052a: adya rāmasya rāmatvaṃ paśyantu mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:088.053a: adya karma kariṣyāmi yal lokāḥ sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.055a: atha pradīptair nārācair musalaiś cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.055c: abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.056c: śarāṇāṃ ca śarāṇāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.057a: te bhinnāś ca vikīrṇāś ca rāmarāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:088.059c: bhayāt pradudrāva sametya rāvaṇo; yathānilenābhihato balāhakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.001a: sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.001c: visṛjan eva bāṇaughān suṣeṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:089.002c: sarpavad veṣṭate vīro mama śokam udīrayan
GE09ram_06_u:089.003a: śoṇitārdram imaṃ vīraṃ prāṇair iṣṭataraṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:089.003c: paśyato mama kā śaktir yoddhuṃ paryākulātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.004a: ayaṃ sa samaraślāghī bhrātā me śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.004c: yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇair me kiṃ sukhena vā
GE09ram_06_u:089.005a: lajjatīva hi me vīryaṃ bhraśyatīva karād dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.005e: cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā copajāyate
GE09ram_06_u:089.007a: na hi yuddhena me kāryaṃ naiva prāṇair na sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:089.008a: kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ prāṇair yuddhe kāryaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:089.009a: rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:089.010a: na cāsya vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ nāpi śyāmaṃ na niṣprabham
GE09ram_06_u:089.010c: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca mukham asyābhilakṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:089.011c: evaṃ na vidyate rūpaṃ gatāsūnāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_06_u:089.011e: māṃ viṣādaṃ kṛtvā vīra saprāṇo 'yam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:089.012c: socchvāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ vīra kampamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.013a: evam uktvā tu vākyajñaḥ suṣeṇo rāghavaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.014a: saumya śīghram ito gatvā śailam oṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_06_u:089.014c: pūrvaṃ hi kathito yo 'sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.015a: dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya
GE09ram_06_u:089.017a: ity evam ukto hanumān gatvā cauṣadhiparvatam
