GE09ram_06_u:089.017c: cintām abhyagamac chrīmān ajānaṃs tā mahauṣadhīḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.018c: idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.019c: kālātyayena doṣaḥ syād vaiklavyaṃ ca mahad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:089.020a: iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.020c: utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanūmāñ śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.021c: tad idaṃ śikharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ gires tasyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:089.025a: samutthitaṃ te harayo bhūtalāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:089.025c: sādhu sādhv iti suprītāḥ suṣeṇaṃ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:089.026a: ehy ehīty abravīd rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:089.027a: abravīc ca pariṣvajya saumitriṃ rāghavas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:089.027c: diṣṭyā tvāṃ vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:089.028a: na hi me jīvitenārthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā
GE09ram_06_u:089.028c: ko hi me jīvitenārthas tvayi pañcatvam āgate
GE09ram_06_u:089.029a: ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.029c: khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:089.030c: laghuḥ kaś cid ivāsattvo naivaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:089.031a: na pratijñāṃ hi kurvanti vitathāṃ sādhavo 'nagha
GE09ram_06_u:089.031c: lakṣmaṇaṃ hi mahat tv asya pratijñāparipālanam
GE09ram_06_u:089.032a: nairāśyam upagantuṃ te tad alaṃ matkṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_06_u:089.033a: na jīvan yāsyate śatrus tava bāṇapathaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.034a: ahaṃ tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:089.034c: yāvad astaṃ na yāty eṣa kṛtakarmā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.001a: lakṣmaṇena tu tad vākyam uktaṃ śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.002a: daśagrīvo rathasthas tu rāmaṃ vajropamaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.004c: na samaṃ yuddham ity āhur devagandharvadānavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.008a: abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sapratodo rathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.010c: śarāś cādityasaṃkāśāḥ śaktiś ca vimalā śitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.011a: āruhyemaṃ rathaṃ vīra rākṣasaṃ jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:090.011c: mayā sārathinā rāma mahendra iva dānavān
GE09ram_06_u:090.012a: ity uktaḥ sa parikramya rathaṃ tam abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:090.012c: āruroha tadā rāmo lokāṃl lakṣmyā virājayan
GE09ram_06_u:090.013c: rāmasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.014a: sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvaṃ daivaṃ daivena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.015a: astraṃ tu paramaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ rākasādhipa
GE09ram_06_u:090.017a: te dīptavadanā dīptaṃ vamanto jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.018c: diśaś ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś ca samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.019a: tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatata āhave
GE09ram_06_u:090.021a: te tān sarvāñ śarāñ jaghnuḥ sarparūpān mahājavān
GE09ram_06_u:090.024a: pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketuṃ ca kāñcanam
GE09ram_06_u:090.025c: rāmam ārtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:090.027a: prājāpatyaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ rohiṇīṃ śaśinaḥ priyām
GE09ram_06_u:090.028c: utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśann iva divākaram
GE09ram_06_u:090.033a: sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīṃ kruddhaḥ kiṃ cit saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.001a: tasya kruddhasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.002c: babhūva cāpi kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.004a: rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddham utpātāṃś ca sudāruṇān
GE09ram_06_u:091.005a: vimānasthās tadā devā gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.007a: ūcuḥ surāsurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.008c: devā rāmam athocus te tvaṃ jayeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.009a: etasminn antare krodhād rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.012c: pradīpta iva roṣeṇa śūlaṃ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.013a: tac chūlaṃ paramakruddho madhye jagrāha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:091.015a: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:091.017a: sa gṛhītvā mahāvīryaḥ śūlaṃ tad rāvaṇo mahat
GE09ram_06_u:091.018a: śūlo 'yaṃ vajrasāras te rāma roṣān mayodyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.019c: tvāṃ nihatya raṇaślāghin karomi tarasā samam
GE09ram_06_u:091.020a: tiṣṭhedānīṃ nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:091.020c: evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tac chūlaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.026a: sā kṣiptā rākṣasendrasya tasmiñ śūle papāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:091.026c: bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahāñ śūlo nipapāta gatadyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.027a: nirbibheda tato bāṇair hayān asya mahājavān
GE09ram_06_u:091.027c: rāmas tīkṣṇair mahāvegair vajrakalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:091.030c: jagāma khedaṃ ca samājamadhye; krodhaṃ ca cakre subhṛśaṃ tadānīm
GE09ram_06_u:092.001a: sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthenārdito raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:092.002a: sa dīptanayano roṣāc cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:092.003a: bāṇadhārā sahasrais tu sa toyada ivāmbarāt
GE09ram_06_u:092.003c: rāghavaṃ rāvaṇo bāṇais taṭākam iva pūrayat
GE09ram_06_u:092.005a: sa śaraiḥ śarajālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:092.010c: uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vīraḥ prahasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:092.011c: hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ nāsi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:092.012c: vaidehīṃ prasabhaṃ hṛtvā śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:092.013c: kṛtvā kāpuruṣaṃ karma śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:092.014c: darpān mṛtyum upādāya śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:092.015c: ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ karma mahat tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:092.017c: naiva lajjāsti te sītāṃ coravad vyapakarṣataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:092.018a: yadi matsaṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:092.018c: bhrātaraṃ tu kharaṃ paśyes tadā matsāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:092.019c: adya tvāṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:092.020a: adya te maccharaiś chinnaṃ śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:092.021a: nipatyorasi gṛdhrās te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:092.023a: ity evaṃ sa vadan vīro rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:092.024a: babhūva dviguṇaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ harṣaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:092.028a: yadā ca śastraṃ nārebhe na vyakarṣac charāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:092.029a: kṣiptāś cāpi śarās tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:092.030a: sūtas tu rathanetāsya tadavasthaṃ nirīkṣya tam
GE09ram_06_u:093.002c: bhīruṃ laghum ivāsattvaṃ vihīnam iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:093.003a: vimuktam iva māyābhir astrair iva bahiṣkṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:093.003c: mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase
GE09ram_06_u:093.004a: kimarthaṃ mām avajñāya macchandam anavekṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:093.005c: yaśo vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca pratyayaś ca vināśitha
GE09ram_06_u:093.007a: yas tvaṃ ratham imaṃ mohān na codvahasi durmate
GE09ram_06_u:093.007c: satyo 'yaṃ pratitarko me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.008a: na hīdaṃ vidyate karma suhṛdo hitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.008c: ripūṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ caitan na tvayaitat svanuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_06_u:093.009a: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ yāvan nāpaiti me ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.009c: yadi vāpy uṣito 'si tvaṃ smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.010a: evaṃ paruṣam uktas tu hitabuddhir abuddhinā
GE09ram_06_u:093.010c: abravīd rāvaṇaṃ sūto hitaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.011a: na bhīto 'smi na mūḍho 'smi nopajapto 'smi śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.011c: na pramatto na niḥsneho vismṛtā na ca satkriyā
GE09ram_06_u:093.012a: mayā tu hitakāmena yaśaś ca parirakṣatā
GE09ram_06_u:093.013a: nāsminn arthe mahārāja tvaṃ māṃ priyahite ratam
GE09ram_06_u:093.013c: kaś cil laghur ivānāryo doṣato gantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:093.015c: na hi te vīra saumukhyaṃ praharṣaṃ vopadhāraye
GE09ram_06_u:093.017a: nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.018c: dainyaṃ harṣaś ca khedaś ca rathinaś ca balābalam
GE09ram_06_u:093.019a: sthalanimnāni bhūmeś ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:093.021c: raudraṃ varjayatā khedaṃ kṣamaṃ kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:093.022a: na mayā svecchayā vīra ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.023c: tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vīraṃ gatānṛṇyena cetasā
GE09ram_06_u:093.024a: saṃtuṣṭas tena vākyena rāvaṇas tasya sāratheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.025a: rathaṃ śīghram imaṃ sūta rāghavābhimukhaṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:093.026a: evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.026c: dadau tasya śubhaṃ hy ekaṃ hastābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:093.027a: tato drutaṃ rāvaṇavākyacoditaḥ; pracodayām āsa hayān sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:093.027c: sa rākṣasendrasya tato mahārathaḥ; kṣaṇena rāmasya raṇāgrato 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:094.003a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.004a: mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.004e: samare hantum ātmānaṃ tathānena kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.005a: tad apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.007c: yuyutsur aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:094.008a: parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.013a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.016c: yena yena ratho yāti tena tena pradhāvati
GE09ram_06_u:094.019a: rāvaṇaś ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:094.019c: rakṣasāṃ ca praharatāṃ gṛhītā iva bāhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.020a: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.021a: gṛdhrair anugatāś cāsya vamantyo jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.021c: praṇedur mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.022a: pratikūlaṃ vavau vāyū raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran
GE09ram_06_u:094.024a: diśaś ca pradiśaḥ sarvā babhūvus timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.025a: kurvantyaḥ kalahaṃ ghoraṃ sārikās tadrathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:094.026c: mumucus tasya turagās tulyam agniṃ ca vāri ca
GE09ram_06_u:094.028a: rāmasyāpi nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:094.029a: tato nirīkṣyātmagatāni rāghavo; raṇe nimittāni nimittakovidaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:094.029c: jagāma harṣaṃ ca parāṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ; cakāra yuddhe 'bhyadhikaṃ ca vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:095.002a: tato rākṣasasainyaṃ ca harīṇāṃ ca mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:095.004c: tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmaṃ nābhijaghnuḥ parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:095.005a: rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇaṃ cāpi vānarāṇāṃ ca rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:095.006a: tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghavarāvaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:095.007a: jetavyam iti kākutstho martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:095.008a: tataḥ krodhād daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:095.008c: mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:095.012a: jagāma sa mahīṃ bhittvā daśagrīvadhvajaṃ śaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:095.014a: sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahad vaman
GE09ram_06_u:095.014c: rāmasya turagān divyāñ śarair vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:095.015a: te viddhā harayas tasya nāskhalan nāpi babhramuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:095.016a: teṣām asaṃbhramaṃ dṛṣṭvā vājināṃ rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:095.016c: bhūya eva susaṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_06_u:095.017a: gadāś ca parighāṃś caiva cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:095.018a: māyā vihitam etat tu śastravarṣam apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:095.021a: vyāyacchamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatparaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:095.021c: prahasann iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe sāyakāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:095.022a: sa mumoca tato bāṇān raṇe śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:095.022c: tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaś cakre svaśaraiḥ khaṃ nirantaram
GE09ram_06_u:095.025c: cakratus tau śaraughais tu nirucchvāsam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_06_u:095.026a: rāvaṇasya hayān rāmo hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.001a: tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāmarāvaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:096.002a: ardayantau tu samare tayos tau syandanottamau
GE09ram_06_u:096.003a: maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gatapratyāgatāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:096.004a: ardayan rāvaṇaṃ rāmo rāghavaṃ cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.006a: darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatiṃ bahuvidhāṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:096.007a: dhuraṃ dhureṇa rathayor vaktraṃ vaktreṇa vājinām
GE09ram_06_u:096.007c: patākāś ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayos tadā
GE09ram_06_u:096.008a: rāvaṇasya tato rāmo dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.010c: jagāma na vikāraṃ ca na cāpi vyathito 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:096.012a: mātales tu mahāvegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.012c: na sūkṣmam api saṃmohaṃ vyathāṃ vā pradadur yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:096.013a: tayā dharṣaṇayā kroddho mātaler na tathātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.014c: mumoca rāghavo vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.015a: gadānāṃ musalānāṃ ca parighāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.016c: vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.017c: bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cābhūn na vavau cāpi mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.018a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.021a: tac chiraḥ patitaṃ bhūmau dṛṣṭaṃ lokais tribhis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:096.023a: chinnamātraṃ ca tac chīrṣaṃ punar anyat sma dṛśyate
GE09ram_06_u:096.023c: tad apy aśanisaṃkāśaiś chinnaṃ rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.024a: evam eva śataṃ chinnaṃ śirasāṃ tulyavarcasām
GE09ram_06_u:096.025c: mārgaṇair bahubhir yuktaś cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.026a: mārīco nihato yais tu kharo yais tu sudūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.026c: krañcāraṇye virādhas tu kabandho daṇḍakā vane
GE09ram_06_u:096.027a: ta ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikā mama
GE09ram_06_u:096.027c: kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāvaṇe mandatejasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:096.028a: iti cintāparaś cāsīd apramattaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:096.030c: paśyatāṃ tan mahad yuddhaṃ sarvarātram avartata
GE09ram_06_u:096.031a: naiva ratriṃ na divasaṃ na muhūrtaṃ na cakṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:097.001a: atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavaṃ mātalis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:097.001c: ajānann iva kiṃ vīra tvam enam anuvartase
GE09ram_06_u:097.002a: visṛjāsmai vadhāya tvam astraṃ paitāmahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_06_u:097.002c: vināśakālaḥ kathito yaḥ suraiḥ so 'dya vartate
GE09ram_06_u:097.003a: tataḥ saṃsmārito rāmas tena vākyena mātaleḥ
GE09ram_06_u:097.003c: jagrāha sa śaraṃ dīptaṃ niśvasantam ivoragam
GE09ram_06_u:097.004a: yam asmai prathamaṃ prādād agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:097.004c: brahmadattaṃ mahad bāṇam amoghaṃ yudhi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:097.008a: sadhūmam iva kālāgniṃ dīptam āśīviṣaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:097.009a: dvārāṇāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca girīṇām api bhedanam
GE09ram_06_u:097.014a: abhimantrya tato rāmas taṃ maheṣuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:097.015a: sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:097.015c: cikṣepa param āyattas taṃ śaraṃ marmaghātinam
GE09ram_06_u:097.020a: tasya hastād dhatasyāśu kārmukaṃ tat sasāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:097.021c: papāta syandanād bhūmau vṛtro vajrahato yathā
GE09ram_06_u:097.022a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:097.024a: arditā vānarair hṛṣṭair laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:097.025c: vadanto rāghavajayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca taṃ vadham
GE09ram_06_u:097.028a: rāghavas tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve
GE09ram_06_u:097.028c: sādhu sādhv iti vāg agryā devatānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:097.029a: āviveśa mahān harṣo devānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:097.030a: tataḥ sakāmaṃ sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:097.031a: tataḥ prajagmuḥ praśamaṃ marudgaṇā; diśaḥ prasedur vimalaṃ nabho 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:097.031c: mahī cakampe na ca mārutā vavuḥ; sthiraprabhaś cāpy abhavad divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:097.032a: tatas tu sugrīvavibhīṣaṇādayaḥ; suhṛdviśeṣāḥ sahalakṣmaṇās tadā
GE09ram_06_u:097.032c: sametya hṛṣṭā vijayena rāghavaṃ; raṇe 'bhirāmaṃ vidhinābhyapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:097.033a: sa tu nihataripuḥ sthirapratijñaḥ; svajanabalābhivṛto raṇe rarāja
GE09ram_06_u:098.004a: āryaputreti vādinyo hā nātheti ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.007a: tāḥ patiṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_06_u:098.007c: nipetus tasya gātreṣu chinnā vanalatā iva
GE09ram_06_u:098.008a: bahumānāt pariṣvajya kā cid enaṃ ruroda ha
GE09ram_06_u:098.008c: caraṇau kā cid āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe 'valambya ca
GE09ram_06_u:098.009a: uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cid bhūmau sma parivartate
GE09ram_06_u:098.009c: hatasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā cin moham upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:098.010a: kā cid aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī
GE09ram_06_u:098.010c: snāpayantī mukhaṃ bāṣpais tuṣārair iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_06_u:098.011a: evam ārtāḥ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:098.011c: cukruśur bahudhā śokād bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan
GE09ram_06_u:098.012a: yena vitrāsitaḥ śakro yena vitrāsito yamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.013a: gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:098.013c: bhayaṃ yena mahad dattaṃ so 'yaṃ śete raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.014a: asurebhyaḥ surebhyo vā pannagebhyo 'pi vā tathā
GE09ram_06_u:098.014c: na bhayaṃ yo vijānāti tasyedaṃ mānuṣād bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:098.015c: hataḥ so 'yaṃ raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā
GE09ram_06_u:098.016a: yo na śakyaḥ surair hantuṃ na yakṣair nāsurais tathā
GE09ram_06_u:098.016c: so 'yaṃ kaś cid ivāsattvo mṛtyuṃ martyena lambhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.017a: evaṃ vadantyo bahudhā rurudus tasya tāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.017c: bhūya eva ca duḥkhārtā vilepuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.018c: etāḥ samam idānīṃ te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.019a: bruvāṇo 'pi hitaṃ vākyam iṣṭo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.020a: yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:098.020c: na naḥ syād vyasanaṃ ghoram idaṃ mūlaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:098.021a: vṛttakāmo bhaved bhrātā rāmo mitrakulaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:098.021c: vayaṃ cāvidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sakāmā na ca śatravaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:098.022a: tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītāṃ saṃrundhatā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:098.022c: rākṣasā vayam ātmā ca trayaṃ tulaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:098.023a: na kāmakāraḥ kāmaṃ vā tava rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_06_u:098.023c: daivaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hataṃ daivena hanyate
GE09ram_06_u:098.024a: vānarāṇāṃ vināśo 'yaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca te raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:098.025a: naivārthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na cājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:099.001c: jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:099.003c: kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ trasyaty api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.004a: ṛṣayaś ca mahīdevā gandharvāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.004c: nanu nāma tavodvegāc cāraṇāś ca diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.005a: sa tvaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.005c: na vyapatrapase rājan kim idaṃ rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:099.006a: kathaṃ trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa cānvitam
GE09ram_06_u:099.009a: indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvaṇaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:099.009c: smaradbhir iva tad vairam indriyair eva nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.010a: atha vā rāmarūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.011a: yadaiva hi janasthāne rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.011c: kharas tava hato bhrātā tadaivāsau na mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.012a: yadaiva nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ duṣpraveṣāṃ surair api
GE09ram_06_u:099.012c: praviṣṭo hanumān vīryāt tadaiva vyathitā vayam
GE09ram_06_u:099.013a: kriyatām avirodhaś ca rāghaveṇeti yan mayā
GE09ram_06_u:099.013c: ucyamāno na gṛhṇāsi tasyeyaṃ vyuṣṭir āgatā
GE09ram_06_u:099.015a: arundhatyā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ rohiṇyāś cāpi durmate
GE09ram_06_u:099.015c: sītāṃ dharṣayatā mānyāṃ tvayā hy asadṛśaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:099.016a: na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:099.016c: mayādhikā vā tulyā vā tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE09ram_06_u:099.018c: alpapuṇyā tv ahaṃ ghore patitā śokasāgare
GE09ram_06_u:099.019a: kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_06_u:099.020c: paśyantī vividhān deśāṃs tāṃs tāṃś citrasragambarā
GE09ram_06_u:099.021a: satyavāk sa mahābhāgo devaro me yad abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:099.022c: tvayā kṛtam idaṃ sarvam anāthaṃ rakṣasāṃ kulam
GE09ram_06_u:099.023a: na hi tvaṃ śocitavyo me prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.023c: strīsvabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate
GE09ram_06_u:099.024a: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvaṃ gṛhītvā svāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.025e: prasupta iva śokārtāṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:099.026c: yātudhānasya dauhitrīṃ kiṃ tvaṃ māṃ nābhyudīkṣase
GE09ram_06_u:099.028c: parigho vyavakīrṇas te bāṇaiś chinnaḥ sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:099.029a: dhig astu hṛdayaṃ yasyā mamedaṃ na sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:099.030a: etasminn antare rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:099.030c: saṃskāraḥ kriyatāṃ bhrātuḥ striyaś caitā nivartaya
GE09ram_06_u:099.031a: taṃ praśritas tato rāmaṃ śrutavākyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.033a: bhrātṛrūpo hi me śatrur eṣa sarvāhite rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.034a: nṛśaṃsa iti māṃ rāma vakṣyanti manujā bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:099.034c: śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.035a: tac chrutvā paramaprīto rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.036a: tavāpi me priyaṃ kāryaṃ tvatprabhavāc ca me jitam
GE09ram_06_u:099.036c: avaśyaṃ tu kṣamaṃ vācyo mayā tvaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:099.037c: tejasvī balavāñ śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.039c: kriyatām asya saṃskāro mamāpy eṣa yathā tava
GE09ram_06_u:099.040c: kṣipram arhati dharmajña tvaṃ yaśobhāg bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:099.042a: sa dadau pāvakaṃ tasya vidhiyuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.042c: tāḥ striyo 'nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:099.044c: harṣaṃ lebhe ripuṃ hatvā yathā vṛtraṃ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.001c: jagmus tais tair vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.002c: suyuddhaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sugrīvasay ca mantritam
GE09ram_06_u:100.003a: anurāgaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saumitrer lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:100.004a: rāghavas tu rathaṃ divyam indradattaṃ śikhiprabham
GE09ram_06_u:100.005c: divyaṃ taṃ ratham āsthāya divam evāruroha saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.009c: anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca mama caivopakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:100.010a: eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yad imaṃ rāvaṇānujam
GE09ram_06_u:100.011a: evam uktas tu saumitrī rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:100.011c: tathety uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇaṃ ghaṭam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:100.013c: tasyāmātyā jahṛṣire bhaktā ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.015a: sa tad rājyaṃ mahat prāpya rāmadattaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.015c: prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tato rāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:100.016a: akṣatān modakāṃl lājān divyāḥ sumanasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:100.016c: ājahrur atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurās tasmai niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100.017a: sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣo rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:100.017c: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:100.019a: tataḥ śailopamaṃ vīraṃ prāñjaliṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:100.021c: ācakṣva jayatāṃ śreṣṭha rāvaṇaṃ ca mayā hatam
GE09ram_06_u:100.022a: priyam etad udāhṛtya maithilyās tvaṃ harīśvara
GE09ram_06_u:101.002c: dadarśa śaśinā hīnāṃ sātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:101.005c: nihato rāvaṇo devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca
GE09ram_06_u:101.006a: pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rāmo vīras tvāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.007a: priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvāṃ tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye
GE09ram_06_u:101.007c: diṣṭyā jīvasi dharmajñe jayena mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:101.008a: labdho no vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gatavyathā
GE09ram_06_u:101.008c: rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatrur laṅkā ceyaṃ vaśe sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:101.009a: mayā hy alabdhanidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye
GE09ram_06_u:101.010a: saṃbhramaś ca na kartavyo vartantyā rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_06_u:101.010c: vibhīṣaṇa vidheyaṃ hi laṅkaiśvaryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:101.012c: praharṣeṇāvaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:101.013c: kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase devi kiṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:101.014a: evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā
GE09ram_06_u:101.016a: na hi paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ cintayantī plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:101.017a: na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara
GE09ram_06_u:101.017c: sadṛśaṃ matpriyākhyāne tava dātuṃ bhavet samam
GE09ram_06_u:101.018a: hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:101.018c: rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu naitad arhati bhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:101.019a: evam uktas tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.020c: snigdham evaṃvidhaṃ vākyaṃ tvam evārhasi bhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:101.021a: tavaitad vacanaṃ saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:101.022a: arthataś ca mayā prāptā devarājyādayo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.022c: hataśatruṃ vijayinaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi yat sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:101.023a: imās tu khalu rākṣasyo yadi tvam anumanyase
GE09ram_06_u:101.023c: hantum icchāmy ahaṃ sarvā yābhis tvaṃ tarjitā purā
GE09ram_06_u:101.025a: rākṣasyo dāruṇakathā varam etaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_06_u:101.025c: icchāmi vividhair ghātair hantum etāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.026a: muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiś caiva caraṇaiś caiva śobhane
GE09ram_06_u:101.026c: ghorair jānuprahāraiś ca daśanānāṃ ca pātanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.027c: bhṛśaṃ śuṣkamukhībhiś ca dāruṇair laṅghanair hataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.028c: hantum icchāmy ahaṃ devi tavemāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.030c: vidheyānāṃ ca dāsīnāṃ kaḥ kupyed vānarottama
GE09ram_06_u:101.031c: mayaitet prāpyate sarvaṃ svakṛtaṃ hy upabhujyate
GE09ram_06_u:101.032a: prāptavyaṃ tu daśā yogān mayaitad iti niścitam
GE09ram_06_u:101.033c: hate tasmin na kuryur hi tarjanaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_06_u:101.034c: ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ śloko me taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:101.035a: na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:101.036a: pāpānāṃ vā śubhānāṃ vā vadhārhāṇāṃ plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:101.036c: kāryaṃ kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaś cin nāparādhyati
GE09ram_06_u:101.037c: kurvatām api pāpāni naiva kāryam aśobhanam
GE09ram_06_u:101.038a: evam uktas tu hanumān sītayā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.039c: pratisaṃdiśa māṃ devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:101.043a: tām evam uktvā rājantīṃ sītāṃ sākṣād iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:102.002c: tāṃ devīṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ maithilīṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:102.003c: maithilī vijayaṃ śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:102.004a: pūrvakāt pratyayāc cāham ukto viśvastayā tayā
GE09ram_06_u:102.005a: evam ukto hanumatā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.006a: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan
GE09ram_06_u:102.009c: yānam āroha bhadraṃ te bhartā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_06_u:102.010a: evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:102.011c: yathāhaṃ rāmo bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:102.015c: praṇataś ca prahṛṣṭaś ca prāptāṃ sītāṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:102.016c: harṣo dainyaṃ ca roṣaś ca trayaṃ rāghavam āviśat
GE09ram_06_u:102.019c: tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnaṃ kārayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.021a: ṛkṣāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.023c: dākṣiṇyāt tadamarṣāc ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.024a: saṃrabdhaś cābravīd rāmaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_06_u:102.025a: kimarthaṃ mām anādṛtya kṛśyate 'yaṃ tvayā janaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.026a: na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārās tiraskriyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.027a: vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayaṃ vare
GE09ram_06_u:102.027c: na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanaṃ duṣyate striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.028a: saiṣā yuddhagatā caiva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:102.028c: darśane 'syā na doṣaḥ syān matsamīpe viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.029a: tad ānaya samīpaṃ me śīghram enāṃ vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:102.029c: sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛdgaṇavṛtaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:102.030a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa savimarśo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:102.031c: niśamya vākyaṃ rāmasya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:102.032c: aprītam iva sītāyāṃ tarkayanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:102.033a: lajjayā tv avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:102.035a: vismayāc ca praharṣāc ca snehāc ca paridevatā
GE09ram_06_u:102.036a: atha samapanudan manaḥklamaṃ sā; suciram adṛṣṭam udīkṣya vai priyasya
GE09ram_06_u:103.001a: tāṃ tu pārśve sthitāṃ prahvāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:103.002a: eṣāsi nirjitā bhadre śatruṃ jitvā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:103.002c: pauruṣād yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad etad upapāditam
GE09ram_06_u:103.003c: avamānaś ca śatruś ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau
GE09ram_06_u:103.004a: adya me pauruṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.005a: yā tvaṃ virahitā nītā calacittena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:103.006a: saṃprāptam avamānaṃ yas tejasā na pramārjati
GE09ram_06_u:103.007c: saphalaṃ tasya tac chlāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.008a: yuddhe vikramataś caiva hitaṃ mantrayataś ca me
GE09ram_06_u:103.009a: nirguṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ tyaktvā yo māṃ svayam upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.010a: ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sītā rāmasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.011a: paśyatas tāṃ tu rāmasya bhūyaḥ krodho 'bhyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:103.013c: tat kṛtaṃ sakalaṃ sīte śatruhastād amarṣaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:103.015a: viditaś cāstu bhadraṃ te yo 'yaṃ raṇapariśramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.015c: sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdāṃ vīryān na tvadarthaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.016a: rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.018a: tad gaccha hy abhyanujñātā yateṣṭaṃ janakātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:103.018c: etā daśa diśo bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:103.019a: kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyaṃ paragṛhoṣitām
GE09ram_06_u:103.020c: kathaṃ tvāṃ punarādadyāṃ kulaṃ vyapadiśan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:103.021a: tadarthaṃ nirjitā me tvaṃ yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:103.021c: nāsti me tvayy abhiṣvaṅgo yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām itaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.022c: lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvaṃ kuru buddhiṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_06_u:103.023c: niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:103.024a: na hi tvāṃ rāvaṇo dṛṣṭvā divyarūpāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_06_u:103.025a: tataḥ priyārhaśvaraṇā tad apriyaṃ; priyād upaśrutya cirasya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:103.025c: mumoca bāṣpaṃ subhṛśaṃ pravepitā; gajendrahastābhihateva vallarī
GE09ram_06_u:104.001a: evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:104.002a: sā tad aśrutapūrvaṃ hi jane mahati maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:104.003c: vākśalyais taiḥ saśalyeva bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_06_u:104.004c: śanair gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:104.005a: kiṃ mām asadṛśaṃ vākyam īdṛśaṃ śrotradāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:104.005c: rūkṣaṃ śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva
GE09ram_06_u:104.006a: na tathāsmi mahābāho yathā tvam avagacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:104.006c: pratyayaṃ gaccha me svena cāritreṇaiva te śape
GE09ram_06_u:104.007a: pṛthak strīṇāṃ pracāreṇa jātiṃ tvaṃ pariśaṅkase
GE09ram_06_u:104.007c: parityajemāṃ śaṅkāṃ tu yadi te 'haṃ parīkṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:104.008a: yady ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatāsmi vivaśā prabho
GE09ram_06_u:104.008c: kāmakāro na me tatra daivaṃ tatrāparādhyati
GE09ram_06_u:104.009a: madadhīnaṃ tu yat tan me hṛdayaṃ tvayi vartate
GE09ram_06_u:104.010c: yady ahaṃ te na vijñātā hatā tenāsmi śāśvatam
GE09ram_06_u:104.011a: preṣitas te yadā vīro hanūmān avalokakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:104.011c: laṅkāsthāhaṃ tvayā vīra kiṃ tadā na visarjitā
GE09ram_06_u:104.012c: tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktaṃ syāj jīvitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:104.013a: na vṛthā te śramo 'yaṃ syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:104.015c: mama vṛttaṃ ca vṛttajña bahu te na puraskṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:104.016a: na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇir bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:104.016c: mama bhaktiś ca śīlaṃ ca sarvaṃ te pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:104.017c: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:104.018a: citāṃ me kuru saumitre vyasanasyāsya bheṣajam
GE09ram_06_u:104.019c: yā kṣamā me gatir gantuṃ pravekṣye havyavāhanam
GE09ram_06_u:104.020a: evam uktas tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:104.021c: citāṃ cakāra saumitrir mate rāmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:104.022a: adhomukhaṃ tato rāmaṃ śanaiḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:104.023a: praṇamya devatābhyaś ca brāhmaṇebhyaś ca maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:104.024a: yathā me hṛdayaṃ nityaṃ nāpasarpati rāghavāt
GE09ram_06_u:104.024c: tathā lokasya sākṣī māṃ sarvataḥ pātu pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:104.025a: evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam
GE09ram_06_u:104.027a: tasyām agniṃ viśantyāṃ tu hāheti vipulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.001c: sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca varuṇaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.002c: kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.003c: āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abhijagmuś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:105.005a: kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭho jñānavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.006a: ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaṃ vasūnāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.006c: tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.007a: rudrāṇām aṣṭamo rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.007c: aśvinau cāpi te karṇau candrasūryau ca cakṣuṣī
GE09ram_06_u:105.008a: ante cādau ca lokānāṃ dṛśyase tvaṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:105.008c: upekṣase ca vaidehīṃ mānuṣaḥ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_06_u:105.009a: ity ukto lokapālais taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.010c: yo 'haṃ yasya yataś cāhaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
GE09ram_06_u:105.011a: iti bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.011c: abravīc chṛṇu me rāma satyaṃ satyaparākrama
GE09ram_06_u:105.012a: bhavān nārāyaṇo devaḥ śrīmāṃś cakrāyudho vibhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.013a: akṣaraṃ brahmasatyaṃ ca madhye cānte ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:105.013c: lokānāṃ tvaṃ paro dharmo viṣvaksenaś caturbhujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.014c: ajitaḥ khaḍgadhṛg viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.015a: senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tvaṃ buddhiḥ sattaṃ kṣamā damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.015c: prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca tvam upendro madhusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.016c: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca tvām āhur divyā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.017c: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:105.018a: prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ vā te na viduḥ ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_06_u:105.018c: dṛśyase sarvabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:105.019a: dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:105.020a: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhāṃ ca saparvatām
GE09ram_06_u:105.020c: ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvaṃ mahoragaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.021c: ahaṃ te hṛdayaṃ rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī
GE09ram_06_u:105.022a: devā gātreṣu lomāni nirmitā brahmaṇā prabho
GE09ram_06_u:105.022c: nimeṣas te 'bhavad rātrir unmeṣas te 'bhavad divā
GE09ram_06_u:105.023a: saṃskārās te 'bhavan vedā na tad asti tvayā vinā
GE09ram_06_u:105.023c: jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyamṃ te vasudhātalam
GE09ram_06_u:105.024a: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:105.024c: tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramais tribhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.025a: mahendraś ca kṛto rājā baliṃ baddhvā mahāsuram
GE09ram_06_u:105.025c: sītā lakṣmīr bhavān viṣṇur devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.026c: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:105.027a: nihato rāvaṇo rāma prahṛṣṭo divam ākrama
GE09ram_06_u:105.027c: amoghaṃ balavīryaṃ te amoghas te parākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.028a: amoghās te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaś ca ye narāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:105.028c: ye tvāṃ devaṃ dhruvaṃ bhaktāḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_06_u:105.029a: ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:106.003c: dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:106.004a: abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:106.004c: eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyā na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:106.005a: naiva vācā na manasā nānudhyānān na cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:106.005c: suvṛttā vṛttaśauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha
GE09ram_06_u:106.006c: tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanād vanāt
GE09ram_06_u:106.009c: na kiṃ cid abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:106.011a: avaśyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati
GE09ram_06_u:106.012c: iti vakṣyanti māṃ santo jānakīm aviśodhya hi
GE09ram_06_u:106.015a: imām api viśālākṣīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:106.016a: na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭātmā manasāpi hi maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:106.017c: ananyā hi mayā sītāṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:106.018c: na hi hātum iyaṃ śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:106.019a: avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ vo vaco hitam
GE09ram_06_u:106.019c: snigdhānāṃ lokamānyānām evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ hitam
GE09ram_06_u:106.020a: itīdam uktvā vacanaṃ mahābalaiḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:106.020c: sametya rāmaḥ priyayā mahābalaḥ; sukhaṃ sukhārho 'nubabhūva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.001a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:107.002c: diṣṭyā kṛtam idaṃ karma tvayā śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:107.003a: diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.003c: apāvṛttaṃ tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇajaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:107.004a: āśvāsya bharataṃ dīnaṃ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:107.004c: kaikeyīṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamātaram
GE09ram_06_u:107.006c: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tridivaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:107.007a: eṣa rājā vimānasthaḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_06_u:107.007c: kākutstha mānuṣe loke gurus tava mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.008a: indralokaṃ gataḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.008c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya
GE09ram_06_u:107.010c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaraṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.011c: prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:107.013a: na me svargo bahumataḥ saṃmānaś ca surarṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.013c: tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_06_u:107.014a: kaikeyyā yāni coktāni vākyāni vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:107.015a: tvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinaṃ pariṣvajya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:107.015c: adya duḥkhād vimukto 'smi nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.017a: idānīṃ ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sureśvaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.018a: siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvāṃ rāma gṛhaṃ gatam
GE09ram_06_u:107.019a: siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narā ye tvāṃ purīṃ gatam
GE09ram_06_u:107.020c: iccheyaṃ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ bharatena samāgatam
GE09ram_06_u:107.021c: vasatā sītayā sārdhaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:107.022c: rāvaṇaṃ ca raṇe hatvā devās te paritoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.023a: kṛtaṃ karma yaśaḥ ślāghyaṃ prāptaṃ te śatrusūdana
GE09ram_06_u:107.023c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājyastho dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
GE09ram_06_u:107.024a: iti bruvāṇaṃ rājānaṃ rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:107.024c: kuru prasādaṃ dharmajña kaikeyyā bharatasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:107.025a: saputrāṃ tvāṃ tyajāmīti yad uktā kaikayī tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:107.025c: sa śāpaḥ kaikayīṃ ghoraḥ saputrāṃ na spṛśet prabho
GE09ram_06_u:107.026a: sa tatheti mahārājo rāmam uktvā kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_06_u:107.026c: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:107.027a: rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:107.027c: kṛtā mama mahāprītiḥ prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca te
GE09ram_06_u:107.028a: dharmaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña yaśaś ca vipulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:107.028c: rāme prasanne svargaṃ ca mahimānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_06_u:107.029c: rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:107.030a: ete sendrās trayo lokāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.031a: etat tad uktam avyaktam akṣaraṃ brahmanirmitam
GE09ram_06_u:107.031c: devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ saumya guhyaṃ rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:107.032a: avāptaṃ dharmacaraṇaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:107.032c: rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:107.033a: sa tathoktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:107.033c: uvāca rājā dharmātmā vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:107.034a: kartavyo na tu vaidehi manyus tyāgam imaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:107.035a: na tvaṃ subhru samādheyā patiśuśrūvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:107.035c: avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivataṃ param
GE09ram_06_u:107.036a: iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītāṃ tathā snuṣām
GE09ram_06_u:108.002c: prītiyukto 'smi tena tvaṃ brūhi yan manasecchasi
GE09ram_06_u:108.003a: evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.003c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_06_u:108.004c: vakṣyāmi kuru me satyaṃ vacanaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:108.005a: mama hetoḥ parākrāntā ye gatā yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:108.005c: te sarve jīvitaṃ prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.006a: matpriyeṣv abhiraktāś ca na mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:108.006c: tvatprasādāt sameyus te varam etad ahaṃ vṛṇe
GE09ram_06_u:108.008a: akāle cāpi mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:108.008c: nadyaś ca vimalās tatra tiṣṭheyur yatra vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.009a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.010a: mahān ayaṃ varas tāta tvayokto raghunandana
GE09ram_06_u:108.011a: suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiś caiva jñātibhiḥ svajanena ca
GE09ram_06_u:108.011c: sarva eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_06_u:108.013a: savraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ gātraiḥ saṃvṛtair nivraṇaiḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.013c: babhūvur vānarāḥ sarve kim etad iti vismitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108.014c: ūcus te prathamaṃ stutvā stavārhaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:108.015a: gacchāyodhyām ito vīra visarjaya ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:108.017a: evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_06_u:108.017c: vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam
GE09ram_06_u:108.018a: abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān
GE09ram_06_u:108.018c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_06_u:108.019a: tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇarāmapālitā; mahācamūr hṛṣṭajanā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:108.019c: śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvato; niśāpraṇīteva hi śītaraśminā
GE09ram_06_u:109.001a: tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_06_u:109.001c: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.002c: candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:109.004a: evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:109.005a: sa tu tāmyati dharmātmā mamahetoḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.006c: na me snānaṃ bahumataṃ vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:109.007a: ita eva pathā kṣipraṃ pratigacchāma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:109.007c: ayodhyām āyato hy eṣa panthāḥ paramadurgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.008a: evam uktas tu kākutsthaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.008c: ahnā tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi tāṃ purīṃ pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_06_u:109.009a: puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_06_u:109.010a: tad idaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:109.010c: tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyāṃ gajajvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.011a: ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān
GE09ram_06_u:109.011c: vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam
GE09ram_06_u:109.012a: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_06_u:109.012c: arcitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ tato rāma gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:109.013a: prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.013c: satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām
GE09ram_06_u:109.014a: praṇayād bahumānāc ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:109.014c: prasādayāmi preṣyo 'haṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:109.015a: evam uktas tato rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:109.017a: na khalv etan na kuryāṃ te vacanaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:109.017c: taṃ tu me bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ bharataṃ tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.018c: śirasā yācato yasya vacanaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:109.019a: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:109.019c: gurūṃś ca suhṛdaś caiva paurāṃś ca tanayaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:109.020c: kṛtakāryasya me vāsaḥ kathaṃ cid iha saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109.021c: manyur na khalu kartavyas tvaritas tvānumānaye
GE09ram_06_u:110.001a: upasthitaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpakaṃ puṣpabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:110.002a: sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo vinīto rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.004c: ratnair arthaiś ca vivibhair bhūṣaṇaiś cābhipūjaya
GE09ram_06_u:110.006a: evaṃ saṃmānitāś ceme mānārhā mānada tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:110.007c: yatas tvām avagacchanti tataḥ saṃbodhayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:110.008a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vānarāṃs tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.009a: tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnair arthaiś ca yūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:110.009c: āruroha tato rāmas tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:110.011c: sugrīvaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:110.013a: yat tu kāryaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:110.013c: kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatā dharmabhīruṇā
GE09ram_06_u:110.014a: svarājye vasa laṅkāyāṃ mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:110.014c: na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ sendrā api divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.016a: evam uktās tu rāmeṇa vānarās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.016c: ūcuḥ prāñjalayo rāmaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.016e: ayodhyāṃ gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu no bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:110.017a: dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣekārdraṃ kausalyām abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:110.018a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.019a: priyāt priyataraṃ labdhaṃ yad ahaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.019c: sarvair bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītiṃ lapsye purīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.020a: kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānaṃ vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:110.021a: tatas tat puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saha senayā
GE09ram_06_u:110.021c: adhyārohat tvarañ śīghraṃ sāmātyaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:110.023c: prahṛṣṭaś ca pratītaś ca babhau rāmaḥ kuberavat
GE09ram_06_u:111.001a: anujñātaṃ tu rāmeṇa tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:111.004c: harīṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sīte viśasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:111.007a: akampanaś ca nihato balino 'nye ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.008a: atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā taṃ paryadevayat
GE09ram_06_u:111.009a: etat tu dṛśyate tīrthaṃ samudrasya varānane
GE09ram_06_u:111.009c: yatra sāgaram uttīrya tāṃ rātrim uṣitā vayam
GE09ram_06_u:111.010a: eṣa setur mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_06_u:111.014a: eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citrakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:111.014c: sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.015a: dṛśyate 'sau mahān sīte savidyud iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.016c: samayaś ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadhārthaṃ vālino mayā
GE09ram_06_u:111.017a: eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citrakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:111.018a: asyās tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:111.018c: atra yojanabāhuś ca kabandho nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:111.019c: yatra yuddhaṃ mahad vṛttaṃ tavahetor vilāsini
GE09ram_06_u:111.020a: kharaś ca nihataś saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.020c: triśirāś ca mahāvīryo mayā bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.021c: yatra tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:111.022c: agastyasyāśramo hy eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili
GE09ram_06_u:111.024e: atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:111.025a: asmin deśe mahākāyo virādho nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:111.029a: eṣā sā dṛśyate 'yodhyā rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:111.029c: ayodhyāṃ kuru vaidehi praṇāmaṃ punar āgatā
GE09ram_06_u:111.030a: tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:111.031a: tatas tu tāṃ pāṇḍuraharmyamālinīṃ; viśālakakṣyāṃ gajavājisaṃkulām
GE09ram_06_u:111.031c: purīm ayodhyāṃ dadṛśuḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; purīṃ mahendrasya yathāmarāvatīm
GE09ram_06_u:112.002c: śṛṇoṣi ka cid bhagavan subhikṣānāmayaṃ pure
GE09ram_06_u:112.002e: kaccic ca yukto bharato jīvanty api ca mātaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.003a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.004a: paṅkadigdhas tu bharato jaṭilas tvāṃ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_06_u:112.004c: pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:112.005c: strītṛtīyaṃ cyutaṃ rājyād dharmakāmaṃ ca kevalam
GE09ram_06_u:112.007a: dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvaṃ mamāsīt samitiṃjaya
GE09ram_06_u:112.008c: samīkṣya vijitāriṃ tvāṃ mama prītir anuttamā
GE09ram_06_u:112.009a: sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ te viditaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:112.011c: sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyaṃ yac ca vālī hatas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:112.012a: mārgaṇaṃ caiva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:112.012c: viditāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ nalasetur yathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.012e: yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭair hariyūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.013c: yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.014a: samāgamaś ca tridaśair yathādattaś ca te varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.015a: aham apy atra te dadmi varaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:112.016a: tasya tac chirasā vākyaṃ pratigṛhya nṛpātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.016c: bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata
GE09ram_06_u:112.017c: bhavantu mārge bhagavann ayodhyāṃ prati gacchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:112.018c: śuṣkāḥ samagrapatrās te nagāś caiva madhusravāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.001a: ayodhyāṃ tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.003a: ayodhyāṃ tvarito gaccha kṣipraṃ tvaṃ plavagottama
GE09ram_06_u:113.005a: śrutvā tu māṃ kuśalinam arogaṃ vigatajvaram
GE09ram_06_u:113.005c: bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mamātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_06_u:113.006a: ayodhyāyāś ca te mārgaṃ pravṛttiṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:113.007a: bharatas tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_06_u:113.007c: siddhārthaṃ śaṃsa māṃ tasmai sabhāryaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:113.008c: sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādaṃ vālinaś ca vadhaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:113.010c: yathā ca kāritaḥ setū rāvaṇaś ca yathā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.012a: jitvā śatrugaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.013a: etac chrutvā yamākāraṃ bhajate bharatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.013c: sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvaṃ yac cāpi māṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:113.014a: jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntā bharatasyeṅgitāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:113.016a: saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyenārthī svayaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:113.017a: tasya buddhiṃ ca vijñāya vyavasāyaṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_06_u:113.017c: yāvan na dūraṃ yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:113.018c: mānuṣaṃ dhārayan rūpam ayodhyāṃ tvarito yayau
GE09ram_06_u:113.020c: sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭo hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:113.021a: sakhā tu tava kākutstho rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.021c: sasītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvāṃ kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:113.022a: pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.024a: so 'paśyad rāmatīrthaṃ ca nadīṃ vālukinīṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:113.024c: gomatīṃ tāṃ ca so 'paśyad bhīmaṃ sālavanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:113.025a: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tvaritaḥ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.029a: pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantaṃ vai vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_06_u:113.030a: upasthitam amātyaiś ca śucibhiś ca purohitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.031a: na hi te rājaputraṃ taṃ cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram
GE09ram_06_u:113.032a: taṃ dharmam iva dharmajñaṃ devavantam ivāparam
GE09ram_06_u:113.033c: anuśocasi kākutsthaṃ sa tvā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:113.034a: priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokaṃ tyakṣyasi dāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:113.034c: asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvaṃ rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.035a: nihatya rāvaṇaṃ rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:113.036a: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā vaidehī ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:113.036c: sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahendreṇa śacī yathā
GE09ram_06_u:113.037c: papāta sahasā hṛṣṭo harṣān mohaṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_06_u:113.038a: tato muhūrtād utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.040a: devo vā mānuṣo vā tvam anukrośād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113.040c: priyākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:113.041a: gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ ca śataṃ param
GE09ram_06_u:113.041c: sakuṇḍalāḥ śubhācārā bhāryāḥ kanyāś ca ṣoḍaśa
GE09ram_06_u:113.043c: praharṣito rāmadidṛkṣayābhavat; punaś ca harṣād idam abravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.001a: bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya sumahad vanam
GE09ram_06_u:114.001c: śṛṇomy ahaṃ prītikaraṃ mama nāthasya kīrtanam
GE09ram_06_u:114.002a: kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_06_u:114.002c: eti jīvantam ānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_06_u:114.003a: rāghavasya harīṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.003c: kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.004c: ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ vane
GE09ram_06_u:114.005a: yathā pravrajito rāmo mātur datte vare tava
GE09ram_06_u:114.005c: yathā ca putraśokena rājā daśaratho mṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.006a: yathā dūtais tvam ānītas tūrṇaṃ rājagṛhāt prabho
GE09ram_06_u:114.006c: tvayāyodhyāṃ praviṣṭena yathā rājyaṃ na cepsitam
GE09ram_06_u:114.007c: nimantritas tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām
GE09ram_06_u:114.008a: sthitena rājño vacane yathā rājyaṃ visarjitam
GE09ram_06_u:114.008c: āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathāsi punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.009a: sarvam etan mahābāho yathāvad viditaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:114.009c: tvayi pratiprayāte tu yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me
GE09ram_06_u:114.011a: teṣāṃ purastād balavān gacchatāṃ gahane vane
GE09ram_06_u:114.012c: nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:114.013a: tat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:114.018c: lobhayām āsa vaidehīṃ bhūtvā ratnamayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.019a: sā rāmam abravīd dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:114.019c: aho manoharaḥ kānta āśrame no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:114.021a: atha saumyā daśagrīvo mṛgaṃ yāte tu rāghave
GE09ram_06_u:114.021e: jagrāha tarasā sītāṃ grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:114.022a: trātukāmaṃ tato yuddhe hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:114.022c: pragṛhya sītāṃ sahasā jagāmāśu sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.025c: praveśya maithilīṃ vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.027a: gṛdhraṃ hataṃ tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priyasakhaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.029a: tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvaṃ prītyā hārdo vyajāyata
GE09ram_06_u:114.034a: bhrātā tu gṛdhrarājasya saṃpātir nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:114.037a: tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām
GE09ram_06_u:114.038c: abhijñānaṃ mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahāmaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.039a: śrutvā tāṃ maithilīṃ hṛṣṭas tv āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:114.040c: jighāṃsur iva lokāṃs te sarvāṃl lokān vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.041a: tataḥ samudram āsādya nalaṃ setum akārayat
GE09ram_06_u:114.042a: prahastam avadhīn nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.042c: lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasutaṃ svayaṃ rāmas tu rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:114.043a: sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_06_u:114.043c: surarṣibhiś ca kākutstho varāṃl lebhe paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.044a: sa tu dattavaraḥ prītyā vānaraiś ca samāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.045a: taṃ gaṅgāṃ punar āsādya vasantaṃ munisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_06_u:114.045c: avighnaṃ puṣyayogena śvo rāmaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:114.046a: tataḥ sa satyaṃ hanumadvaco mahan; niśamya hṛṣṭo bharataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:114.046c: uvāca vāṇīṃ manasaḥ praharṣiṇī; cirasya pūrṇaḥ khalu me manorathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.001a: śrutvā tu param ānandaṃ bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.002a: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:115.005c: sthānāni ca nirasyantāṃ nandigrāmād itaḥ param
GE09ram_06_u:115.006c: tato 'bhyavakiraṃs tv anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.009e: niryayus tvarayā yuktā rathaiś ca sumahārathāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.010c: kausalyāṃ pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.012a: kṛtsnaṃ ca nagaraṃ tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:115.013a: mālyamodaka hastaiś ca mantribhir bharato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.016a: bhrātur āgamanaṃ śrutvā tat pūrvaṃ harṣam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.016c: pratyudyayau tadā rāmaṃ mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:115.017c: kaccin na khalu kāpeyī sevyate calacittatā
GE09ram_06_u:115.017e: na hi paśyāmi kākutsthaṃ rāmam āryaṃ paraṃtapam
GE09ram_06_u:115.018a: athaivam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:115.019a: sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhusravān
GE09ram_06_u:115.021c: manye vānarasenā sā nadīṃ tarati gomatīm
GE09ram_06_u:115.023a: tad etad dṛśyate dūrād vimalaṃ candrasaṃnibham
GE09ram_06_u:115.024a: rāvaṇaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ hatvā labdhaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:115.025a: etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_06_u:115.027c: dadṛśus taṃ vimānasthaṃ narāḥ somam ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:115.030c: vavande praṇato rāmaṃ merustham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_06_u:115.033a: tato lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīṃ ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.034c: maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlam ṛṣabhaṃ caiva sasvaje
GE09ram_06_u:115.035a: te kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.036a: vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:115.036c: diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:115.037a: śatrughnaś ca tadā rāmam abhivādya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:115.038c: jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau mano mātuḥ prasādayan
GE09ram_06_u:115.039a: abhivādya sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:115.039c: sa mātṝś ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:115.040c: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarā rāmam abruvan
GE09ram_06_u:115.042a: pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:115.043a: abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.043c: etat te rakṣitaṃ rājan rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:115.044a: adya janma kṛtārthaṃ me saṃvṛttaś ca manorathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.044c: yas tvāṃ paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:115.045a: avekṣatāṃ bhavān kośaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ puraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:115.045c: bhavatas tejasā sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ daśaguṇaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:115.046a: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhrātṛvatsalam
GE09ram_06_u:115.046c: mumucur vānarā bāṣpaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.047a: tataḥ praharṣād bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:115.049a: abravīc ca tadā rāmas tadvimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:115.051c: nipīḍya pādau pṛthag āsane śubhe; sahaiva tenopaviveśa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:116.002a: pūjitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:116.002c: tad dadāmi punas tubhyaṃ yathā tvam adadā mama
GE09ram_06_u:116.003c: kiśoravad guruṃ bhāraṃ na voḍhum aham utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:116.004a: vārivegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setur iva kṣaran
GE09ram_06_u:116.005a: gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya haṃsasyeva ca vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.005c: nānvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:116.006a: yathā ca ropito vṛkṣo jātaś cāntarniveśane
GE09ram_06_u:116.007a: śīryeta puṣpito bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet
GE09ram_06_u:116.007c: tasya nānubhaved arthaṃ yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate
GE09ram_06_u:116.008a: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:116.008c: yady asmān manujendra tvaṃ bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
GE09ram_06_u:116.010c: madhurair gītaśabdaiś ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca
GE09ram_06_u:116.011a: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:116.011c: tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmitvam abhivartaya
GE09ram_06_u:116.014a: pūrvaṃ tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahābale
GE09ram_06_u:116.016a: pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:116.021a: ayodhyāyāṃ tu sacivā rājño daśarathasya ye
GE09ram_06_u:116.022e: kartum arhatha rāmasya yad yan maṅgalapūrvakam
GE09ram_06_u:116.023a: iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam
GE09ram_06_u:116.024c: prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmo nagaram uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:116.025a: jagrāha bharato raśmīñ śatrughnaś chatram ādade
GE09ram_06_u:116.033a: amātyair brāhmaṇaiś caiva tathā prakṛtibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.033c: śriyā viruruce rāmo nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.035a: akṣataṃ jātarūpaṃ ca gāvaḥ kanyās tathā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.035c: narā modakahastāś ca rāmasya purato yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.036a: sakhyaṃ ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvaṃ cānilātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:116.036c: vānarāṇāṃ ca tat karma vyācacakṣe 'tha mantriṇām
GE09ram_06_u:116.038a: tato hy abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākās te gṛhe gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:116.039a: pitur bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.039c: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_06_u:116.041a: yac ca madbhavanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sāśokavanikaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:116.042c: pāṇau gṛhītvā sugrīvaṃ praviveśa tam ālayam
GE09ram_06_u:116.046c: pūrṇair ghaṭaiḥ pratīkṣadhvaṃ tathā kuruta vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.047c: utpetur gaganaṃ śīghraṃ garuḍā iva śīghragāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.048a: jāmbavāṃś ca hanūmāṃś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.050a: ṛṣabho dakṣiṇāt tūrṇaṃ samudrāj jalam āharat
GE09ram_06_u:116.054a: tataḥ sa prayato vṛddho vasiṣṭho brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:116.055a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.055c: kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaś ca gautamo vijayas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:116.057a: ṛtvigbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvaṃ kanyābhir mantribhis tathā
GE09ram_06_u:116.058c: caturhir lokapālaiś ca sarvair devaiś ca saṃgataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.059a: chatraṃ tasya ca jagrāha śatrughnaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:116.062c: abhiṣeke tad arhasya tadā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.063a: bhūmiḥ sasyavatī caiva phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.064a: sahasraśatam aśvānāṃ dhenūnāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:116.064c: dadau śataṃ vṛṣān pūrvaṃ dvijebhyo manujarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.069a: araje vāsasī divye śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:116.070c: avaikṣata harīn sarvān bhartāraṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.071c: pradehi subhage hāraṃ yasya tuṣṭāsi bhāmini
GE09ram_06_u:116.072a: pauruṣaṃ vikramo buddhir yasminn etāni nityadā
GE09ram_06_u:116.072c: dadau sā vāyuputrāya taṃ hāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:116.074a: tato dvivida maindābhyāṃ nīlāya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.076a: yathārhaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve kāmai ratnaiś ca puṣkalair
GE09ram_06_u:116.078a: ātiṣṭha dharmajña mayā sahemāṃ; gāṃ pūrvarājādhyuṣitāṃ balena
GE09ram_06_u:116.078c: tulyaṃ mayā tvaṃ pitṛbhir dhṛtā yā; tāṃ yauvarājye dhuram udvahasva
GE09ram_06_u:116.079a: sarvātmanā paryanunīyamāno; yadā na saumitrir upaiti yogam
GE09ram_06_u:116.079c: niyujyamāno bhuvi yauvarājye; tato 'bhyaṣiñcad bharataṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:116.080a: rāghavaś cāpi dharmātmā prāpya rājyam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:116.081c: anyaiś ca vividhair yajñair ayajat pārthivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.084a: na paryadevan vidhavā na ca vyālakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:116.084c: na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:116.085a: nirdasyur abhaval loko nānarthaḥ kaṃ cid aspṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:116.085c: na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate
GE09ram_06_u:116.087c: nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:116.088c: kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukhasparśaś ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.089a: svakarmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svair eva karmabhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116.089c: āsan prajā dharmaparā rāme śāsati nānṛtāḥ
